I am very pleased and glad I bought this.  Wow Amazon.  Good job!

Reviews.Title: Kindle  Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Jewellady
Reviews.Content: The only thing missing is a flash player. I am unable to use my favorite games without it.Needs Adobe Flash.

Reviews.Title: If you like dealing with Amazon, you will like it.
Reviews.Author: tricia
Reviews.Content: I am happy with my tablet and what it offers but it is not easy to set up your e-mail and you can not import you contacts.

Reviews.Title: every body need one
Reviews.Author: raymond varvel
Reviews.Content: I gave it a 5star  because  I think it's great. I just turned 73 years old. Would never think there would be something like this. Every body needs one. Great product.

Reviews.Title: Love, Love, Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: dhawks
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HD 8.9!  I also have an IPad and hands down I prefer my Kindle!  The size is so much better to take everywhere you want to go.  I just throw it in my purse and I'm off.  The graphics are unbelievable!  I only have one minor complaint and that is the apps are not as good.  To be honest that has improved tremendously since I bought my first Kindle Fire last year.I truly believe the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 delivers on all that it has been advertised to be!  Highly recommend buying!

Reviews.Title: New Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Bev
Reviews.Content: Love my new Kindle Fire.  Very impressed with customer servies.  my old Kindle started acting strange. not holding a charge and such.  I called the help desk and they walked me through all the possibilities and determined there was a problem that could not be fixed.  They sent me my new Kindle Fire which was an upgrade from what I had.  I did have to pay a little extra but not what I would have had to pay if I had just bought it outright.  Amazon Kindle is the best

Reviews.Title: Great! Great! Great!
Reviews.Author: Niki
Reviews.Content: My husband bought this for me and I Love it! Everything about it is Great!!! Very easy to use and understand. I would recommend this over the Apple I Pad and to anyone looking for this type of product.

Reviews.Title: Nice and Easy!
Reviews.Author: Carol Rapp
Reviews.Content: I love everything about this and have recommended it to everyone!  Easy to see and easy to use.  Love the fact that I can connect to my wireless at home and if I take it out with me I have the back up connection!  Comes in handy sitting around in Dr.'s offices waiting your turn!!

Reviews.Title: I am the target customer for this product!
Reviews.Author: mchinca
Reviews.Content: Set up was super easy, downloading apps was so simple I was almost embarrassed. Picture and sound quality is excellent.  Don't expect too much in the way of documentation (how to use, etc) but there is info contained in the device as well as a lot of content online.  I am a loyal Amazon user, and the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 is another win for me.  LOVE IT!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Bill Alderfer
Reviews.Content: When my Kindle Fire expired unexpectedly, I was at a loss as to what to do.  I called Amazon and went through the procedures to fix the problem.  They didn't work.  But Amazon made me an offer that I couldn't refuse.  I am now the very proud owner of a Kindle Fire HD 8.9".  It has met and exceeded my every wish for a tablet.  Great product.  Thank you!  Even for my Kindle fire expiring.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire HD
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Asseille
Reviews.Content: I don't like the fact that it doesn't have a back camera only in the front. You have to download an app for the camera and the pictures are no where near HD in my opinion. Almost every apps you have to download like an app for calculator which is totally ridiculous. They need to fix that

Reviews.Title: saved a ton of momey buying this instead of the IPad...
Reviews.Author: Cheryl
Reviews.Content: I have family and friends with the IPad and to me this is equal to it for much less...I watch movies on it, read books, play games and much more....taking this with me on vacation gives me easy access to my banking and bills...I love it!!!!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Ruby Slippers
Reviews.Content: Only problems ~ not enough storage space and no slots for SD cards or thumb drives.  It should also have USB ports, now that would be fantastic.  Oh and Word 2010 or better.  I love it though.

Reviews.Title: Love the Kindle
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my wife, her second Kindle, she loves it. I love it, I don't have to talk to her anymore, it takes up all her spare time!

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Unit - Makes free time easy to enjoy!
Reviews.Author: Ronald W Bowen
Reviews.Content: Only problem - no AC charger adaptor. For $300 I shouldn't have had to order one post purchase. The Prime is very friendly and useful.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this.  My brother bought me a Ipad and though I use it I find the kindle so much easier and more user friendly I use it to watch my series when I am running on my tread mill it fits perfect.

Reviews.Title: Fast, Fun and Reliable
Reviews.Author: H. Kane "AV enthusiast"
Reviews.Content: Having owned an original Kindle Reader and a Kindle Fire acquiring this device seemed a natural progression.  It's relatively light and I enjoy reading books, listening to music, playing games and watching movies.  Much easier to read e-mail due to the larger screen and, unlike my Kindle Fire, I'm able to import and play FLAC encoded music.  A very nice device.

Reviews.Title: Worth the wait!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: I saved up for quite a while to be able to buy this Kindle.  I am so glad that I did.  Pictures and videos look fantastic on the device.  I have used the native Kindle reader as well as the OverDrive reader with epub books and both have worked wonderfully.  I've played with many free apps and have yet to run out of things to try.The sound is good, but volume is a bit low.  This only gets worse when I put my case on the Kindle.  Since I don't usually listen to much music I guess this isn't as bad a problem as it might be for some.I love my Kindle Fire HD.

Reviews.Title: Great product.
Reviews.Author: james
Reviews.Content: I got this for my fiancee cause she had the older and smaller version.  She loves it.  Havent heard any complaints, thank god.  lol

Reviews.Title: Great for everything I need to do
Reviews.Author: Mema
Reviews.Content: I use it constantly and don't see why anyone would spend more for an ipad.  Email, games, searches, movies, tv shows and reading!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9" 4G LTE Wireless
Reviews.Author: David Matekovich
Reviews.Content: Love Love Love!!The picture is amazing.  Wireless works great.  Touchscreen works great.  Internal speakers work good, I prefer to use my earbuds.  I wish the charging cable came with the wall adapter, you will need to buy it separately.  I bought the Otter Box to go with it.  I also wish it came with the HDMI cable but oh well.  Overall, this Kindle is amazing!

Reviews.Title: tough to get started
Reviews.Author: Carren B.
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet. I would have liked a manual with it not in it to help get some understanding of the unit - kind of lost after the turn on.

Reviews.Title: Fire HD 8.9 4G
Reviews.Author: Mujervieja
Reviews.Content: There are some features that are confusing to access.  I have a problem with my A T & T 4G.  My old Kindle had 3G and it worked fine in my home.  The 4G feature works occasionally but most of the time it doesn't.

Reviews.Title: Lives Up To My Expectations
Reviews.Author: Nancy L Roos
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet.  I have a netbook, which is approximately the same size only thicker and heavier with its own carrying case which I have taken on trips.  The tablet fits into my purse, so is much easier to travel with.  The tablet holds a charge for much longer than the netbook, too.  I am very pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY KINDLE
Reviews.Author: Karin J.
Reviews.Content: It took me forever to decide what kind of tablet to buy, and I am glad I decided to go with Kindle, and the large one. Extremely clear graphics, quick to load on my wifi, and even playing games, using internet, and reading it holds a charge for a long, long time. By long I mean constant play/read and it will only be down to maybe 60% after 8-10 hours. Sturdy and reliable.

Reviews.Title: It works ok, but nothing special
Reviews.Author: Thomas Brey
Reviews.Content: I have used a couple of tablets by now, and this one rates about in the middle.The good things:  I am an Amazon Prime member, and there is a lot of free content associated with that.  You can 'borrow' books and watch a lot of good movies and TV shows.  I also have a lot of music on the Amazon cloud, and it is super simple to handle music that way.  Also same for pictures.  The HD videos are especially good.The not so good:  The navigation is poor.  It does work, but not nearly as well as other tablets, especially compared to the iPad. Clicking a link is often difficult, and I generally have to embiggen the screen to do it.  The interface to the apps is very cumbersome, and often takes several clicks to swipes to get to the one you want.  Also, there are a lot of apps that just are not available on the Kindle Fire.  Even when I know there is an android version, that does not mean there is a version for the Kindle Fire.I will keep this and use it, but it falls a little short of expectations.

Reviews.Title: Good but not great
Reviews.Author: Marvin Q. Miller "Marv Miller"
Reviews.Content: Screen resolution is better then the old kindle fire but the processor still seems slow. Battery life is awful and unlike the Ipad does not show progress when charging. all in all it's probably worth the 269.00 purchase price but it definetly needs some improvements.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9" 32 GB
Reviews.Author: Cedarkroft
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD 8.9" is my third Kindle, the original 7" Kindle Fire was gifted as was the second 7" Kindle Fire HD. IMO the Kindle Fire HD's are one the best entertainment tablet devices available at a relatively reasonable price.  From reviews I've read I think people have to understand that Kindle is an entertainment device and not a Windows type functioning device an therefore has limited Office/ Business uses.

Reviews.Title: excellent!
Reviews.Author: yxhzbq
Reviews.Content: Didn't think I'd be much of a tablet person but I love the kindle fire HD.  I got it for my little one and now I am considering getting one for myself.

Reviews.Title: Great for old eyes
Reviews.Author: Floyd E. Catt
Reviews.Content: I am 75 years old and have some interesting eye issues.  Reading a real book requires just the right amount of light or I have problems. The Kindle 8.9 works great for me.  The default font is more than adequate for me to read for hours.  I did tone the screen down a bit by going to the sepia mode.  The page size as it turns out is much the same as a hardback book and using a stylus makes page turning a using the dictionary a snap!I was a Communications Engineer and a very technical person so I struggled for some time as to what I should buy.  i.e., a reader, black and white or color and reader or multipurpose tablet.  After much pondering over what to do, I finally decided the Kindle Fire HD met my needs very well.  I decide my main objective was to have a reader so why not buy a device that it's primary design was to be a reader.  Kindle does this very well but to my surprise it also functions very well as a tablet to visit the internet.  It will not replace a high end tablet but for $269 it does a great job and meets all of my needs.  If I were still working I might consider the high end tablet route but for me at this time the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 is great.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HD 8.9" !
Reviews.Author: Terry Sue
Reviews.Content: Reading a book at low light is so easy! The soundtracks of movies sound much fuller than what I expected! Everyday I am learning new things that my Kindle can do!  I am pleased that I chose the larger model as it gives me more viewing space!

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!
Reviews.Author: Noryx
Reviews.Content: This is Kindle with Retina display. Part of my consideration when purchasing this product was Amazon's product warranty and support.

Reviews.Title: Short and simple
Reviews.Author: Cowan vostof
Reviews.Content: First let me say that I only got this because I love my Kindle ereader and just wanted the best version I could get. I have never been into the tablet craze and could never really care about having or using a tablet. That being said let me say that this is indeed the best ereader i have ever seen I couldn't ask for more if I tried. Then I decided to play with it a little. What can I say the screen is great the picture is amazing. The sound is great also considering the small speakers. The web searches are fast maybe even faster than my laptop. Like some of the other reviews have said I can't understand not including a charger but i had a spare one I could use. I guess the main question is am I happy with this product and the answer is while I know nothing about tablets and I'm still learning some things on this one, yes I'm happy with it and would recommend it it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9 inch
Reviews.Author: Nell Jones
Reviews.Content: Great deal on a tablet that does so much. I love the size and am just as comfortable using it as my laptop. I was pleasantly surprised to receive it in just one day and enjoy using it for reading, games, surfing, and watching movies. The sound quality is great and the picture is excellent. Thanks for such a great deal.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT DEVICE
Reviews.Author: lata crouch
Reviews.Content: I am not one for writing reviews. However the Kindle HD 8.9 deserves it's place in the spotlight. All the kindles are Great, but this one is AWESOME. It is the best of both an e-reader and a tablet. I have had other devices both tablets and e-readers and this one exceeds them all. It is well worth the money for what you get. I can honestly say I cannot find one flaw with this product.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle Fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: Bonita Goodman
Reviews.Content: I loved my Kindle Keyboard. However when the Kindle Fire 8.9 came out my Kindle Keyboard was still working well and I was having no problems and I just knew that my time with my Kindle Keyboard was going sooner than later. I did what any woman with adult children does, I asked for 1 for Christmas, with all the goodies. The power plug, the warranty, the Otterbox, and of course books. I got it all and I am in love with the Fire 8.9. I though the Kindle an listen to it as I Keyboard was great, this is the absolute best. I ci to sleep, when I am cross stitching, when I'm sitting outside. It's the best. I never dreamed that a Kindle Fire 8.9 could give me so many options. I have enjoyed this Kindle and can assure you, that you will be getting a 5 star product. I have bought one for my daughter and for a friend. Get one now. It's worth the money and you won't be sorry. They also give the children room to learn and explore their talents on this mini computer. Thanks Amazon I can't wait to see what you come up with next.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous tablet
Reviews.Author: Mohammad Abuomar
Reviews.Content: I wanted a gadget for reading my PDF books. Previously had to read on computer and it was not a good experience having to put a laptop on my blanket before going to bed, overheat and weight not so cool. I thought about Kindle and the perks that comes with Kindle Fire made it clear it's the best. Since I got it, I rarely have to open my laptop after work. Reply to personal email, skype with family back home, check facebook feed and most important read PDF books.It's the ultimate entertainment gadget, audio is fabulous (best audio in all gadgets I tried). Amazon Prime instant video is lovely. Now I don't even switch on my blue Ray player. I love the collection provided. Unlike Apple products; I can use the Kindle as USB drive and copy my books, music tracks, documents and more. Kindle sorts them automatically and I can use them right away.Unlimited cloud storage is just amazing advantage from Amazon. I can put it as much music and access them from my kindle using the cloud player. Love it.The speed is OK for the most part, but it would try some more horse power on the processor. Overall, Kindle Fire HD is the best gadget for my usage and I made a good choice buying it.

Reviews.Title: My grandson refused my offer to trade him my Samsung Galaxy II for his Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Vicki Montney "neverendingstory"
Reviews.Content: He said that would be crazy because the Fire HD is awesome and the sound is the best sound if any other tablet.  He is 11 and has used an IPad, Ipod, and my Samsung.  I am happy that he loves the Fire HD and it does seem to be a really nice product for the cost.*****Be careful if you are purchasing a case or cover for this though.  I bought a sturdy, well made "leather" smart case for the Fire HD and it caused the screen to shatter.  The back of the case was a hard plastic bonded with a synthetic leather that had "fingers" to grip the front of the tablet.  The smart "snapped" closed.  Those little fingers put too much pressure on that screen and caused it crack the glass.  The idea is good, but the design needs to be improved.  For now-I would recommend a soft skin type cover or a leather sleeve type that has no hard edges over the screen.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9 is a great product!
Reviews.Author: Donald A Futrell
Reviews.Content: I find that with the Kindle it is so easy to find the various features.  I got my Kindle to read books and I find it a most enjoyable format.  Easy to turn pages and to find your last page read to.  I am on my fourth book and I really think I can read a little faster.  There are a lot of folks that have put together a great product with so many interesting features.  It will take me a while to get familiar with all the features.  Because right now I am into reading books and do not want to put it down to see how the story moves along.  And it is so easy to have the Kindle in my lap and just go to the next page with a short finger move.  Simply GREAT!Thanks again to all those that have put the Kindle on the market.RegardsDonald Futrelldafutrell@comcast.net

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: JS0027
Reviews.Content: I bought the 8.9 HD after my Kindle Fire starting having start-up and connectivity problems. At first, it seemed too big but I adjusted quickly and now I love it, take it just about everywhere I go.

Reviews.Title: Great machine!
Reviews.Author: Richard D. Cosci, Sr.
Reviews.Content: This device does everything I want it to do.  It is not meant to be a high powered computer but, it keeps me in contact with my e-mails.  I can also watch television programs that my wife does not want to watch and the library is great for obtaining all of the reading material that I need or want.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: BONNIE L. REID
Reviews.Content: I purchased the original Kindle Fire (KF)when it came out and I loved it.  I had the choice to purchase the IPad but decided against it.  The cost for one thing and when I compared the difference between the KF HD and the IPad, I could not see that much of a difference.  I wish that the camera was a front and back view but other than that I completely satisfied with the Kindle Fire products and I can see eventually a lot more additions and improvement in the future.  By the way the price is great.  What out IPad!!!!!

Reviews.Title: whooo hoo
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "CJ & RJ"
Reviews.Content: The Fire HD is a replacement for my first gen Kindle reader that finally developed a problem, the fire is great, all my books are being read on it, movies stream flawlessly, sound is fantastic,and surfing the net is pretty easy.My Net Book computer is taking a well earned break.As a matter of fact I could not think of any negative for the Fire HD, except my wife grabs it instead of her first gen Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: good tablet with some shortcomings....
Reviews.Author: Mark S. Christman
Reviews.Content: Good tablet in general with a few exceptions----great as an e-reader (obviously) and definitely holds its own with apps (although not as many as Apple).  My main complaint is for web searching---the browser 'Silk' is sometimes extremely slow and often freezes up and causes the Kindle to shut down and restart---really annoying.....

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Elaine Mott
Reviews.Content: I would highly recommend this kindle.  I bought it for my husband for Father's Day.  He is afraid of computers, and feels left out of the electronic age because of it.  I gave him this Kindle and he loves it.  He operate emails from it, he now has a Facebook Page, which he loves.  And, it's a great reader!  Very easy to operate.This KIndle does everything that a IPad does except the photo's.  This is the only real draw back.  If KIndle wants to compete with Ipad, they should do something about the photo's.  You can take a photo, but you have to turn the kindle away from you so that the lens is facing what you are taking.  You can not see what you are taking. most of the time, you don't get the photo.  Other than the photo's, this kindle is wonderful!

Reviews.Title: Great Amazon support!
Reviews.Author: Patricia A. Shaha
Reviews.Content: I decided to purchase the Kindle Fire HD 8.9" because I have an android phone and I have had a Kindle ereader.  So, I was experienced with both. I received the Kindle Fire about 3 weeks ago.  I was satisfied with everything, but I kept having a problem with the power switch.  It was difficult to turn on.  Then, it would not turn on at all.  Last Monday, I called Amazon support and explained my situation.  After following the instructions, it was decided I had a faulty power switch.  I returned the Kindle Fire; on Friday, four days later, I received the replacement Kindle.  The power switch works perfectly!!  Kindle support is awesome.  I do not know of any other company that is so quick to respond - not only with this issue - but every question I have posed.I did not give the Kindle 5 stars.  I was surprised about the face-only camera.  How do you take a picture?  Not important to me, since I take pictures with my phone and my camera.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Sagemom
Reviews.Content: For this for my daughter who I visually impaired. The lighting and contrast that is available on the fire is perfect for her to read. She can make the print as large as he needs and when her eyes get tired, the text to speech mode is great. She absolutely loves it and doesn't go anywhere without it!

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Edin S
Reviews.Content: best of bunch. excellent for media consumption. great display. However, Android OSis heavily modified and it is obstacle to great hardware.

Reviews.Title: grown to love it
Reviews.Author: nekojita
Reviews.Content: I'll admit, I've bought into the Amazon/Kindle crack. I own three now, the old e-ink, the old Fire and now the Fire HD. I'm sure if there's a new version that comes out, I'll probably find an excuse to buy it at some point as I keep finding uses for the older ones. That said, it took me a while to warm up to the Fire HD. Perhaps because I expected so much from it, it being the first real tablet Kindle to come out, even though I'm not going to rave about Apple or the others.At first I mainly stuck to the reading and video capabilities - of course it's easy to download, manage and read material on the Fire HD. Videos look great on the screen as well, and as someone who streams their Prime account as well as Hulu and Netflix all of the time, I haven't noticed any issues with the video quality or capability. Some days I watch more on my Fire HD than I do my tv.Music streams and plays well, also (though have a complaint with the playlists on Kindles and how they can time out. Why no loop feature, Amazon?).I'm not the biggest app person out there - I've been able to eventually track down what I need and notice that there's more out there all of the time, but again, it's not like I hit the app store that often. I've never had an issue with the apps I have downloaded.It took me a while to get used to the Silk/internet feature. I'm not the biggest fan of this aspect of the Fire HD - if there was something to detract stars from,t his wold be it. Maybe because on a regular pc I'd have a couple of dozen tabs open and tons of bookmarks, and I don't think the bookmark nature of Silk is very intuitive and I have to remember to keep the tabs to a minimum for it to function well. Here's hoping to improvements in future upgrades.All in all, the Fire HD is a great tablet/multi-media/entertainment device. It's something I use pretty much every day and can take anywhere, and it's easy to figure out and set up. It also comes with fantastic customer service.

Reviews.Title: Great Experience
Reviews.Author: B.Krider
Reviews.Content: The colors are amazing. I don't download in HD, but I don't miss it. I only have 5g of data usage, and I have gone over the two months I've had it. I don't know what the difference is. I'm using the same programs in the same way. Otherwise it's great.

Reviews.Title: This has been terrific so far. Extremely intuitive, fun and solid device so far.
Reviews.Author: equinox
Reviews.Content: Ok, I haven't had it for more than 2 months - but so far it's simply been awesome.  I've had no issues with the functionality, usability or any problem like that.  After putting on a screen protector the screen seems to be a hair-less responsive, but since I'm getting a bit older that's actually a good thing for me because I hate pushing the wrong buttons because my hands shake a bit.  What I have found out can be challenging are some of the apps in the app store.  It would be nice if Amazon would do more in their own testing of these apps before allowing them to be sold or given away on their network.  Some of them have deceiving descriptions of what they provide or can do - and so neophyte users can quickly be burned. But I digress a bit, so the equipment is fantastic, it approved a bit ahead of schedule (I'm a prime member and it came faster than promised), and the price was acceptable. I'm happy with it so far.

Reviews.Title: Money well spent
Reviews.Author: Richard A. Towle
Reviews.Content: Overall, I'm pleased with the Kindle.  It's well designed, well-constructed and extremely capable.  The audio and visual aspects are at least equal and usually superior to the competing tablets.The one difficulty I have is navigating to/from and sometimes even within the Kindle menu. I guess that will be eased by use.  My only criticism is that there is no paper manual to support the device.  It's very challenging to jump back and forth from the in-system manual and the function you're trying to use.

Reviews.Title: Just What I Needed
Reviews.Author: Sew Write
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research before my purchase. I am a writer and I needed a lighter, easier to cart around method to write than using my laptop. Using the kindle with the Bear Motion keyboard/case is perfect for this purpose. All I needed was to download and app and my kindle can be used like a word processor. So easy and convenient to take anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Still like it better than my Ipad
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Rakowski
Reviews.Content: I got this to replace my Ipad.  I love kindle and Amazon.  I only have a few negataive issues.  First the battery doens't last very long and there is no rear facing camera so you really can't take pictures.  It's also a little bit heavier than what I was hoping for but all in all I really like it.  It is easier to read on than the ipad but not as nice as the original kindle.  I would have preferred the 7" but I wanted the 4G option.  It's too bad I had to choose.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy I bought my Kindle Fire Hd 8.9
Reviews.Author: love this game
Reviews.Content: I have been searching many tablets and read several reviews and I am very glad that I stayed with kindle as far as all the features with the Hd they are amazing!!! And browsing the web has never been easier.  The only draw back is that a few games with Facebook can not be played and some video can not be streamed. But I know that will be a miner set back that will be conquered soon kindle is #1 and is always leading the others!!!  I do not want to take away at all the abundance of Web content that streamed without any problems I would definitely recommend this Tablet..... Oh almost forgot to mention AWESOME Customer service. Thank you again for such a wonderful product.

Reviews.Title: It is not a computer substitute, but takes care of most of my home entertainment needs and is easy to use.
Reviews.Author: PastPrime
Reviews.Content: The video quality is better than anything else I own and the sound is very good, making it enjoyable to watch movies and TV shows.  Between Amazon Prime and Hulu Plus, there is way more content than I'll ever have time for.  I do not access the web very much with this tablet, but I've tried it and it seems to work well.  There are plenty of user guides for it which you can download for little or nothing.  I've got a couple of game apps which are fun, but this is an area which I think can stand a little improvement, e.g. I would like to see an app of the standard Monopoly game.  While the volume is adequate, I'd like to see a little more on the high end.  Minor problems aside, I would definitely recommend this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Overall a great item
Reviews.Author: Zelda83
Reviews.Content: Love this kindle 8.9, I have had a kindle in the past and upgraded to the new HD. great quality, clear picture, sound is clear not muffled. the kindle 8.9 is a little heavy but not very noticeable. Great for reading. Overall it is a great item.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed
Reviews.Author: Anthony Vulgamore "AMV"
Reviews.Content: It does pretty much anything I need. There are a few video codecs that need to be installed for both Silk and firefox beta. It would be nice to able to use the Google app store. For the price it is a great tablet and I had purchaed a bluetooth keyboad in a case and an office suite which allows me to create and open most Microsoft and Open Source documents, using it like a laptop.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet
Reviews.Author: Chelle Moore
Reviews.Content: I chose this product because it is much cheaper than the iPad and it works great. I got it for Mother's Day this year and it has been one of the best gifts I have received. I use it everyday even when I am on the go. I use it for school, to keep track of my busy schedule and I even get to play Scrabble with my mother in law! I rated this 5 stars because of all that I listed above and I would highly recommend this product to all my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Love my kindle.
Reviews.Author: Glenda Marcum-Sherman
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd kindle, I upgraded so that I would have the  capability of internet  when we are traveling.  My kindle goes with me everywhere it goes.

Reviews.Title: Great for the long flights
Reviews.Author: Doogiesd
Reviews.Content: Perfect choice for someone that wants more entertainment quality from their tablet over hype.  I get all my magazines, great movies and read all my kindle books in one device...Add that there are android apps to fill the gaps all the better.  Very highly recommended

Reviews.Title: Use it Every Day
Reviews.Author: Dogs Rule!
Reviews.Content: I have several versions of the Kindle and am a fan.  Once I received the HD large version, though, I have to say I am totally hooked.  The screen and clarity are great. I use it for email, online work, social media and the occasional video plus Words with Friends.  I like that it is a little smaller than the iPad and easier to stow in my purse, but large enough for everything!  This one has a camera, too!

Reviews.Title: Was exactly what I've been looking for!
Reviews.Author: Jeanie Matthews
Reviews.Content: I've been waiting for the "perfect" device for me and this was it!  It was priced right and highly rated (and I now know why)  it's very "user friendly", especially for us "untechie" types.  I've been juggling between the "Nook", a "Notepad" and a "Laptop", but this fullfills all my needs, i.e., email, internet, books.  My granddaughters love the games I can download so it also keeps them entertained!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hd 8.9 16gb good for the money
Reviews.Author: nick76r
Reviews.Content: I got the kindle hd 8.9 for the kids.... to entertain them with games, netflix, prime movies/shows, during road trips (using my phones wifi hotspot) or other times when i need them occupied. The only complaint (minor) is that the hd isn't really that great of high def... its a little misleading. I remember commercials on tv before i purchased it, bragging how clear the screen was compared to an apple ipad. What I mean is that the screen resolution or definition isn't that much more noticeably better than the first gen kindle fire. An example: my 5 year old & I watch a few funny youtube videos before his bedtime, and the screen resolution is much better and more clear on my samsung galaxy s 3. I can hardly stand watching youtube or other streaming vids from the internet because the picture quality is grainy and blocky (?). And that is with using high speed wifi internet in my house! Needless to say, we stopped watching bedtime youtubes on the kindle hd and only watch them on my cell phone.  But, the size, apps, and convenience is great. General websurfing and email is pretty much the only reason i purchased this device. Overall, I am very happy with the purchase. Glad I didn't spend several hundred more for an ipad. If Amazon keeps their technology advancing and competitive, I will continue to be a customer.5 stars because it delivered exactly what I expected and its a good value for what I paid. If I expected crystal clear youtube videos ( which I didn't ), I would have paid 3 times as much or more for apple or some other top shelf brand.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I bought the larger kindle fire hd for my wife and she loves the quality of the graphics. The kindle is set-up to the user with apps and other information on the home page. The size is just large enough to view but also allows it to be carried in a purse. Great buy would recommend it for the family.

Reviews.Title: Rapid download
Reviews.Author: Kay Parlapiano
Reviews.Content: I can download books at a very rapid rate. Actually, it's amazing how fast books are downloaded. I love it

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: jt04320
Reviews.Content: I'm an Apple lover.. However, I can honestly say that I enjoy the Kindle Fire with 8.9" display a little better than the newest generation of iPad. Let's be real, if you own an iPhone, you basically have an iPad. The picture quality of the Kindle Fire is undeniable and in stunning HD. The sound quality on the Kindle is outstanding! It is absolutely perfect for Netflix, Hulu+, or audio books. The tablet is quick and and easy to use. I'm currently still figuring out things here and there. All-in-all, it is a recommended purchase that I think everyone would enjoy. The price cannot be beat! You're getting a lot for you money. I highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great!Love It!
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: The only thing I would warn other customers about is the camera is front-facing.Otherwise,if that's not a deal-breaker,it's a great tablet.It actually does more than I originally thought.More like a laptop/notebook than a reader.And I originally owned a 7" Fire wi-fi edition before this purchase.I thought that was a terrific product.I use the new 9" Fire HD for just about everything.Only use laptop about once every 2 weeks out of necessity due to personal & business programming on laptop.This is a great product.You don't have to be a reader to appreciate it's various uses.

Reviews.Title: I didn't think it could get better than the Kindle Fire, but it did!
Reviews.Author: A mom who like educational toys "Stacie"
Reviews.Content: I didn't think I'd like a Kindle.... because there is something about holding a book in your hand and turning the pages.  However, when the Kindle Fire (with the backlit feature) came out, I thought I'd give it a try.  I've now purchased several... for myself, my kids, and my parents.  IKindle Fire in general:  It's so nice to be able to read in bed with the lights out, buy a book at 10 pm, and not have stacks of books sitting around cluttering up my shelf.  I love listening to the music as I lay in bed with my preschooler.  And it's just handy to have everything.... games, apps, books, music, etc. in one place.Kindle Fire HD 8.9:  This is the best one yet!  I didn't think I would like the bigger size, but I do.  And it's got numerous additional features over the Kindle Fire... including easier online access and my favorite, Kindle Free Time for my preschooler, which allows you to set limits on videos, apps, and general play and provides a ton of content for my 4 year old in a controlled environment.  It is beyond great!  Really really love it and would highly recommend this product to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for readers
Reviews.Author: Jon Anda
Reviews.Content: I have had all generations of the iPad (including most recently the Retina, which I just gave to my wife).  I switched to the Kindle Fire 8.9 HD because of the way magazines and newspapers are formatted (i.e. clear index and perfect reading layout of each article), the ease of emailing in PDFs and then reading them in Kindle or the Adobe App (where they automatically show up), and the ability to easily hold the 8.9 in one hand without a case.  If you have a laptop and an iPhone as I do, the new Kindle 8.9 is a perfect in between for users who read a lot.  And if you want some tunes while you are reading, Amazon's music product is pretty good (not to mention plenty of storage options for those who want some movies or TV handy for plane rides).Since I plan on sticking with the Kindle 8.9 platform for a long time, I do look forward to a few improvements on version 2.0.  First, I think the processor is a touch slow, especially using the Silk browser - version 2.0 should make Silk feel "quick".  Second, I wish Amazon had MOG quality downloads available for music (or even the MOG app available).  Over time, Amazon certainly wants to be a leading seller of music/streaming and, after listening to hi-quality MOG or Apple Lossless, the Kindle 8.9 tunes sound a bit lame.  Lastly, while I love the Kindle reading products, there is less you can do with an article than on iPad - Kindle needs more tools to forward, post, copy, and highlight.  Sure some of these are available for some products (like highlighting in Kindle books, for example) but the Newsstand offers almost nothing (you can't even save articles anywhere).So it's a great reading device - great enough to make me swap out an iPad Retina - but it's my guess/hope that v 2.0 will be the ultimate (for me anyway).

Reviews.Title: Like it
Reviews.Author: Barbara J. Hayes
Reviews.Content: I like  the kindle fire HD 8.9.  I just wish it had flash player and the Google app store.  also an instruction book instead of it being on the kindle.  When you are trying to do something you cant read it and do it at the same time.

Reviews.Title: A real winner!
Reviews.Author: David W Soelter
Reviews.Content: After buying my wife an 8.9" Fire for Christmas, I decided I had to have one also.  This pad has everything you would want in a format that's easy to work with.  The scroll that features the items you are currently working with is a unique feature.  All in all, this is a great value.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Nancy Larsen
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle.  There isn't anything I don't like about it.  The size makes it a little easier for me to watch my movies or ready my books.

Reviews.Title: I'm in love!
Reviews.Author: J. Foster
Reviews.Content: I love this Kindle!  I upgraded from the keypad kindle, and was concerned because this is backlit and the book organization isn't so great.  It won't replace my older Kindle for outdoor reading, BUT it is a great device for travel and might replace my bulky laptop because the keyboard I bought to go with this turns it into an editing and writing machine.

Reviews.Title: Nice addition to lap top and desk top computers.
Reviews.Author: Robin Talley
Reviews.Content: Love the android apps and Kindle apps. Enjoy reading my newspaper on the Fire and favorite magazines and books. Seamless facebook app goes smoothly to external links. Facebook app has a few kinks, such as inability to "like" others comments, but not enough to reduce my rating.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet/e-reader for the price
Reviews.Author: Marc Buy
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kindle Fire because I was looking specifically for something to use as a reading device, but I wanted something with a larger color screen since I wanted to use it for comics and graphic novels.  The apps and Internet accessibility were nice features, but mainly I wanted something with a nice screen for a cheap price.  The Kindle is easily the best large screen color tablet when price is factored in.  I will offer one slight complaint that I notice some lag when switching apps, or loading content, but it's not a big deal, and again I can't complain when considering the price.  But it's worth considering, especially when devices like the iPad seem to offer a bit speedier response -- but then again, they are more than double the price.

Reviews.Title: Love it Love it Love it
Reviews.Author: Susan Marshall
Reviews.Content: What can I say, I'm a Kindle fan.  Someone tried to convince me to buy a Nook but I just couldn't bring myself to do it.  This is my third and I will never own anything else.  he HD screen is crystal clear and the download speed rivals my laptop.  How can you beat the price for such a great product?  You can't beat Amazon customer service either.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: vera witt
Reviews.Content: Since my hands have gotten to weak to hold the heavy books required to cover the desired subjects, the Kindle is  an invasluable tool, and when  placed on the stand, makes reading a relaxing pleasure.

Reviews.Title: The Kindle is a great gift!
Reviews.Author: Ed
Reviews.Content: I bought this Kindle for my wife as a gift and she loves it.  It's very user friendly, the sound is amazing, and the display is fantastic.  For all the naysayers about the Kindle, please do not compare this product to the iPad.  I agree that the apps are more limited and it may not have some of the same functions, but that is mostly due to the fact that the iPad is different and also that it has been in the market for longer.  For those of you who want to give a gift from which a someone can read email, do some basic web surfing, read documents, watch videos, and play games without breaking the bank (watch out for the cost of accessories) then the Kindle is for you!

Reviews.Title: Wow... a capable tablet at a reasonable price.
Reviews.Author: T. Powell
Reviews.Content: I have been switching to e-books for a while now, and an accident destroyed my 2G Kindle.  So, I needed something to replace it.  I looked at all sorts of tablets (iPad, Surface, ATIV, Galaxy) and they all seemed great but more than I wanted to spend.  After all, I wasn't trying to replace my notebook, just find a replacement for my Kindle.  I settled for the Kindle Fire HD 8.9.I'm impressed.  Ok, so I had to figure out how to use the thing and I'm still doing that.  But this makes a great replacement for the 2G kindle and then some.Having touch makes it so that I am not just limited to paging forward or backward - perhaps this is becoming a genuine student tablet... I wonder.My only "issue" with this tablet is that while it is an Android device (underneath the skin, anyway) it is hard to get apps from sources other than Amazon.  Amazon has a large line-up of apps, but it doesn't have as many as Google Play.

Reviews.Title: Great option to other more expensive pads.
Reviews.Author: Mark Berry
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle 8.9.  Much larger screen makes everything easier to see and apps are much better to see.  I like being able to access different sites that I can't on my phone.  Great alternative to other pads.

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: xxx
Reviews.Content: I don't need the most and the latest apps.  Want to do my email, Skype, read some, watch some video.  Looking for basics and quality construction.  I does everything I wanted it to do and probably more.  Screen images very good.  Not a replacement for basic kindle as battery doesn't allow long term use without recharging and heavy to hold for extended times.

Reviews.Title: Love my kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Kerrie Creswell
Reviews.Content: I use my kindle fire all the time. It's not only for reading, but I do use it for that quite a bit and enjoy the ease of use. My books are displayed easily for me to choose which one I want. The downloads happen quickly and the Amazon one click purchase makes buying new ebooks very easy.There are a lot of free apps availabe and often free or discounted books. I play a lot of the free games on my kindle. the picture and response time is great. It is also great for surfing the net. I have wireless at home and it connects easily and is very responsive. The picture on the Kindle Fire HD is absolutely wonderful. The only downfall would be the glare from the screen, but that hasn't been a huge issue for me. I haven't used it outside in the sun yet,but they do make antiglare screen protectors.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire Sufficient
Reviews.Author: BockLuver
Reviews.Content: Overall the Kindle Fire HD is a good tablet but might be more suited for teenagers or kids.  I wanted to use this as a back-up for work but it just doesn't meet my needs from an app or processing standpoint.  Plus, maybe it's just me, but it gets locked up fairly often and then restarts.  I've lost some work this way.If you have the funds and are okay with monthly fee get the version that has 4G.Pros:Easy to useOf course great for Amazon PrimeGreat for movies, reading and musicDisplay is great (sound is above average)Cons:Lack of apps common to AndroidSilk and Email frequently lock upNo way to organize apps differently (groups, categories, etc.)You can quickly tell if it is sleeping versus offNo charging indicator light

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: LaVonne Labat "Vonnie L"
Reviews.Content: This little machine is amazing.  I can't believe that this Kindle can do so many things in just a small package.  The technology is amazing.  The screen is just the right size for me as I am getting older and a smaller screen would be harder to see.  I am so glad I purchased this instead of a laptop.  It is so easy to carry in my purse or use anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Best deal and product for the price
Reviews.Author: Herbdoc
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD was on sale and a buy at $100.00 off, plus the $49.99 for a year of oniine service with AT&T; made it a must have.  The clarity and precision of the screen and the intuitive functioning made buying the "Handbook" redundant. I spend hours on mine daily.

Reviews.Title: best ever
Reviews.Author: LISA STROUD
Reviews.Content: Love the product. Have issues using Facebook sometimes and there are some games you can't download cause it won't support them.  Had to send first on back because it completely froze up and they replaced with second on, no problems yet. Yes I would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Very Simple to operate
Reviews.Author: richard mayo
Reviews.Content: I am 81 years old, and my grandson connected it to wi-fi for me and I check the market, news,email, I love it!

Reviews.Title: Great screen size and quality
Reviews.Author: M. L. "Mavery Little"
Reviews.Content: For the price I am pretty content with my 8.9" Kindle Fire.  Having trouble convincing my 3 year old that the big kindle is mine and the 7" is his.I am really frustrated by the internet capabilites of this tablet.  It seems to pull up every MOBILE homepage when I think I should be able to view the actual webpage if I'm looking for yahoo or facebook.  Even just putting [...], and the kindle's browser automatically adds the m for mobile version.  I HATE the mobile facebook page as the links/pictures are not entirely viewable and I have to click on some individually to see it.  Who has time for that crap?  There is an app for that called Facebook Free or you can pay a buck for the Facebook Pro, but that app sucks because there is no browser to manipulate and the free version refuses to go "back".  I tried to get back to my newsfeed after reading a linked article and it just kept loading the article over and over.  So far that sucks about the kindle.But otherwise I like it.

Reviews.Title: Use it everyday
Reviews.Author: Gregory Cowling
Reviews.Content: I am actually Greg's spouse.  I do use my Kindle everyday.  Greg bought himself one after playing with mine and he uses his daily. I have enjoyed reading with my Kindle but I find there are too many distractions loaded on it now. So I play too many games, check too many websites,... I would give this kindle a 5 star rating except that I like to read outside and, although I can do that, there is too much glare.  So, I have ordered an e-ink kindle for the reading. If you mainly want to read,go for the e-ink. If you want music and movies this is the device to get. The sound and the picture quality are remarkable.

Reviews.Title: Overall a great product
Reviews.Author: Donald N. Arsenault "dna77"
Reviews.Content: I have been quite happy so far with the 8.9 HD.  It is a little heavy but not enough to make me stop using it.  The 4g lite available from ATT make this a complete machine.The access to the volumne button is difficult to use.I am still having trouble "FINDING" items I have transfered or downloaded.  An access to the directory tree would make usage easier.Being a new product there is still a slight app shortage or usability with some better known apps.  I am sure that will change as time goes on.The fact that the HD does everything in a small machine out ways all of these slight inconveniences and I would recommend this purchase to anyone looking for a complete portable tablet.

Reviews.Title: Struggled making the decision but absolutely NO buyer's remose!!!!
Reviews.Author: The Least of These "Repent and Believe!"
Reviews.Content: I have an old Kindle that has served me well. When I was trying to decide on what to upgrade to, I looked at everything from MS Surface to Nook to the new Kindle. I got the Kindle and I am pleased with my decision. It took me literally less than 10 minutes to open the box, set up the Kindle, and get connected to my home Wi-Fi network. The Kindle upgraded itself and all my books, videos, music, etc where instantly "there!"  The screen is amazing and really makes reading a breeze and a pleasure. I had Lasick surgery done on my eyes years ago and have been wearing "readers" (glasses) when I read. The new Kindle with its improved size, display, and other enhancements (love the yellow highlighting!) have eliminated the need to wear my glasses and again, reading (and I read A LOT!) is a pleasure.Buy the Kindle. The ability to surf the Web, get your emails, shop online, etc. are just BIG pluses!!

Reviews.Title: Worth every penny
Reviews.Author: Dan Hennessey "ktndawg"
Reviews.Content: This is such a nice product; was tempted to spend the extra for the iPad, but I am happy with this product. Form, fit and function follow through is first-rate. Nearly have it replacing my laptop for most of my uses; already makes my first gen Kindle reader seem like a Dick and Jane primer; no comparison.I would have liked the interfacing with "alien" programs (i.e. Google) be FAR more seamless, but it is what it is...Very happy with my FIRE functions and portability, especially for movies. Sound and picture are fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Never thought I would love this so much!
Reviews.Author: Debbie 1
Reviews.Content: I love to read but I love actually holding one in my hands. I love the feel and smell of them and love old libraries. My husband loves tech stuff so even though I told him that I didn't want one, he bought it for me anyway.I think it took me about two weeks and now I am hooked completely! I knew that I just didn't have the room for many more books but I couldn't imagine not having all of my favorite author's new books. Well,even though it's not exactly the same,I not only have their books but have found so many new authors that I probably would not ever have heard of now.I also love all of the free books and many of the apps as well! I am so glad that he bought this for me. I still have a great many things to learn but I am enjoying it more than I would ever have imagined. Thanks Amazon for a quality product and keep making it easier to use. You should also include a manual with it as well.

Reviews.Title: Dislike the battery charging set up.
Reviews.Author: Torri Cable "Torri"
Reviews.Content: Just got my new Kindle Fire and can't wait for it to charge, but why, oh why does the plug in cost extra and the usb charger takes so long.  I think it's mean to not include a wall plug in.  What if some poor soul doesn't have a computer, (unlikely, but it could happen) how are they supposed to charge their brand new toy?  If this was about my old Kindle it would rate 5 stars, and maybe this one will in time- but I'll always think it's very poor service to not include the plug in and mean to not have that noted so old timers like me would have the chance to remedy the situation at purchase time.

Reviews.Title: GREAT BARGAIN FOR HALF THE PRICE OF AN IPAD
Reviews.Author: The Queen of Bean Station
Reviews.Content: I've owned Kindles since the first generation.  I sold my first Kindle on Craig's List when I bought the second generation about 6 months later.  I still have the second generation and bought the Kindle Fire when it first came out, mostly because it was in color and was like a mini tablet.  I love the Kindle Fire and just recently purchased the Fire HD 32 GB dual-band WiFi version when my husband said he "wanted a Kindle Tablet" to replace his Sony Book Reader (which is NOT user-friendly at all, requiring you to purchase books on-line, download them to your computer and then sync the reader to the computer....which causes duplicates of the same books every time you sync to download a new book).  I tried to talk my husband into buying a Kindle instead of the Sony Book Reader but he let someone he worked with influence him because they had one, and mostly because at the time the first Kindle had the little buttons for the keyboard and he didn't like the look of that as it was distracting and he liked the concept of just swiping your finger across the screen to turn the pages (on the Sony), which was not available on the first or second generation kindles.Now he uses his Fire HD all the time, sometimes even in the morning to read the newspaper instead of booting up his laptop (again a Sony Vaio which he's even more disappointed in).  He's even using the Fire HD for all his email and recently figured out how to transfer photos from the computer to the Fire HD.  Not everybody can afford the IPads and the Fire HD and buying books from Amazon is sooooo simple!

Reviews.Title: Slam Dunk
Reviews.Author: Foolhardy "A fool and his money..."
Reviews.Content: Full integration with Audible, Amazon Video, and Amazon MP3.  I've been a loyal Audible customer for years and was ecstatic when Amazon took over Audible.  Audible was great to begin with, but Amazon's dedication to customer service is without equal.  When I connected my new Kindle Fire HD to WiFi and discovered that every audiobook, video, and MP3 I have ever purchased was at my fingertips....  I'll just say it was more than I expected from the device I purchased to read books with.Of course, the books are all there as well.  The new Kindle Fire HD is the perfect size for reading--think trade paperback.  It includes several dictionaries in addition to the Oxford Dictionary of English; Spanish, French, German, Italian, etc.  Great product, Amazon, thanks.

Reviews.Title: recommend
Reviews.Author: Deeanne Agozzino
Reviews.Content: Asolutely terrific...better than other products on the market! Would recommend this to everyone.Easy to upoad movies, songs, games etc. Love it!

Reviews.Title: A Tip
Reviews.Author: Inez
Reviews.Content: The one feature that I wish the Kindle had was a LED light to indicate when the device was charging.If Amazon could include that in the next round of updates, that would be great.

Reviews.Title: Surprising number of different uses even for those with disabilities
Reviews.Author: B. J. Barney III "Wheelzup"
Reviews.Content: I was hesitant about this Kindle Fire HD at first but now that I have it I'm quite happy. Being disabled from a spinal cord injury that left me with little use of my hands I wasn't sure if I'd be able to take advantage of its touch features for navigating around it. I took a chance and purchased a stylus so that I could wind it between my fingers much the same way I hold a pen to write and it works quite well for me. I can read, surf the web some and even play a few games. I ended up getting the 32 GB model just to be sure I had plenty of storage space for some of the apps I chose to get.The display is beautiful and streaming movies and videos on it is just icing on the cake. Reading text-books for school is a breeze compared to my original Kindle saving me plenty of room on my desk and not having to fumble around in a book trying to find the information I needed. All in all it does the job and then some. If I had to choose the best thing about it I'd have to say its size. It is smaller and lighter than most laptop computers I have used yet it is still large enough it's easy to read and carry around. It's not a tablet PC but there again I really didn't need one at this time. In a few months that may change but for now it does what I need it to do.

Reviews.Title: Best thing Ever!
Reviews.Author: Sabine Singh
Reviews.Content: love my kindle, so glad I got this larger one, games are a joy as is reading and everything else! Had it one month so far and have had no glitches/problems........my only suggestion is that it should include a start up booklet.....this is my first tablet,,,,,but a booklet showing start-up basics would have been helpful......I love the graphics, colors are so sharp enjoy playing angry birds, impressed with all the free apps that are available......

Reviews.Title: I love this thing!
Reviews.Author: FloB
Reviews.Content: I was resistant as I love my plain Jane Kindle - this opened up a new world.  If I can't do it on the Kindle I prob won't do it

Reviews.Title: Great investment
Reviews.Author: Sister Ruth Fishburn
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD  8,9 does everything I wanted it to do and even more than I had hoped. Am enjoying it tremendously.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Tiffany P.
Reviews.Content: My son loves this device, he can carry the kindle wherever he goes.When I download a book for him from the Internet, it sends the book quickly to the kindle.  The camera is great, audio is good, too.  In general, everything is exactly what I need.  Great!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9 --  Great !!
Reviews.Author: S. Longenbohn "Gkar42"
Reviews.Content: This is a really cool product.I have a Nook color (which is not a tablet) and have used it so much that I've worn out the original cover I purchased.Yet I needed a tablet.I won an Apple IPad and have been playing with that, but all my equipment is not Apple and the integration is a big issue.So I bought the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 and I LOVE IT.It lets me do all the same things the apple product does, and from my PC, I can put music, picutres, books, movies etc etc onto the Kindle (which I could not do with the IPad.)I really like the integration of the applications. tap a link in an email and the browser opens automatically. I had to work harder to accomplish that on the Nook.  But that is also comparing two different types of products witch is a little unfair.In any event, I will be using the Kindle for all my contact stuff from here on.

Reviews.Title: My Valentines Gift to me
Reviews.Author: Deborah Bilinski
Reviews.Content: Great picture. Love the size.  Enjoying THE CLOSER, now on the last episode of season 2.  Have not used it for reading yet.

Reviews.Title: My favorite thing!
Reviews.Author: D. M. R. "books please!"
Reviews.Content: I have wanted some kind of tablet for a long time, really wanted a touch screen, new toy.  First I tried a less expensive table. It was great for games but "horrible" for surfing the web. Now use it for the young grandchildren to play with. I have an old Kindle which I used all the time. So, as reading is really my passion, I decided on the Kindle Fire HD. Best of both worlds as far as I am concerned. I love it! It's easy to use, beautiful color, fast. I love Amazon One Click shopping, been using that for years. I love reading and listening to music at the same time to cut out the noise in the house, car or airplane. I use the Kindle for reading, music, email Facebook, surfing the web,games. I love the cover that wakes up the  Kindle and puts it to sleep. I've had only good experiences, nothing negative. As I said "My favorite thing"!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: drhorning
Reviews.Content: I can't be happier with this kindle I love the big screen for watching movies playing games reading books. I haven't had any performance issues. Battery life is decent I'm not on it all day long or any thing do I charge it once ever couple days.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Yvonne Sinclair
Reviews.Content: I love, love, love it. I bring it everywhere to read. Books, check emails, read newspaper, play games, surf web.  For the comparatively lower price, A GREAT BUY.  The only thing I miss is a rear camera which would be nice to take pictures and make videos.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for my purposes
Reviews.Author: William H. Rhoden
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD 8.9" is all that I hoped it would be. For the price, it is a great tablet. I am primarily using it for e-mail and Kindle book reading.  The audio is outstanding also.

Reviews.Title: A Birthday Present
Reviews.Author: L David
Reviews.Content: My granddaughter wanted a i pad for her birthday I told her in investigate between a Kindle Fire HD 8.9" and an i pad.  She found the Kindle a better buy more to do on it so that is what we bought her. Now I want one too.

Reviews.Title: Me And My Kindle
Reviews.Author: MaxJ
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kindle Fire HD because I liked the old Kindle with Wi-Fi and this one offered so many more uses.  The games, movies sound guality, everything advertised on this site really.  I also wanted to see what all the rage over Angry Birds was about plus itallowed my niece and nephews a chance to become familiar with this device.My biggest reason for buying a Kindle was the number of books it can hold.  I am an avid reader and will not let go of my books for love or money and as a reslut, I have a room full of books.  The Kindle allows me to continue my collection but with an ideal storage solution.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: Joyce Franklin
Reviews.Content: Kindle Fire HD 8.9 has met all my expectations.  Love the product I am able to do everything I need to do on one device!!

Reviews.Title: Love, Love Fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: Olevet "I do love to read on my Kindle Fire, ...
Reviews.Content: So much faster than 1st edition fire!, So much more vivid! Great for video's and movies.Love it!!! Self teaching, and uncomplicated. Recieved as a b-day gift yesterday, still learning.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Denise Wullner
Reviews.Content: I was debating between this and the ipad..decided to go with the kindle fire because of the price and it seemed to do everything I wanted the ipad for...so far I have been very pleased with it.  There are numerous apps available for use on here and all of the ones I wanted are there.  Highly recommend!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Jerry in Carolina
Reviews.Content: Still finding neat things about this tablet after a few weeks of ownership.  Beautiful screen resolution and clarity.  Looks almost like 3-D.  Enjoy all the books and mags that are available for use along with the free videos if you are a Prime Member.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Tablet
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: Didn't care for 7" model but love this one. I own Ipad, Xoom Samsung Galaxy and this. Of all the tablets, this one has the best on board speaker system by a mile.  The color is comparable to an Ipad.  Ease of use isn't quite there yet but only a minor complaint and I highly recommend this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Wife Loves It
Reviews.Author: Bolo
Reviews.Content: Never had an ipad so I cant compare to that but my wife loves the Kindle Fire HD 8.9. Bought it as a Christmas gift and she uses it daily for e-mail, shopping, browsing the web etc. Some people complained in their reviews they needed more apps or other functions but the Kindle Fire does everything my wife needs it to do and more. For the casual user this is great and cost a lot less than an ipad.

Reviews.Title: Love my new Kendle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: DJGlasgow
Reviews.Content: Just received the Kendle Fire HD 8.9 and so far so good, really love the larger screen and ease of use.

Reviews.Title: Really great
Reviews.Author: Harold Carvajal
Reviews.Content: I love it..it has all I need for a tablet, love the size and everything about, I will recommend it anytime.

Reviews.Title: Exceeds my expectations
Reviews.Author: Walter "Walterplus"
Reviews.Content: Love my new device, not too heavy and reasonably fast for surfing the web. Love it for reading it`s a joy to use.

Reviews.Author: Laci Ledbetter
Reviews.Content: I'm in love!  The only complaint I have is that I was under the impression that it would come with a wall charger and now that it is dead I realize that it's something that I need to buy separately.  Be warned that the USB cord attached to a computer does not charge sufficiently. If you order this, go ahead and order a wall adapter. I do LOVE it though!!  I'll just have to love it again in 3-5 days when my charger gets here. :(

Reviews.Title: Fire HD 8.9 16GB
Reviews.Author: Janie D
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying my 8.9 Fire HD.  I like having the larger screen.  I like how it provides alternatives re apps and books.  I like the Xray on books you are reading.  I love the audio - it is not so monotone like the 1st Kindle Fire  I look forward to using more of the funcitions, I still need to set up my email.  Also, Love that camera.  Right now I am mainly reading books and utilizing some of my apps. I use my 1st Kindle fire when the HD needs to be charged.  I still use the Kindle keyboard for reading books, can't beat the battery life.

Reviews.Title: Good but not perfect
Reviews.Author: Doug Buirley
Reviews.Content: I bought the kindle fire HD so I can read some books at home, away from the PC, It has a great screen and has an over all nice package. Would have given it a full 5 stars, but the device is incompatible with a title I bought to read. This is unacceptable for Amazon's top of the line Kindle. It should be able to display every title available in the store. I do hope this is rectified soon.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product with a few complaints
Reviews.Author: John B. Sinclair
Reviews.Content: Overall, I have been very pleased with this product. The graphics are excellent. It is relatively intuitive to use, even for a dinosaur such as myself. I enjoyed reading my first novel on the Kindle, although for humongous novels and nonfiction I am likely to stick with hard cover versions due to easier ability to flip back and forth and all around as I choose. Battery strength is great. I use it mostly to read newspaper and other websites. It is very handy to be able to sit outdoors and surf the web with Wi-Fi. I am glad I got the larger size and 4G service when I am out of Wi-Fi range. I now carry it with me every day. Two complaints. I had to return the first Kindle I received due to its inability to receive e-mails on my 3 accounts. The second Kindle is much better though it can be hinky at times at receiving and opening e-mails; it is especially important to trash deleted e-mails to prevent clogging of e-mails. Unlike my mobile phone, I also sometimes get the dreaded "too many tabs open" message on my Kindle when going several pages into a website. This needs to be fixed. But count me in as someone very pleased with my first tablet.

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: G. Pittman
Reviews.Content: My daughter has the first kindle and decided to go this route since I am not a fan of the the ipad.  I love it!!  It does the job and hardly use my laptop anymore.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price but some quirks
Reviews.Author: elizabeth
Reviews.Content: Kindle Fire is great for the price but some functionality issues are annoying. I got this for school readings but quickly found out the file management system is nonexistent and you have to plug it into your laptop to organize your files. Apps to do this exist, but they come with disclaimers and make me uncomfortable that I may accidentally wipe the whole thing. The Amazon app store is also incredibly disappointing.Overall though it's pretty nice if you're going to focus on movies and books.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: joseph eschmann
Reviews.Content: I purchased it mostly for reading books but I really like the ease of use. My daughter  has an ipad and this does pretty much everything the ipad does at half the cost.  I did not get the 4G one and may wish I did in the future for traveling etc... After installing your games,books,videos wifi is only needed for web surfing anyway. I bought 2 of these-1 for my Mom's birthday present.

Reviews.Title: very good product!
Reviews.Author: Isaac Michel
Reviews.Content: This is a good acquisition and it's wonderful to have it. At first I did not know how to change the font to make it bigger. After I discover how to do it I'm so thrilled with my kindle.

Reviews.Title: I had very pleasent dealing with amazon. I am always interested in shoping with amazon. Thanks for your support. Williams.
Reviews.Author: Rajayan Williams
Reviews.Content: I had very pleasent dealing with amazon. I am always interested in shoping with amazon. Thanks for your support. Williams.

Reviews.Title: Better than ipad
Reviews.Author: waynesworld
Reviews.Content: I had the ipad 3 before i bought the this kindle fire and i think the kindle fire is better.  I am not a big app person, so didnt mind that the amount of apps to choose from wasnt as much as an ipad.  The back of the kindle gives a better grip than the ipad, easier to read on the kindle and hold cuz its a little smaller, sound quality is 100x better than the ipad.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: FroyoShark
Reviews.Content: I've played with a few tablets before, including a Motorola Xoom, iPad 2, and the original Kindle Fire. This blows all of them out of the water in my opinion. Excellent piece of hardware, and at an amazing price. It's missing some features, but you get what you pay for. Amazon's OS is pretty bad, but that can be fixed by rooting.Pros:-Great screen-Good performance-Great batter life-InexpensiveCons:-Lacking features such as a rear facing camera and expandable storage-OS is pretty bad

Reviews.Title: Excellent product, worth the cost
Reviews.Author: Skeptic
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet.  I'm very pleased with it in every way.  I chose this because I'm an extensive Amazon user and this is tied in well.  Other tablets I've tried are equally fine but are tied into other support systems (like the big app choice on Apple), which would be preferred by different people.  Whichever way you go, if you can afford it, definitely buy a high end model.  Add more memory if you carry a lot of media, especially videos.

Reviews.Title: I bought this mainly fir the free time app for my granddaughter.
Reviews.Author: Desiree Knott
Reviews.Content: Great resolution. Intuitive. I love it. my granddaughter uses the Fee Time app. It lets her safely explore with age appropriate content.I live the way the email client looks and its ease of use.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: marsha wallace
Reviews.Content: this is my second Kindle ( still use my touch extensively) but I love that I can use this instead of a computer..it is easy to use, once you read some instructions and it works great with my Wi-Fi..

Reviews.Title: GREAT!
Reviews.Author: Kelsey Marquez
Reviews.Content: I wanted a bigger tablet and since I couldn't afford the $500 Samsung Note, I decided to go with this Kindle.  It really helps with books because since I needed 12 books this years I wanted to get something that would let me get books cheaper. It works wonderfully for almost all I want to do!d

Reviews.Title: WE have one and are getting another
Reviews.Author: Mary V. King "happy listener"
Reviews.Content: My daughter researched the Nook and the Kindle, sadly, (maybe not) she picked the Nook. But after having it, she realized that she saw that the Kindle would suit her needs more....During this time, they came out with the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 and she was sold on that and had to have it.... SO..... Now I want one and mine is on its way.  I am counting on it to have my lectures on audio for school.  It will be so much easier to plug into it and listen to my hearts content and location doesn't really matter!

Reviews.Title: Great eye saver for reading
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: The audio option added so much more to the book which allows both reading and audio reader by author expect to use audio all the time.

Reviews.Title: Use it every day.
Reviews.Author: Nedra Ann Schott
Reviews.Content: People told me I would love it but I doubted that since I don't read a lot.  However, I've used it every day to watch past TV shows or shop or check email......Sure am glad I let my friends influence me.And - for those of us who aren't as techno-savy as some of the younger generation the customer service help desk is very helpful and polite.

Reviews.Title: My 3rd Kindle
Reviews.Author: alva
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Kindle product I have purchased.  We are a family of Kindlers!  I wouldn't buy anything else.  You cannot beat the product or the price.

Reviews.Title: Loving It
Reviews.Author: frederick
Reviews.Content: So far I am digging this product. Unfortunately I bought it for my wife so I don't get to play with it much, but I still love it!

Reviews.Title: Great video, easy reading
Reviews.Author: Try Out "Go-to girl"
Reviews.Content: This delivery system provides great video streaming, easy reading experience with X-ray, which I love. I can't see a downside.

Reviews.Title: Loving my new Kindle Fire HD 8.9"!
Reviews.Author: Susan T. Kemp
Reviews.Content: I had a small kindle fire, and just decided to go with the large one...it is a great piece of work!  Excellent for streaming with the larger screen...excellent sound, graphics, and as usual, it syncs right up with my Amazon Prime account...no muss, no fuss.  Why pay $200 more for other tablets?  I bought two of them, and my boyfriend loves to play games on his...it's a win, win...

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Saundra McGinnis
Reviews.Content: Bought for husband, he loves it.  He is not really a techie, but took to it well and learning fast.  Fits his large hands well.  Uses daily, for reading news, watching Netflix, playing games, etc.  Not a cheap toy, wanted to protect it and make it last, so purchased Marware Vibe Standing Case for it too to protect it, fit well.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Tomw
Reviews.Content: I chose the Kindle Fire at recommendation of a friend.Only problem I had was trying to download a book while at a motel, but that may have been my fault as I am new to the Kindle. At home I downloaded a book to laptop then transferred to the Kindle. Have not tried doing this with desktop that I am running Linux Ubuntu on.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic product and well priced.
Reviews.Author: L. Coolsen "masonsapron"
Reviews.Content: As good as the IPad for my needs although a little smaller.  It's a bit heavy to hold and the accessories are too expensive. The battery life is only a few hours.  The shipping/ease of order at Amazon is always so good  But i wouldn't be without the Kindle Fire HD now.  Great deal.

Reviews.Title: Best Fire Ever!
Reviews.Author: angelicsight
Reviews.Content: I bought this for school and to update my kindle keyboard.  I love the sound, picture, and the ease of searching the web and checking in on facebook.  I would recommend this over every tablet out there.

Reviews.Title: Love Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Naushad
Reviews.Content: It just works really, really well. My main reason for getting a new device would be e-books and videos. For media consumption, the Kindle Fire HD just rocks. With Prime, you get 1 book a month free to "borrow." I can also download e-books from my local library.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Image, great sound quality, peppy performance and responsive touch screen!
Reviews.Author: Bayou Reader
Reviews.Content: I bought my wife a 7" Kindle Fire HD for her birthday. After playing with the unit, I found myself impressed with the image quality, Dolby sound, peppy performance and great touch screen responsiveness. You guessed it, I had to buy one! The 8.9" unit is just as great as the 7" version, only Bigger! Same excellent quality, peppy performance and touch screen responsiveness!I am extremely pleased with both of our Kindle Fire HD's!

Reviews.Title: New Toy
Reviews.Author: Cynthia
Reviews.Content: OMG!! do i love this, if your like me and cant figure anything out, well the easy instructions on the amazon web page will help walk you through everything, im up and moveing quickly thanks to that.Love this so muchhhhh

Reviews.Title: Beat My Expectations
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I just received this three days ago, so I'm giving an early review.  I have been wanting a tablet, namely an Ipad for a long time now but just could never justify or get a good feeling about the cost, I have the money, just could never get a warm fuzzy feeling about spending the amount that Apple requires to carry their products around.After quite a few hours of research, I settled on the Kindle Fire HD 8.9.  When it arrived, it was almost alll the way charged, configuration with my wireless and Amazon account was extremely easy and I was quickly on my way to "playing" on it.I've read a lot of reviews that talk about the lack of apps, but all the heavy  hitters are there.
