Facebook, Netflix, Pinterest, more than enough weather apps, Allrecipies, MyFitnessPal, all the latest games...........other than my personal bank or local television station, I can't really think of anything else that I would like that I'm missing.I'm not a gadget guru, but I have used a couple others and while it affects nothing of my  Kindle experience, I do see where the Kindle does not scroll as beautifully as the Ipad, page turning in the books is not as cool as Nook's actual page turning when I touch the screen, but again, these are very small insignificant things.I spent the better part of the weekend learning my new gadget and I'm in love with it.  The Silk browser is fast,  I can bookmark my webpages that I like to frequent for easier access.  I read the better part of a book and really enjoyed the Sephia option of page color, white seemed a little bright.  I watched a couple episodes of a TV show on NetFlix, my husband watched an AmazonPrime movie and we both surfed the net and played games on it all weekend.  Everything I needed in a tablet is there and the fact that it's half the price of what I've been wanting makes me feel even better about my purchase!!I would certainly recommend this to anyone not wanting to spend a lot when it's only going to be used for entertainment.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Gary Powell
Reviews.Content: My first step into the 21st century, and what a great one it is.  I was skeptical if I would like this, but the quality and clarity of this device is outstanding.  I particularly like the easy readability of the 8.9 screen.  This is a great value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet for Amazon Content.
Reviews.Author: Julian Mathias
Reviews.Content: My first impression of the Kindle fire HD was pleasant. The built quality looks and feels good and the device has a nice rubberized back that feels good in the hand. The user interface and functionality of the Kindle uses an Amazon software overlay, but the user experience feels very android-like once apps are installed.I noticed that PDF's and PPT files lag a little on the device. Sometimes I have to touch the screen multiple times to get the home button to appear in order to exit the PDF viewing program. Most other apps have run well with little hiccups.My only true complaint is that my screen has dead pixels. For most people a dead pixel is unnoticeable, but it is annoying for users who view a lot of PDF's or read books with a white background. I constantly find myself wiping the screen trying to get rid of speck. I called Amazon and was sent a replacement Kindle which also contained a dead pixel, this time in the center of the screen. Most companies allow a certain number of LCD display defects to pass through inspection since LCD's are an expensive component to replace. With the Kindle priced so attractively I understand that quality control would be set with tolerances that allowed for small variations that most consumers wouldn't notice or be concerned with.In short, I like the device. I think it's great addition to add to the Amazon ecosystem, especially if you purchase a lot of content through Amazon. I like the price point. Is the Kindle as good as an Ipad? Most would say no. Is it more than half as good as an Ipad? Certainly. And considering the price point it is a much better value.Are the components for the Kindle sourced cheaply? Probably- most device components are. Will this result in dead pixels on your Kindle screen? So far for me it has.I will call Amazon today and see what my options are. If I can't get a device I am happy with then I will return. For most, I think the complaints I described above would not impact most of the Kindles uses, especially watching movies and playing games.

Reviews.Title: What's to say!
Reviews.Author: Joan V. Miller
Reviews.Content: I don't have time to play with it as much as I wish. But all the features truly meet the marketing claims. It is what I take with me whenever I'm going away for a little rest and relaxation (too seldom).

Reviews.Title: Why the kindle fire is my tablet of choice
Reviews.Author: Alexis
Reviews.Content: So after two months of use, I am ready to talk about why I like this product so much.First of all, if you are tablet shopping, you really only need to ask yourself which ecosystem you like best: Apple, Amazon, or Google. You won't go wrong with any tablets that these companies offer, they're all wonderful devices. That said, I would have preferred a Nexus 10, but for a college student's budget, the kindle fire was an easy choice.If there is anything that the Fire falls short in, it would be the app selection. I mean, nothing really critical is missing (except for YouTube seriously Amazon get a proper YouTube app already) so it isn't really detrimental, but there are a few apps I wish Amazon offered.Other than that, everything works flawlessly. As a previous reviewer stated, the position of the micro usb port is a major pain, but little I can do about it. Books, movies, music, apps, games; the Fire can do anything the iPad can, despite what the rabid fanatics tell you.The true power user will probably want to invest in a Nexus, but for the money, this is a great media consumption device. I wasn't looking to replace my brand new laptop anyway. I can manage my emails, check mission critical websites, and get most of my day to day activities done fine on my Fire. It's my best morning coffee buddy.Also no, it does not come with a charger, but I knew that beforehand because I read. That college education sure comes in handy, don't it. If you do not do your research, do not whine to all in sundry about information widely and readily available. Also they aren't expensive and are sold at many brick and mortar stores.Well that wraps up what I have to say about my favorite toy. Take it for what it's worth to you, and happy surfing.

Reviews.Title: Truly worth the money, I use it more than my iPod and cancelled Netflix due to it, but the Silk Browser seems unstable
Reviews.Author: Adore Yourself
Reviews.Content: I actually got tears in my eyes today at the amazing beauty of my Kindle. It truly is amazing. I have Amazon Prime and was sick in bed today and it was a sheet joy to have the Kindle to help me get through the day in bed. I was stunned at how simple and easy streaming shows was on the Kindle, I watched episodes of NOVA today seamlessly. I also am impressed with the sound and picture quality. It did not feel like I was using a small device at all. I love how the cloud makes it easy to get my books from my old Kindle and music I bought in the past into the new one. I think the Prime idea with the streaming content is going to get bigger and bigger, perhaps even upending the entire cable tv market and Netflix. I cancelled Netflix this week due to the Amazon Prime offerings...on the whole, this device is wildly impressive. A large clear HD screen, pretty high quality sound, and great amounts of content, from apps to music to tv shows to books...this is an entertainment system that fits into your hand!! Also, this week I used the camera at Malibu and the quality is amazing! The yellow on the flowers on the hills was stunning both in person and on the pictures I took with my Kindle. I was able to easily transfer the pictures to my laptop and was also able to email some of the pictures to a friend without any problem from my Kindle too. I never listen to music on my ipod anymore and listen to it on my Kindle. I also no longer play Solitaire on my iPod and play it on my Kindle instead. I am liking a lot of the applications for Kindle too, ranging from turning the screen into a playable keyboard to showing a map of the night's sky. So far, I am thoroughly pleased and even impressed, with my new Kindle. I like the touch screen, that is nice and most of the navigation of the Kindle is pretty straightforward once you get the hang of it.On the downside, I did not like and felt it was manipulative to make it so only music bought on Amazon could be easily put onto the Kindle, and that I had to download a special uploader which seems to have problems as well, giving a notice with every upload that it may not work...but was able, with some hassle, to get music from my computer onto the Kindle, but it should have been as easy as moving the files from the laptop to the Kindle but it was not. (You are supposed to be able to transfer the files easily but I was not able to get that to happen.) There was this weird third step of having to download their special app then having to upload your music from laptop to the loader then back to the Kindle. I would like to encourage to not be like Apple...I still, 3 years into owning my iPod, cannot figure out how to get music onto my iPod!! And it pisses me off. Still, the Kindle made it easier to get music onto my Kindle than iPod music uploads have been.The biggest complaint I have re this Kindle is the Silk browser is unstable and I really cannot use this Kindle for much in the way of web use. I can look at static pages, without interactivity. But almost none of the things I need to do can be done online using the Kindle. It seems to not allow you to look at pdfs and even tho I downloaded an app from Adobe to read pdfs they still are not being read...I do a lot of research on ProQuest for instance, and I cannot see any of the articles using the Silk browser. Additionally, it does not seem to work with Flash!! I cannot play any games on Lumosity, for instance, on the Kindle due to some kind of Flash issue and when I tried to find an app to fix this, I could not find it. With no ability to see pdfs or Flash websites, or no way that is obvious to me (and I am in a graduate level tech/design degree program, so I am no idiot when it comes to tech), it severely limits the utility of this device as it applies to the web. Also, the Silk browser freezes up constantly. It needs to be improved. I would have preferred a more stable browser such as Firefox. Almost every time I go online to any site other than Amazon's stores, it freezes and when I do get to websites, they are very limited when the pdfs and flash do not work. It is also unclear whether we are charged money to transfer documents to this Kindle. I believe on my old Kindle they charged us if we sent documents to ourselves. I am unclear if I send documents to the email address of my Kindle HD if I pay for each upload and I wish they would make that clear somewhere. On the whole, though, I am wildly impressed with this Kindle. I really beg Amazon to avoid the pitfall of Apple of making things only work within the itunes store for the ipod making it nearly impossible to upload anything else to the device. I do not like the additional steps to upload my own music onto the Kindle and hope Amazon moves away from that type of thinking on its devices. I hate Apple and avoid their products due to the way they make them so incompatible with everything else. I resent it. I hope Amazon realizes this device has so much utility, enough for them to not have to play games re content. Let us upload our own content plus things we bought at Amazon, with equal ease.I highly recommend this device. It has enhanced my entire life for a month now. It has become my #1 music, movie, game center and favorite camera to boot! Not to mention my primary reading source. Great screen! Great sound! Great utility! Great job, Amazon!!

Reviews.Title: A very good product with a few flaws
Reviews.Author: judy mulack
Reviews.Content: I got the 8.9 kindle fire HD as an early birthday present to myself.  Overall, the experience has been good.  When I first received it, the silk browser would not load.  It kept saying that there was a fatal flaw and that the browser needed to be restarted.  The only problem is that every time I restarted it, it gave me the same error.  This is detrimental to the kindle overall, but it is not a problem for me.  I simply side-loaded Dolphin (my preferred mobile browser) onto my kindle.  As a lover of the original kindle fire, I was pleased with the changes I found on the new HD.> The sound, for a tablet, is outstanding.  True, it is not booming, but it is true stereo sound which is pretty impressive for a tablet.> The HD is beautiful, but that was not the greatest selling point of the screen for me.  With my first generation kindle fire, going outside was out unless I could find a shady spot or if it was really cloudy.  I *LOVE* the anti-glare screen incorporated into the new HD.  I can sit outside in direct sunlight and still see my screen.  This is a great thing!>The "ads" that show up on the lock screen are no big deal.  I just do not pay them any mind when I turn my kindle on.  I do have to say that, even though a lot of people seem to complain about the recommendations offered on the home screen, I actually find myself scrolling through them.  They show you games/apps/books that you may like based on the app/book that is front and center on the home screen.  I do not worry about my kids or myself accidentally purchasing, that is what my password lock is for.>My favorite pre-installed app on this new device is Freetime.  I wish that I could download it on my first generation (I have two kids).  For $3 a month my kids have unlimited access to children's videos, games, apps, and books!  The videos need a wifi connection, but once they access/download an app or book onto the device it is there in the freetime app.  This was a great little discovery when I was stuck at the doctor's office with my toddler a few days ago.  There are literally HUNDREDS of choices for them.>I also really appreciate the fact that I am no longer allocated a miniscule amount of space for apps.  My kindle comes with 13 Gb's of free space, and if I want to allocate all 13 gigs to apps and games, that is my prerogative. It drove me nuts that I was only allowed 1.17 gigs of space out of 6.5 gigs of free space for apps on my first generation.>I **DO NOT** like the placement of the USB port for charging.  The reason is that I like to say in bed and watch movies while going to sleep at night.  I can not use the case to prop the kindle up in landscape mode and charge the kindle at the same time.  I like the placement of the USB port on the first generation much better.  This one little thorn in my side is the main reason that I am only giving this product four stars.>I played with the camera a little bit.  I was not really impressed with it.  I do like how it uses the screen as a flash, but the pictures always seem to come out grainy.  I thought that it was supposed to be an HD camera.  Hey, and how about a video camera option??  This also helped contribute to this product losing one star in my review.This is all.  Overall, I am very pleased with my purchase.  I recommend this product.  It is great for the price (I got it for $269 the week before Valentine's).

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Ashley G
Reviews.Content: I cannot put it down. If your wifi is fast, you will have a great experience. There are a ton of kids apps and games as well as a great selection of movies, tv shows, and books. I would suggest that you don't buy the charger that they say comes with it if you have a smart phone charger that you can switch usb cords with. It works just as well and saves you $20. The Fire is very simple to use and a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Everything I Expected
Reviews.Author: Kristen A Prossen
Reviews.Content: I love this new tablet.  It has performed exactly as it was listed to and is so light and easy to manage.  Best investment I've made in a year.

Reviews.Title: Best tech gizmo I have
Reviews.Author: Adeptus Astartes Mechanicus
Reviews.Content: I use it everyday, at least twice a day. I had the old 7" kindle fire. This is SO much better. Magazines don't need to be zoomed, though I still will, but the higher res and slightly large screen is so much nicer.

Reviews.Title: LOVED IT!!!!
Reviews.Author: jdcoto
Reviews.Content: My Kindle is GREAT!! I love it sooooo much. It has been such a pleasure to play with and it was my birthday present. My hubby gets an A+ on this one!!

Reviews.Title: It must be love
Reviews.Author: csnyder
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my Kindle Fire.  I also have the regular Kindle and I just love them both.  My only request is a longer battery.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Kelly Flanagan
Reviews.Content: Love it....like being able to hook up to TV monitor and computer to watch Netflix.  Moved up from reg Kindle Fire and am really happy with the upgrades and the expanded apps available for the unit.

Reviews.Title: Great prduct
Reviews.Author: Lyman D. Elliott
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th book reader.  My first was a small tablet like machine calleda pocket PC with a 4 inch screen and used Mobipocket reader.  My 2nd was the 5 inch Sony reader but with my failing eyesight wanted something with a larger screen.  3rd reader was the Kindle DX that I bought used a couple of years ago.  Worked very well but needed a light attached if I wanted to read in bed before going to sleep.  This is great for reading in dim light or in bed since it has built-in light.  It is only about an inch smaller then the screen on the DX and is considerably lighter.  There is only one thing that would improve this and that would be a SD card or Micro SD card slot.

Reviews.Title: I Love It
Reviews.Author: Karla S. Duncan
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD 8.9 can do everything I want to use it for - reading to watching videos.  It is easy to navigate and has a great picture.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Thure
Reviews.Content: I'm in love and my laptop is jealous.  I watch a lot of movies and read a little, too.  This is such a handy device that I can't imagine not having one now...and I've only had it less than a month.  Now, I wish I had ordered the 32 GB model.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: @Lourack1
Reviews.Content: Would have given it 5 stars if it had come with a user manual instead of just startup insturctions. An old dinosaur like me needs me needs a little help learning how to navigate the brave new world of high tec. And the 'trending now' and 'suggested sites', there mere presence on the screen irrataes me. Ay my age I couldn't care less about most of them, and wish I knew how to just delete them. and, of couse, keep them from being replaced by even more unenteresting sites. I like it though! the Kindle is my first attempt at moveing into the high tec world. I have learned a great deal, but I wish it had come with the manual mentioned above.

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift for my husband
Reviews.Author: Violetta Cisotto
Reviews.Content: This is the BEST!!!!We did not have to buy an iPad as this does everything he needs..THe HD is fabulous and he really enjoys using this better than the NOOK...

Reviews.Title: kindlefire
Reviews.Author: hol
Reviews.Content: I purchased my kindle fire for travel. I am glad I Spent the money.  When I asked for support they were prompt and helpful. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Leslie G
Reviews.Content: I am loving my Kindle Fire - I got the larger size so I can use it as a tablet.  I still use my Kindle keyboard to read books, partly due to its more comfortable size & partly because the Fire doesn't allow books to be put into collections.  If you are primarily looking for an ereader, I would recommend the tradional Kindle but if you want a device that can do email, surf the web, allow you to watch videos, the Fire is excellent!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: Jorge Duprey
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my wife and she has not put it down since I gave it to her.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Recieved it quicker than anticipated.  Easy boot up, easy set up and being as it for my 68 year old mother, I think she will not have any problems.  She loves play slots on my iPad, and she and my daughter fight over it, so this was a good buy for her.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!!!
Reviews.Author: Christina Oxford
Reviews.Content: Our family loves it!!! It does everything a tablet should! I'm so happy we went with the larger screen. It is well worth it & I've had lots of friends wish they'd gone with the bigger screen after seeing ours:)

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: frances kurtz
Reviews.Content: i love my kindle a lot  i have an older model but this new one is lovely  the only thing i don't like is the robot voice used to read the audiobooks  my old one is the same  if you see the words kindle edition on the book description it means that you get the robot voice.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Josephine Brown
Reviews.Content: I truly love my Kindle Fire.  I enjoy reading all my books on it and surfing the web.  The only thing I havn't done yet is watch a video.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: M. Love
Reviews.Content: This Kindle seems well made and loaded with apps.  The Kindle arrived with no manual, so I had to find information on the Kindle in order to be able to navigate the apps.  I have found it quite difficult to locate the free books to read section.  I do love the large size of the screen.  Reading is most enjoyable on the Kindle, and the books load quickly.  I have not used many other apps, so can not rate those as of yet.

Reviews.Title: Great Kindle
Reviews.Author: Moomers
Reviews.Content: My son loves this product. He is constantly talking about it.  He chose this over the IPad because it did so much more. I would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: my 3rd kindle!!!
Reviews.Author: LUV2READ
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd kindle...need I say more! I love the features, price, free apps, no monthly/hidden charges...just everything this has to offer. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a tablet.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME. THE BEST
Reviews.Author: nickandyhead "Nick"
Reviews.Content: Glad I bought it!!! So excellent for school. Imagine being able to search your college textbooks for important criteria; I no longer have to carry my heavy textbooks around; the textbooks I buy for college are saved for a lifetime; you can easily visit hyperlinks to study related factual Web site data from your textbook now!!! These are so worth it.If you are a regular tablet user... I still recommend this because it is a nicely priced tablet and it does EVERYTHING. Even though it's advertised as not supporting flash, you can download and manually install flash. This thing has it all.

Reviews.Title: BOOK READER
Reviews.Author: Brad Rote "BRAD ROTE ~ NOVELIST ~ SCREENWRITER"
Reviews.Content: This Kindle works like a dream. Don't leave home without it. It is so much easier to read books this way.

Reviews.Title: My new Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Shirley Sabatino "Deadline! addict"
Reviews.Content: I kept hinting to hubby I wanted this to upgrade my Kindle Touch so he ordered it for me for Valentine's Day!  Love the picture quality!

Reviews.Title: I Dig It!
Reviews.Author: Joi Veer "Joi Veer"
Reviews.Content: I dig it...everything Kindle said it would be and more!Can't wait to see what they have in store for the next version.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT- BEST BIRTHDAY GIFT EVER!!!
Reviews.Author: Jill
Reviews.Content: Love this! It's even better than I had thought it would be. Love the size and the quality. It is perfect for traveling, not bulky or heavy. Picks up wi-fi perfectly no matter where I go, and connects great to my phone when I use the mobile hotspot. The delivery was the best part. I was so anxious to get this and it ended up arriving a day early and on my birthday!!!!  Amazon is the best! This Kindle is the best and it is worth it being a prime member!!!

Reviews.Title: The purchase was a gift for my husband
Reviews.Author: Sonia Perocier
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a tablet that would be great for reading, nothing came close to the Kinle fire, you see my husband read a lot, so I figuered get him a tablet since times have changed from picking up a good book, he absolutely loves it, not just for reading, he plays games, goes on the web, netflix, and most importantly checks out his FB...I would recommend this product...it has so much more...the clarity, the colors is amazing...I would give this product my thumbs up and more If I could.....am glad I made someone very special very satisfied...

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Rachy
Reviews.Content: cant talk enough about my kindle,  I wish the battery lasted longer, and gave you a warning before it goes dead

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: Julia I
Reviews.Content: This will be hard to believe but I don't even have a cell phone so learning to work the Fire is an experience.  I'm a little aggravated that it didn't have a manual with it for people who have no technical ability.  I love the color and speed of the Fire and have downloaded a few freebies so far.  It will take me awhile to learn but the forums, questions and answers, and other help on the internet and Amazon have helped me immensely.  I may purchase a manual if I find the right one.  I probably won't ever use the Fire to it's capability but, I'm enjoying it so far.Being a senior, I like the size of the screen. And,  the brightness and clarity of the pictures is amazing!  The battery seems to hold a long time as is advertised.  I purchased it mainly for using on long trips since I can download so many movies and games.  I do wish it had a front facing camera.Not ever having anything like this before I can't recommend it on it's technical ability but, I can recommend it on the looks, the number of apps to download, books and movies to download, and there are so many things you can do with this thing.  Having it less than a week, I love it but, sure didn't the first couple of days.  It will be a learning experience.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD  8.9  Matters.
Reviews.Author: Claxon,Bill
Reviews.Content: While the browsing experience is notably inferior (silk) and the ergonomics poorly engineered(on off switch,hdmi and charging port)it is the equal for all it does well to the ipad .The screen while not as pixelated, is sharp and better contrasted than my ipad 3 and the image transfered brilliantly to the tv screen via a Cable Matters hdmi cord.The movie choices are fabulous(amazon prime) and free(try that with itunes)But what I wanted to tell you and this you're really going to like, is the SOUND.The dolby stereo excels on its own and when applied via hdmi cable to  the TV , prevails over ipad by a discernible margin.Now lets get this straight the kindle fire hd 8.9  is not an ipad.But it is a superior reader with a better contrasted screen  and sound resonance than the ipad and if you are an amazon prime member, Bezos is making you an offer here you can't refuse.

Reviews.Title: Very nice!!
Reviews.Author: CHK
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle Fire, just wish I would have purchased it sooner. Wanted it primarily for an e-reader with some additional options.E-reader is exceptional, have had no problems. Battery life isn't too bad,can go down quickly but reading it lasts at least 10+ hours without plugging it in if it is fully charged.Browsing on the web is decent as well, but haven't ventured into that too much.If  you are wanting a more inexpensive tablet/e-reader, but do not want to buy an iPad, I would say go for it!!The camera is not the greatest, but really have no need for it as I do not Skype and you do have to download the app to use it otherwise, pretty much good for self-portraits.Otherwise, so far after a little over a month, have had no problems with it!

Reviews.Title: My favorite electronic gadget!
Reviews.Author: Kj
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased a Kindle Fire 8.9 and love it! I bought a case with a blue tooth keyboard in it and it almost functions as a laptop. My daughter loved it so much I went out the next day purchased her the Kindle Fire HD 7in. They are both great. The only complaint I have is that some apps that I normally get for free from Google play either cost money or they aren't available at all. I am still extremely happy with my kindle fire.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Lauren hudson
Reviews.Content: I got this for Christmas.... because my twin sister wanted the fire. I Didn't even want one. i thought that this invention was going to ruin book stores forever, but when I saw it... this is better than an iPad!!!why?It is the size of an iPad mini with better picture.It can buy everything you can on an iPad, PLUS books. (And movies)It is 400$ cheaper!! :)And it has cool cases. Just saying!!Helpful tips:If you drop this item, it will get really messed up.your text will be all funky. But then I dropped it again, and now it's fine!You can not change the screen savor, so do not try.This item does not have every App that apple products do, but almost.I really hope you found this helpful,- # laurenhreveiws

Reviews.Title: Great gadget, most of all, GREAT customer service!
Reviews.Author: William Chai
Reviews.Content: I just bought my Kindle Fire HD 8.9" couple days ago. I fell in love with the crystal clear screen and how much fun it is. But I did have problem with the micro USB charging port, it didn't charge properly and it stopped charging with very little movement. I called amazon's CS and it took me a minute to be connected with a representative. They rushed me a brand new KF via two days shipping. 5 stars for customer service!

Reviews.Title: BEST BUY THERE IS
Reviews.Author: DaShu
Reviews.Content: THis is the best buy ever.  I traded up from my basic Kindle and this is the most impressive buy for me. Compaired to my sons IPAD, I like the KINDLE HD better.  THe music sounds outstanding, the picture and videos are so clear and the price puts Apple products to shame

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: R. Summers
Reviews.Content: I just received this so I am still trying it out. Seems to be an excellent product and I picked it over an Ipad because of the features for the money! I am very impressed with this product and the screen is amazing! I will update this as I learn more about it but as of now I would highly recommend this Kindle Fire!!

Reviews.Title: Everything and More
Reviews.Author: Oz
Reviews.Content: Actually I don't know about everything yet.  But it's a great tablet so far as I've explored it.My only "knock", as a rural user, I have limited bandwidth coming to the house.  The "always on" aspect of the tablets chews it up.  So I have the wifi disabled at home and load it up with books and aps when I'm in town.  Many of the game aps require online access so that's a bit disappointing.  But for those with non-metered bandwidth, I heartily reccommend this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9" 32 GB w/ ads
Reviews.Author: Richard Cortes
Reviews.Content: Love my new Kindle Fire!  The wifi on this thing is great.  It will connect in places where my old 7" Fire wouldn't.  Everything else about it is as advertised.  My only complaint is that the power button on this thing is a little hinky and ambiguous.  It doesn't povide any kind of tactile sense that the button has been pushed and the slight lag time to screen activation leaves you wondering if you succesfully activated the device.  Everything else is great.

Reviews.Title: excellent!!!
Reviews.Author: Gary R. Williams
Reviews.Content: Easy to use .music and video sharp and clean.I bought the 8.9" for myself and the 7" for my wife . Couldn't be more happy with both

Reviews.Title: It is amazing
Reviews.Author: Marley West
Reviews.Content: The KIndle Fire HD is great. I love all of the apps I can find, I love the book layout that it has. The HD screen is great for watching movies and videos.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HD  fire
Reviews.Author: Linda Nash "southern girl  grace"
Reviews.Content: Readed the reviewsThis was a Christmas give to my granddaughter she loves it  no trouble at all easy to set upWell worth the moneyThis is better than a regular laptop and easier to use

Reviews.Title: best value
Reviews.Author: David Lum
Reviews.Content: cheaper version of the ipad, well worth the price,,,, i love this item as it goes where I go,,, Thanks

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: The Beef
Reviews.Content: Glad to have purchased without special offers.  Christmas gift for my wife.  She had me return an iPad in 2011, and is glad to have waited for the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: garyh
Reviews.Content: Have had the product for a little over a month and I love it.  The screen is bright and totally awsome, I Pads have nothing on the Kindle.  Do wish you could improve the battery life, needs recharging way to often for peak performance.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Jamie P.
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this tablet to anyone. We have enjoyed it for reading, games and internet. Much less expensive than the ipad and as far as I can tell has many of the same features.

Reviews.Title: I Love It
Reviews.Author: Bantry Bay
Reviews.Content: The only complaint I have is that I would have liked a manual to come in the box.  Some times I have a hard time figuring out how to work things, good thing I have a son

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Natec
Reviews.Content: One of the best.purchases I've ever made!! Love it & it's very user friendly. Would highly recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: sherryweinstock
Reviews.Content: The color is so bright, it almost looks 3D. Easy to use once you get the hang of it. Have to hide it from my Husband, because he loves to play games on it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Janeene Petersen "jan gran"
Reviews.Content: I enjoy having my "stack of books" look so nice and work well too.  I am still learning al the features

Reviews.Title: Loving my new kindle hd
Reviews.Author: E. Mccurry "saved1979"
Reviews.Content: I am so pleased with my new kindle hd, i love the larger screen, it makes using the apps more enjoyable, the reading, which is my number one thing is so much better on this kindle versus my smaller one. Loving it, would highly recommend to anyone..

Reviews.Title: fabulous
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: prefer this to my old one which was smaller and had far fewer features, great picture quality and so easy to read with all the different font sizes and choices

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: krbbrk
Reviews.Content: I love, love, love my Kindle Fire. I have used the Nook previously, but that lost my interest when it became apparent Barnes and Noble aren't as adept at pricing and software as Amazon is. I take this with me everywhere and use the wifi as needed. It's excellent. I do have an issue once in awhile with it freezing, but it doesn't last long. I know it's software related. Overall it's a fantastic gadget to own. Amazon is doing a great job with pricing and I love the fact I can get free apps each day just by visiting their website. Excellent range of books and movies and music. I'm an avid Amazon user and now I'm a huge fan of the Kindle. You will love this product and it's great for children too. They have an app just for them to use also so you can share it. It's worth every penny and you will enjoy this very much. Excellent gift idea. Don't forget to get a carrying case, because you won't want to put it down.

Reviews.Title: Thrilled!
Reviews.Author: Pamela R. Briggs
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kindle Fire HD 8.9" tablet and was NOT sorry!!  So many people said not to wasted my money on the HD because it wasn't worth it but I took a chance because it was what I wanted and I have not been sorry.  The picture is crystal clear and so real and I love the extra size.  I love the Kindle Fire HD 8.9" tablet and highly recommend that everyone get it!!

Reviews.Title: Overall very pleased.
Reviews.Author: GoingLoopy
Reviews.Content: Pros and cons of HD 8.9" vs. Original 1st Generation Fire:PROS:Clearer display with way less glareLarger screen, so magazines are a lot easier to see without going to text-only modeCameraFaster processorSuper-fast downloadsRecommendations - I actually like that it will suggest things similar to what you just read or watched or played.  It's not obtrusive due to the size of the screen.  It might be less awesome on the smaller version, though.Better speakers (it still sounds better with headphones, but the speakers are usable if, for example, your cat chewed through ANOTHER headphone cord and left the pieces on your pillow, as a gift).CONS:Power button hard to see/find and it doesn't have a light (so unless you actually open up the case, you can't make sure that it's actually plugged in.  See prior note about cat and delicious, delicious cords).A little heavy for holding in one hand, especially in a case.Still more glare than I would like...not impossible to use in daylight, but not great.Battery life is longer?  AHAHAHAHAHA.  Surprisingly, movies/tv seem to suck the least juice. Reading eats the battery, and playing games (like Angry Birds and Cubistry) kills it.Formatting issues with some books and games.Generally, I am very pleased with it.  I find that I watch a lot more movies & tv shows because of the larger screen.  Also, I can set the text size a little bigger and not have to turn pages as often...as I am rapidly approaching the Age of Reading Glasses, I like this feature. I just wish the power button had a light like the 1st gen. Fire, and that it was slightly raised and not flush with the case.  The display is amazing.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire - Love it!
Reviews.Author: mommom
Reviews.Content: We got this to share as a gift to ourselves for Christmas.  We really love it and it is easy to use. We considered getting one last year but held off.  We're glad we did because we love the bigger size.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied at last
Reviews.Author: Deborah M. Haber
Reviews.Content: I am thrilled with my Kindle Fire HD.  It is meeting all my needs and amusements.  Thank you for this marvelous advancement.

Reviews.Title: My Favorite New Toy...Kindle Fire HD 8.9"  :o)
Reviews.Author: La' Bookchic
Reviews.Content: I just LOVE my new gadget!!  I thought my Kindle Touch 3G was the bomb until I got this new toy!  Love having all the options that it offers, whether I want to watch a movie, play a game, read a book or just surf the web & look at e-mail.  The high definition is just awesome at making the animations come alive and pop off the screen!  My only issue is with the actual web browser, "Silk".  There are times that messages appear saying the Tabs closed and aren't responding, this can be irritating when you have to keep restarting them.  Other than that drawback, I am really happy with this product & highly recommend it!!  :o)

Reviews.Title: graet price and great product
Reviews.Author: shannon
Reviews.Content: very fast delivery and a great product would tell all my family and friends . the kindle is a great buy

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for pro
Reviews.Author: Aden Hanaf
Reviews.Content: I have been using amazon since my early age and when they announced the tablet I was first ordered. When I received it was amazin tablet. Entertainments, reading and so on. I already recommended to my sis who are in uni and they also amazed to have it.

Reviews.Title: Bought it for my wife.
Reviews.Author: Scott McClain
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife last christmas and she loves it.  She uses it every day and couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: Blown away
Reviews.Author: Patrick
Reviews.Content: I've never owned a tablet device before but used my friends IPads.  Can't really say one is better than the other.  But for me, the Kindle is where it's at homeslices.  It may be a personal preference but I don't care for the IPad and everyone who's played with my Kindle seem impressed, as they should be!  Sound quality is outstanding, picture quality is amazing, really can't say enough good things.  Audible books are the perfect companion, fyi.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Patty Cake
Reviews.Content: I love it! It's slim and pretty light, the graphics are fantastic. I think I play more games on it than read books, although I got it for the books. I also received an iPad for Christmas but I like the Kindle Fire better because it's lighter and does basically the same things. I do wish it had the camera facing front and back. I haven't tried this yet but it sounds like it would be difficult to get a good picture. It's much easier to get around in than the iPad. The sound is really good and I watched a video on it and the picture quality was really good.I have three Kindles now and use all three. I like my original one because I can read it on the beach, the Kindle Fire I got last year is easy to take when I have appointments because it's small, but this one does a lot more. I'm keeping them all active!

Reviews.Title: I Love It, love it, love it!
Reviews.Author: Deborah Sizemore
Reviews.Content: I gave this to my husband for Christmas and he absolutely loves it!He also got me a Kindle 32 GB and it is awesome!

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: sueym
Reviews.Content: So far I am absolutely thrilled with my Kindle.  The only problem I have is that I can't play my facebook games.  If this could be fixed I would be ecstatic!

Reviews.Title: Fun and Easy
Reviews.Author: Linda L.
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire is great!  I keep it next to my bed to read at night and it keeps disappearing because the whole family likes it.  My children watch video's and play games - they like the big screen.  My husband likes to use it for internet access around the house because it is so easy to use and carry.  Great purchase and very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Robert Palmer
Reviews.Content: In Dec '11 I purchased the kindle fire and my wife and I kept fighting over it. So it lead me to buying the HD one Dec '12 and WOW can I just say its everything I wanted. Im not on my pc all the time and when I am it's short and sweet. But having the Kindle Fire HD i can do everything I need to in have as much time as powering up my pc. While the apps aren't nearly as many as Ipad it does offer more perks. With all the video and movie streaming apps out there I find prime has the best and newest selection. Also with the space on cloud I am not worried about what I down load slowing down the OS cause I can delete and add whatever later. And while having two kindles, with the cloud my wife and I can each read the same book at our own pace at no extra charge.  LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HD!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: C. Meyer "cajunchris"
Reviews.Content: I do love my Kindle  Fire tablet. Really great value. Lots of features. I mostly use books, web, email, apps, and movies and videos.  Prime is a great feature.  I was able to keep grandkids  entertained at Christmas with games and movies. I bought cable hookup to TV and seen movies  on the big screen. GREAT. I am still learning about it.  3 things I wish were different--would like it to work with flash player to download programs from the web I am interested in. The speakers should be on the same side as the screen. U lose most of the sound.  Sometimes I have to choose picture or sound. Third, I wish there were more Apps.  Other than that, I would give 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Harry DBH
Reviews.Content: Excellent!As always this was a great way to buy this from Amazon.  It was so much easier than getting out and going to my nearest store to get it. I live in a rural community and with Amazons fast shipping I got this before my next visit to town.

Reviews.Title: Worth The Money
Reviews.Author: T. Schiel
Reviews.Content: Prime TV shows and movies, stream Netflix, plenty of apps and games, great screen, blue tooth....I use it daily. I don't use it for web search or email. I've got a computer that does those tasks better, but this tablet gets a workout.Minor quibbles are the volume control which should be controlled with a bezel switch and that flush on and off button which is hard to find in the dark but that's not enough to knock off a star. It's all manageable without too much trouble.I don't read on it since that works better on my 7" Fire but I didn't buy for reading, I bought it mainly for video and music and it does a great job on those.I snapped this up on that 50 buck discount day so this tablet was a real bargain.

Reviews.Title: Okay Tablet.
Reviews.Author: Emmaleigh "eeyorefive"
Reviews.Content: This was my second attempt at a tablet.  This one was better than the first one I got but I have had some trouble with this one. It freezes up so I have to turn it off. I've also had trouble with email too.I am not really happy with it and have sold it since it's past my return date.  I think I am giving up on tablets.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Jim Dekker,Jr.
Reviews.Content: The Kindle is better then I expected it be. Has a very good picture and sound. I am very happy with it. I have a friend who is thinking about a Kindle or I-pad and I would definetly woul recomend the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Karen & Phil
Reviews.Content: I love the new Kindle HD 8.9, if only I had more time to sit and play with it to figure out everything it does. The web searching is faster than our laptop computer!

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Bugstress
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome tablet.  Unfortunately I transitioned to an IPAD mini because it is more of a "workhorse."  Thats because of all the business integration.  However, I am an Amazon lifer and kept my kindle keyboard and kindle fire 1st gen, because the games are better, graphics more crisp, and of course, Amazon makes it easy to keep all purchased content in cloud storage.

Reviews.Title: So far I really like it
Reviews.Author: Frank Roth
Reviews.Content: I did quite a lot of research on tablets before making my purchase, and the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 does not disappoint.

Reviews.Title: It's user friendly.
Reviews.Author: Betty J. Biech
Reviews.Content: I like its size.I have not had it long enough to know everything about it.  However, I am having fun learning.  It is able to do everything that I was expecting, and more.It's a very handy device.I would recommend this to a friend

Reviews.Title: Two months and no regrets.
Reviews.Author: Ralph Kruse
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from the e-ink version and absolutely love it. I stream movies from HBO and netflix while I'm sitting on the couch.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING
Reviews.Author: Jany Kimble
Reviews.Content: LOVING MY KINDLE, SO EASY TO USE, GREAT PICTURES, EASY ON THE EYES, SO MANY APPS AND GAMES, AND FOR ME THE BOOKS ARE PLENTY...LOVE IT

Reviews.Title: Why did I wait so long?
Reviews.Author: Chia
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kindle after doing 2 months of research between it and its popular rival who shall not be named. It's been a month and I have no regrets. It's an excellent e-reader. Having an Amazon product has its perks as well such as amazing customer service and a wide variety of ebooks. It's lightweight, simple to use and understand. Only issues I've had so far are the "tabs not responding" and a lack of a few apps I would have loved to be able to use. Overall, the Kindle Fire is a good bargain for it's buck.

Reviews.Title: Pleasantly surprised
Reviews.Author: Justamom "Justamom"
Reviews.Content: I was in the market for a tablet and with so many options available was unsure which to pick. I read up a lot on the Windows RT OS, native Android tablets, iPad and really found myself returning to the Kindle Fire HD. I had several co-workers with the original Kindle Fire and initially wasn't impressed. It wasn't until I found myself playing with the Kindle Fire HD in stores that I was truly blow away by Amazons forked version of Android, user experience and speed.Everything felt very simple and pleasant to move through. Amazon did not choke me down with product advertisements and things simply felt as they should be. The 32GB is sufficient for my needs and although I would have preferred expandable storage the Dolby audio was too irresistible. It's not often I feel like I can unplug my headphones and actually enjoy the sound coming out of a portable device. My daughter loves the Kindle FreeTime as do I. Overall, it's not the tablet itself that seals the deal it's the total package, especially for Prime members with Amazon video, the lending library and free apps of the day. I consider myself very frugal and definitely do not regret this purchase.

Reviews.Title: I love it.
Reviews.Author: Merlin Caballero
Reviews.Content: My husband gave me the Kindle HD for xmas and is the best gift ever. He had given me the Kindle fire last year and I was very happy with it, but when I got my Kindle HD I was really able to see the difference between the two. The clarity is great. The only thing I do not like are the bottoms on the side for volume and to power it, can't hardly feel them and it does not have a light that tells you is charging or not, so you have to open it to see. Other than that it is a good buy, I love watching movies in it and with the HDMI cable I am able to play the movies or shows on my big TVs, that is an excellent option to have. Overall, you cannot go wrong with a Kindle HD and for the price, it is awesome. One other thing I like is that I am able to get an app for my magic jack and I can make phone calls with it. So, if you are going to get it I am sure you will enjoy it just like I do.

Reviews.Title: What a great idea
Reviews.Author: Catherine Montressor
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I was tired of packing a bunch of boxes of books each time I moved. I also travel a lot and books weigh too much to be practical. I debated for months between Kindle Fire and iPad. I chose the Kindle Fire because I mainly wanted a place to keep my library.Now that I have it, I use it for much more. Free Skype access (and built-in camera lets me talk 'live), ability to keep a journal and make notes. I love the book features - highlighting, bookmarking, voice (a computer voice reads the text to you), ability to upload my documents.Then I discovered the free movies. OMG! The latest Mission Impossible - is FREE! And it downloads in less than a minute on WiFi. I am very impressed.And of course, the games. Good for those times you are waiting for something else to happen, like standing in line at the store, waiting for your food at a restaurant, you know ....I chose it for access to books, but now I use it more than I do my computer.

Reviews.Title: love it.
Reviews.Author: JM happy face
Reviews.Content: I had the kindle before but this one has many more features and it is in beautiful color. Great service from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: WOW!
Reviews.Author: Dorothy Moseley
Reviews.Content: I've had my Kindle Fire for less than a week and I'm in love with it.  This is almost an extension of my right arm.  It does everyting I've seen the IPad do, and I love reading my books on the Fire.  Can't go wrong for quality and price. I used my Kindle Touch every day and I use the Fire even more.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Eliza
Reviews.Content: This is a great product for a great price.  One of the best values out there in the world of tablets.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Barb Matthey
Reviews.Content: Easy to use.  I bought it for my daughter and i but i can't get my daughter to share.  We both love it.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT !!!
Reviews.Author: scapp
Reviews.Content: I had the Kindle Fire which I broke so they upgraded me to the Kindle Fire HD 7 " but I upgraded to this one for the screen size (I use it at school to follow along with power points in class). Let me say that it is absolutely worth the extra money! I love it and I think that the battery life is better on the 8.9" than it was on the 7". Also I like that the screen is large enough to show all but the offers on the home screen. Also I got the Otter Box case which I also love and I feel that my device is protected in my backpack. Thank you amazon for a great product, I'm definitely a Kindle girl !

Reviews.Title: My 5th Kindle and each one better than the last!
Reviews.Author: Chet or Julie Fullerton "2hot2splash"
Reviews.Content: Absolutely one of the best buys on the market and might I add that Amazon is the finest company I have had the pleasure to work with.  Customer service is unbeatable.  Constantly upgrading their products and the Kindle 8.9 is another fine example.  The added size and resolution make this a "can't do without" item.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Glenda Mahaffey
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a Christmas present to my husband who is so hard to buy for, but he was so surprised and loves it. Whenever he is not using it, I am using it! Great product.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey A. Keehn
Reviews.Content: Or should I say my wife loves it.  The only time she let me touch it is to set up her email accounts.

Reviews.Title: I love this
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love this so much I purchased one for my son and his college studies.  He now uses this in place of his laptop when he goes to school or when he is waiting in between and works on his school projects.  He purchsed the Office product App for this and he is in love with it.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: SEEH3
Reviews.Content: It was the perfect Christmas gift for my wife.  She loves it and takes it wherever she goes and uses it often.

Reviews.Title: I am pleased
Reviews.Author: Book_thyme
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure if I wanted a tablet or an ultra book when my mom bought me a kindle fire for my birthday. if I was going to invest in a tablet I thought I would want an Asus which has a little more functionality which had some more computer like abilities. However, now that I have had this for about two weeks I am very pleased with my gift. for what I have been using my tablet for it suits me quite well.What I like:1. This is a true media device and if you have amazon prime you will obtain the most out of this device2.I like how this device is linked to all my cloud items and easy to download3.I like that I can download all my Facebook pictures on to my device4. You can still download and view PowerPoint and pdfs on your kindle5.it has a Swype keyboard6. The sound is decentWhat I wish it had:1. That I could create a text document2. A more diverse app market similar to android3. wish it had expandable memoryI have not had any problems with their silk web browser. There is a small learning curve but play with it and it is easy to learn of you are up to speed with technological times. also if you have a kindle ereader you willnot need to purchase a chargerupdate: recently received an email from Amazon saying 11 cds(not mp3) I purchased in the past were available for mp3 download on my kindle and cloud player. One nice feature is I have the ability to close my kindle case or put it in sleep mode and still be able to stream the music.Also after reading through some reviews I realized the camera is functional for taking pictures with a flash,if you hit photos on the top menu bar, there is a camera icon in the top right corner.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HD
Reviews.Author: Don Juan
Reviews.Content: Got this for my wife for Christmas she loves it ! It's just as good as a iPad 4 and $200 dollars cheaper son ^_^

Reviews.Title: FIRE HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: JAMES
Reviews.Content: I really love  my kindle fire . hd  , easy to use, easy to navigate  great hd. the only problem I have is the volume it does not seem  to be as loud as they  advertise. my son has a samsung galaxy 2 and it is much louder. Hopefully amazon will update the software and increase  the volume for us old guys. other than that a great tablet well done amazon

Reviews.Title: Just Arrived... SO EXCITED!  (Will update as time passes!)
Reviews.Author: cjmanning86
Reviews.Content: As the title suggests... I have just received my Kindle Fire 8.9" HD (without 4G) a couple hours ago!  I work in the IT and Data Management fields, love electronics and many devices.  I will be able to honestly and thoroughly review this product for those of you out there still looking to buy one or be informed.Packaging -  The packaging used to hold my Kindle Fire was typical Amazon style.  It came in it's own 'Kindle' box with the manifest attached.  While I worry about this, I can say my device is without defect and it seems their box is more protective than it seems.  I also must say I like that they use recycled material that is also further recyclable... very 'green' of them and it's appreciated from a passive standpoint.Directions -  I must say this is splitting hairs a little... but I am dissappointed that they don't provide at least some basic instructions as to whether you can start charging it right out of the box or not.  I assume that the battery needs to be fully charged and then fully used until it dies and then fully charged again to charge all possible cells thoroughly?  I know some phones were like this, and still are in some cases with other devices too.  Right now I'm trying to charge it and then after that I will see what the battery life is initially and report it, and then charge fully after death and then see what it is after a complete recharge and report it too :)Accessories -  I don't know if most people order accessories right off the bat or not, but I made sure to buy a good screen protector and leather folio/bluetooth keyboard case for mine.  I recommend Tech Armor's Lifetime warrantied HD screen protectors.  Since the Kindle Fire HD already has anti glare built into it's glass, no need for matte types of screen protectors.  Matte types take away from the crispness of the HD screen anyways.  I also recommend MoKo's Bluetooth Keyboard Case... it is of great quality, and after tons of research of the other brands, this one had the reviews that made me feel safest with the stitching, compatibleness with ALL of the function buttons, and charging time and more.  Other than that, it's up to you... but I'd say these two are a must!  Check them out!Feel and Initial Reactions -  This device is heavier than I expected, but that is no complaint!  It feels natural, almost like it is in that sweet spot for a device to not be too heavy and not too light.  I was actually worried of dropping it because it's not as grippy as one would think or expect either, and I didn't want to touch the screen until my protector was on it either!  It is just the right size though, and fits in your hand well.  It's very thin, cool to the touch, and it's display is absolutely marvelous!  The colors are deep and sharp, but not too bright.  THe brightness is sensitive I will say, with half way down being almost unreadable in any indoor lighting.  I am making use of the auto brightness to help save battery while keeping proper reading brightness readily set.  It's also responsive, easy to use.  The on screen keyboard and feel to manipulate the OS takes a few seconds to get used to, but that's to be expected as I have only iphones in my house, and the first generation Kindle Fire which is sluggish and drull compared to this one.  The advertisements aren't that bad... honestly, who cares?  I'm sure there's an easy way my IT mind could find to take those out, but I did save money with them being there so I'll prolly leave them there for now.Features -  With everything making an attempt to be separate, but all be synced together at the same time... it's no surprise to see Facebook and Twitter instantly be found on this device upon setup.  Especially since I have both accounts and have shared items on the webpage with them (Amazon.com).  The dual WiFi antenna and dualbands make it really speedy compared to my iphone 4S's wifi speeds, and even here at work where our mobile network gets bogged down... it's almost expecting too much out of itself in regards to the warning I got that the network is slow and that I should update in the background upon setup (haha, it actually finished fast... it's too hard on itself!).Overall -  I am very pleased and I cannot wait to keep you all updated with my further review updates!  I love the service of Amazon.com, I love their products, and I love the features they offer with their devices.  I know I sound like a fanboy, but I am not often completely pleased like this (as I always find something that could be better)... and I assure you, I may just yet still find something on this tablet.  Stay tuned and find out!

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire 8.9 HD except for a couple really picky things
Reviews.Author: Mr. Ed
Reviews.Content: Sound is not really loud enough, I wish the on/off and volume buttons had a little colored dot on the face so they would be easier to find without feeling around for them.I found every app I needed for FREE in the store.Purchased it mainly for watching movies and reading books, for those two it gets the 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Totally worth the extra money for the bigger screen
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: The 8.9 in is great! The screen size for streaming is awesome! I also love it for apps like Pinterest (can see projects so much easier!) and to look up online patterns for crochet and knitting.  So glad we got it!

Reviews.Title: I Love my Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: MsVonnie
Reviews.Content: Let me start by saying.. I deprived myself of a Kindle Fire for a year.. NOW the wait is over..I have to say this AWESOME..the Grapics are incredible... the Audio is AWESOME....I absolutely love the graphics. I have the 8.9" and I thought it would be too big and ackward for me to handle but its Perfect! I take it everywhere and discover new things I can do with everyday..Its a great machine, slender. lightweight. fits in most of our tote bags ladies! I am very pleased with.. was reluctant over the price but so glad I got it... My kids love it too. The Kindle free time makes reading more fun for them.Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: I love my kindle!
Reviews.Author: David Harwood
Reviews.Content: It is easy to use. I like how it connects to the internet quick.  I also like how easy it is to trasnport.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 8.9
Reviews.Author: Nicolette
Reviews.Content: I purchased my kindle fire 8.9 just after Christmas I knew I wanted a tablet that I could use on the go and that would fit in my bag I was torn between the Ipad mini and the kindle fire I had used a great deal of ipads but had no experiences with kindles then the kids I nanny for received Kindle 7" s for Christmas and after playing around with theirs I decided to go with the Kindle fire not even knowing they made an 8.9" screen and so far I am glad I went with the bigger screen, I have read books on it streamed netfix even downloaded some games for the kids and so far I am very pleased. The only thing I would change to far is if on the kids we where able to control the volume in the parental controls  (hint hint amazon) we are  able  to control everything else in the parental controls  and the "kindle free time" is excellent but the two of them compete over volume and before we know it they have them up the full volume and it is all you can hear! Another plus is I would rather deal with the amazon android market any day over dealing with Itunes!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Device
Reviews.Author: Eric R. Maki
Reviews.Content: I've tried the 7" devices and the 10+" devices and this is the sweet spot. The hi-res graphics makes watching movies or Netflix comfortable, but your hands don't get tired with the added weight of the full size devices. I'm glad I spent the extra $100 for the 8.9!

Reviews.Title: Will never regret purchasing this
Reviews.Author: Pelicanpat
Reviews.Content: Excellent tablet, HD is great, sound is great and there are so many things you can do on this! Keeps me quite busy!!!! Would recomend to everyone!

Reviews.Title: The Display is Awesome
Reviews.Author: Stanley Ruff "Transbug"
Reviews.Content: It worked just as advertised.  I bought this for my wife although she has the original Kindle.  She is completely satisfied.  I believe, however, opening it up to "all" android apps would make it better.  Right now it limits you to a small selection of which the better ones requires purchasing.

Reviews.Title: We Love it!
Reviews.Author: Shawna F.
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband for Christmas and he loves it! He's on it everyday so we definitely got our money's worth. He can take it to work and watch movies or play games on his lunch break. It's also very convenient to take to church service on Sunday's and utilize the Bible app to look up verses. Not only does he really enjoy this Kindle, but my 3 year old daughter loves it too. She plays educational games which are helping her become more accustomed to technology. I chose the HD 8.9 because it appeared to be the best-now I can't compare it to any others because it's our first tablet but I say that it's pretty awesome! I think I will buy another one soon.

Reviews.Title: Ammazingly brilliant picture, clarity better than the ipad actually
Reviews.Author: annegirl
Reviews.Content: This kindle HD fire is an awesome piece of technology the graphics apps and everything this has is as great but maybe even a little better than the ipad.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Pam "SMB,SLT"
Reviews.Content: This is my newest Fire and other than being a tad heavier than I really like it is a great device.  The cover I purchased automatically awakens the device when I open it and the quick charger (additional cost) does a great job of keeping me charged and playing games, reading, or watching videos.It seems to have a better wi-fi connection than does the older verson.  Same wi-fi at my house, but more bars on this Kindle.

Reviews.Title: I don't go anywhere without it!!!
Reviews.Author: Laurie
Reviews.Content: It's awesome!! I would highly recommend it to anyone that loves to read, watch movies, check on Facebook activity, email accounts and lots of cool apps. Plus much more. You have to own one to see all the things it can do. I'm not new to the Kindle. This is my third one and they just keep getting better! Great job Amazon. Thank you!!

Reviews.Title: Such Fun!
Reviews.Author: JS1
Reviews.Content: I have had e-readers for as many years as they have been available, and this is such a leap to a great upgrade.  This cross between a laptop/tablet and an e-reader is everything I expected and much more.  It takes a little time to acquaint yourself with all the features, but I love it and how it is mostly intuitive.  I do think it is important to purchase it from Amazon, since some friends of mine purchased theirs at other outlets and were clueless how to set it up.  My Amazon account allowed for it to be user-ready when I received it and sync with my email and desktop computer immediately, along with providing me access to all the books I had purchased previously and quick purchase and download capabilities for future purchases.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for consuming Amazon content
Reviews.Author: Brian "Brian Freeman"
Reviews.Content: I bought this even though I have the iPad 3 because I wanted to be able to have my Kindle books read to me by a decent sounding text-to-speech voice while I drive. This does that perfectly.  I also love how some audible.com books can be purchased at a discount when you buy books on the Kindle.I am a Prime member and watch the streaming shows on it too.  This device is perfect if you are an Amazon / book junkie like me. I am glad I have it to compliment my iPad.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire...
Reviews.Author: CaroleAnn
Reviews.Content: I upgraded to the Fire HD after realizing I may never purchase another hardback/paperback again! Having the extensive book selection available for instant download from Amazon is better than living next door to a library. My problem with library rentals was that the borrowed book had to be returned within the designated time limit whether I had finished reading it or not- no such problem with the Kindle. I love having a selection on my Kindle and being able to read and finish it at my convenience. I appreciate the excellent selection of apps available, whether free or for a nominal cost- so does our young grandson...an avid 'Angry Birds' fan.  I'm anxious to see how well the non-glare aspect of the Fire HD performs this summer while reading outside on the sunny porch. The one thing I miss on the HD is the little light on the on/off switch on my Kindle Fire  that turns from amber to green when the unit is fully charged. Except for that, I'm very happy with the upgrade- I feel it is well worth the cost of purchase!

Reviews.Title: Upgraded from Kindle FIRE
Reviews.Author: Steven
Reviews.Content: Bigger, bolder screen, HD quality, sound is incredible ... what's not to love?  And now our younger son can inherit the 7" Kindle FIRE (great device as well .. just went new for Christmas).

Reviews.Title: Great tool for college
Reviews.Author: jojo25
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my daughter who is in her 3rd year of college.  She loves the versatility of using it as a reader, a textbook resource as well as a research tool. Easier than a laptop to haul around.  Best buy ever.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Charlie
Reviews.Content: Love it and use it for all things.  First thing I open in the morning and last item to close at night.  Love the color, the easy use and understanding of the product.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great device!
Reviews.Author: Tim Fox
Reviews.Content: I also had one of the original Kindle Fires. I used it some, but not extensively.I'm really glad I upgraded! The enhanced graphics and larger screen are great. Web browsing is much easier (for my 'older' eyes), The sound is amazing! Reading on it is easy - I've even started back doing more reading again.I looked at more expensive devices with more functionality but chose the 8.9 Fire.Love this device. The functionality and price point were just right.

Reviews.Title: Very cool
Reviews.Author: Steve Bell
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD 8.9 is a very cool tablet/e-reader.  The video quality is second to none and the back lighting for reading is a great improvement, as I do most of my reading at night or in a vehicle at work (don't tell anyone).  It's a bit more difficult to hold and it takes a bit of getting used to because of the format, but it is an awesome gadget to have on the road and in places where the laptop just can't travel.  Highly recommended for the price

Reviews.Title: Super Sized
Reviews.Author: L. Glenn
Reviews.Content: I loved the original Kindle Fire, and this one is even better.  Items are large enough so I canselect with my finger rather than a stylus, and all the images are big and beautiful.  The onlydrawback is the increase in weight, but given the advantages, it is well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Going Small
Reviews.Author: Over 60
Reviews.Content: I have always avoided tablets because I like a big monitor.  I love my knidle Fire 8.9".  The wireless allows me to take everywhere unlike a PC.  I have hesitated being dragged into the 21st century, but glad I finally made the leap.  There is a small learning curve when it comes to the cloud versus the device, but It is a nice option if you don't won't to pay for more memory.  The picture quality is excellant.Some of the cons are all the extras you should buy that don't come standard with the kindle (charger, cables for uploading music from computer, and cover).  The pros definitely out weight the cons.  I would definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: gf loves her kindle
Reviews.Author: Andy
Reviews.Content: Wasn't sure about this for my gf for Xmas. Rest assured she loves the kindke. I didn't want to jump on then apple bandwagon.  The resolution is amazing, sound is acceptable. For streaming videos this is perfect!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: S. Shortridge "Matty's Mommy"
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle!!! You can do everything from reading books (of course), to checking email, browsing facebook, listening to music, and watching netflix or even skyping. I use the Kindle most of all to play Sims or Solitaire. Whatever you use this Kindle for, the sound is awesome and the picture is amazing. One last thing, you can access your video library (plus others) on your Kindle from your Amazon account. I purchased a movie months ago, that I watch randomly on my computer from time to time and the sound always seems awful even though my ear buds are Sony. However, I watched that same movie on my Kindle Fire (with the same ear buds) and the sound was astonishing!!! Amazing buy!!!

Reviews.Title: favorite gadget!
Reviews.Author: Mamma bear
Reviews.Content: I use my fire all the time and I don't know how I managed without one!  Great for travel too!  I can do almost anything on my fire than I can on my laptop.  The picture and sound are very impressive.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Peggy
Reviews.Content: Product came fast delivery and as expected. Good supplier. no problems at all with this product. very happy and good price

Reviews.Title: Great Device - Far More Than Just An E-Reader
Reviews.Author: I'm Wolfies "imwolfies"
Reviews.Content: I received the Kindle Fire HD 8.9", 32 GB, without the special offers,as a Christmas gift in December 2012.  It's been great to be able to download various books and search the web.  It's been quite efficient with the various apps that I've installed.  I haven't spent one penny on a book yet.  In time I will, but find it not necessary at the moment.  Another great advantage is that I am able to access my college course materials, via the web, and not have to wait until I get home to study or lug around a bunch of books all the time.I am new at using a tablet type electronic but am getting familiar with it.  I never knew that there were so many free books.  I'm sure that I will keep adding to my collection.  Love to read, but don't have the time to do so every moment of the day.  However, it's nice to have a personal library close at hand. I personally like the large screen, for it makes reading quite enjoyable and not as tiring as reading a traditional book.  I hope that Amazon keeps improving their product and may there be many more happy readers in the world.

Reviews.Title: 5 stars
Reviews.Author: E Perry
Reviews.Content: I got this to bridge the gap between a tablet and ereader and it is that and more. I do not have a smart phone, do not want to pay a lot of money for a data plan, so this really fits the bill. I looked at an Ipad, but too much money. I still have not signed up for the At and T deal but I will soon. That was another reason I got this, the At and T deal for a year is a no brainer. Also I really like reading books on this screen much better than my Kindle keyboard. I like being able to adjust the background. Amazon prime membership also is a good deal for all the video screening shows.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Marcia
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my husband. He loves it. He has trouble reading books, because his eyesight has gotten bad. The Kindle brought the enjoyment of books back into his life. It also helps with his church scriptures.

Reviews.Title: Perfect.
Reviews.Author: George Z.
Reviews.Content: Took about a month to make my mind up. I compared the Kindle, Nook, Nexus and the iPad mini. I was looking for an e reader that wasn't just an e reader. This fits the bill perfectly. If you want to read books, stream or download movies, browse the internet or look at pictures its excellent. I read reviews that said how good the screen and speakers were and they were right. But in the end my view doesn't matter, it was a present for my Wife and she loves it.

Reviews.Title: my kindle fire hd purchase
Reviews.Author: marvin smith
Reviews.Content: all i can say that it was a gift for my wife and she was and still is super happy.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindles!
Reviews.Author: TheQ's
Reviews.Content: I have multiple Kindles and love them all, especially my new Kindle Fire HD.  I am so happy with it that when my friends were asking me to show how it works I got carried away and sounded to myself like a salesperson!

Reviews.Title: Great for my streaming movies
Reviews.Author: J. Kopchok
Reviews.Content: Have been using this device since December. Bought both the 7 in. and 8.9" to compare and decided to stick with this larger unit. No !question the smaller device was easier to handle and the decision wasn't as simple as I hoped. The faster processor and slightly larger screen won me over. I have side-loaded several apps that weren't available on Amazon and everything works great. I supplemented the  purchase with a Roo Origami cover and it's fabulous.

Reviews.Title: I'm really loving my new Kindle Fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Daileyk05
Reviews.Content: I have really been enjoying my new Kindle Fire HD 8.9".  I had an older Kindle so my next purchase was going to be a tablet of some sort for playing games and surfing the web, but when my original Kindle died, I decided to invest in the Kindle Fire HD 8.9" and I'm so glad I did!  The color and clarity is awesome and the sound is amazing.  I would recommend this Kindle...it's a great buy for the price.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: mary pankratz
Reviews.Content: the kinkle was a christmas gift for my son and he loved it.  He is very impressed with the hd screen

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: Joy L. Dabbs
Reviews.Content: Love ,Love this Kindle it is great and can stand up to most tablets too. Best part is it is easy to use I am 67 and can figure it anyone can don't let this one slip by again a great value !!

Reviews.Title: love, love, love
Reviews.Author: Anita Tiller
Reviews.Content: My husband loved the kindle fire hd 8.9.  He did not think he would use one but I know him better than he knows himself.  He absolutely love it.  He thinks Santa was great this year.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire 8.9
Reviews.Author: Nicole Rodney
Reviews.Content: love it the only thing that's missing is a camera its kinda crazy that this device offers so much but not a actual camera

Reviews.Title: My Kindle
Reviews.Author: cheryl scibelli
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating beacause I cannot live without it now!  Having so much fun with it, and it goes everywhere with me!

Reviews.Title: big boy kindle!
Reviews.Author: Dennis Chinea
Reviews.Content: whats not to like  all of the same or better features w a bigger screen and not so much money  I have not got the handle on working the web great yet - have to download some things before i can view but I think its just me learning to use the darn thing better  love it and use it every day!

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: Denise Daly
Reviews.Content: This Kindole was a Christmas gift to my husband.  Shortly after he fractured 3 ribs in a go-cart accident and has been using the Kindle ever since.  He can access email, watch videos, look at the Internet "news" and just occupy himself all day.  He likes the larger screen, the vibrant color and the easy to use features.  We are low tech people but he's figured most of it out without help.

Reviews.Title: Brenda
Reviews.Author: BRENDA
Reviews.Content: This is by far the most universal piece of technology that I have ever owned. I have many other pieces and they have taken a back seat to my Kindle Fire HD.
