I have done so much with this device. It goes everywhere I go. My life consists of family, friends, work and play. The Kindle is a part of all four.

Reviews.Title: More Impressed than I expected
Reviews.Author: Heather A
Reviews.Content: My Kindle Fire HD 8.9 came a few days ago and wow! I'm very impressed with this little machine. I've had an iPad2 since release day and use it daily. I had no need for anything else, but decided to purchase the Fire to use mainly as a digital wifi picture frame. Now that it's here I have a feeling I'll be putting my Kindle Keyboard away and using this for my main reading device... especially since I now know how to get whispersync working on non-Amazon, non-DRM books and documents via Amazon's cloud, between all my devices using the Kindle apps.So why do I like this? For one is the price... I got it for $250 which is a fair price point for this device. I don't think I'd love it as much at $299 and would probably have bought an iPad mini at that point. Needless to say, I'm glad I didn't.The screen is gorgeous! I don't have a retina iPad so I'm comparing it to my iPad2 and Macbook Pro. I love it.The build is substantial. It feels like a quality product... not a cheap tablet... and it looks beautiful.The packaging is very Apple-like. Simple and sleek. Felt very nice to open and reveal the toy inside.The Amazon integration is wonderful. If you have Prime this is a no-brainer.What I don't like... it has a bit of a lag and feels slower than my iPad. Not quite as responsive, but not bad enough to make the device seem unusable.I also don't like the location of the charging port. Being on the long-side of the device made it a little tricky to find a stand that would accommodate the longish stem on the included USB cable when docking horizontally. I was able to get around this by finding a micro-usb cable with a very tiny head so there's a bit more clearance between the KF and the table when set in a generic tablet stand. I'd be much happier if the charging port was on the short-side of the device. Charging while watching a movie, or in my case using as a photo frame, is sometimes a necessity.So far those are the only cons I've discovered with this little tablet. I've only had it for about 3 days so that may change, but I all-in-all I'm quite impressed... and that's saying something as I'm quite an Apple fan girl and never expected to own any tablet other than an iPad.I would recommend the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 to anyone considering a tablet on a budget... especially if you are a Prime member. The integration is wonderful and the ease of use is nothing to sneeze at. You won't feel like you "settled" for a cheap Android tablet, you'll feel like you scored a deal on a nice tablet you'll enjoy using.

Reviews.Author: tammy
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with the fast delivery of the Kindle Fire HD's.  We love them :D...............Thanks So Much :D

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up and even easier to download new books.  The resolution is amazing and easy to return to the place you left off if you can read the whole book in one sitting.

Reviews.Title: A few things I miss
Reviews.Author: Megan
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire. I had an Kindle ereader that I love, but i received the Fire for Christmas. It is infinitely easier to browse and buy books on the Fire, however there are a few  things I miss about my Kindle. I loved the screen of the Kindle, and it hardly seemed like I was reading on a computer at all. The feature that I miss the most though, is the ability to organize your books. It's much more time consuming to look through my books now because they are all in one big list. Before, I could look under young adult fiction or historical fiction and find what I wanted. I wish Amazon could make an update or something to make this possible.

Reviews.Title: kindle # 3
Reviews.Author: naomi
Reviews.Content: this is my third kindle and i love it . i passed  my first on to the grandkids but its hands off on the tablet. the color is great i use this all the time we have in our home two computers, one laptop and a notebook and the kindle is my drug of choice.

Reviews.Title: Amazon Kindle Fire HD 8.9" Review
Reviews.Author: Dr. Who
Reviews.Content: The Amazon Kindle Fire HD 8.9" is a fantastic tablet that is affordable on any budget. Unless money is not a constraint, you can save over $250 by purchasing the Kindle Fire HD 8.9" instead of the iPad 4.DESIGN:Although the Kindle Fire HD 8.9" is cheap, the chassis feels solid. It's not the aluminum build that you'll find on an iPad, but it's well-constructed nonetheless. The Volume and On/Off buttons are not as flush with the body as they are on the 7'' version.PERFORMANCE:The iPad 4 and Nexus 10 offer smoother performance, better processors, and a better web browsing experience. The Kindle can't compete in these categories. Nevertheless, the Kindle Fire HD has a very responsive interface in its own right. Do not expect glitch-ridden, shoddy performance simply because of the low price.SCREEN AND SPEAKERS:Picture quality on the screen is sharp, clear, and vivacious. It is a joy to read or watch anything on the Kindle Fire HD. Amazon fused the touch sensor with the LCD display to reduce screen glare. This is crucial for people who like to use their tablets outdoors or in well-lit conditions.Most tablets use a single speaker to simulate stereo sound. The Kindle Fire HD actually uses two speakers that are visible externally. The result is that the sound produced by the Kindle Fire HD is incomparable among tablets.PORTS:I was able to connect the Kindle to my projector via the micro-HDMI port, and the results were outstanding: 110 inches of HD content on my living room wall, originating from my Kindle Fire!FINAL WORD:The Kindle Fire HD 8.9" is an amazing tablet at a very affordable price. The tablet boasts a mesmerizing IPS display, booming sound, and incredible battery life. Sure, the Nexus 10 ($399) and the iPad 4 ($499) have better processors and higher resolution screens, but they also cost significantly more. If you sign up for an Amazon Student account, you can buy the Kindle Fire HD 8.9" for $249 today!For a more detailed review, please check the comments below.

Reviews.Title: After Santa delivered this, my son has not played with his other Christmas toys!
Reviews.Author: Michael D. King
Reviews.Content: The Kindle was recommended by a couple of Computer savvy friends and I heeded their advice. They were so right. This is a great product with unlimited potential. Son's can play games, get on the Internet for school projects, download music or just sit and read a book. One of my best investments.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Burge
Reviews.Content: THIS WAS A CHRISTMAS GIFT FOR MY SON AND HE'S HAVING A BLAST WITH IT!  IT KEEPS HIM OFF MY COMPUTER AND GIVES HIM TOTAL ACCESS TO EVERYTHING HE NEEDS.

Reviews.Title: Love this kindle
Reviews.Author: MCC Nursing Student
Reviews.Content: My son left my kindle for on top of his car and drive off... It fell off his roof an got run over. He had to tell me the news and I responded with "that's ok, you can buy me the HD and he did :) it's awesome!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I would write a long review on the Kindle Fire, but it would all come down to the same thing...I love it! The display is amazing, the processor is very fast, the audio is excellent. I have had it for about a month, use it every day, and have not found anything that I do not like.

Reviews.Title: Super Size!
Reviews.Author: Karol
Reviews.Content: I have been absolutely pleased with everything about it. I really thoroughly studied  & compared over the internet & in the stores before I made my decision . The size is perfect. I have a few friends that got the IPad and after seeing mine said they wish they had bought the Kindle because they felt theirs was too bulky & not convenient to tote aroun d(not to mention the huge price difference) .& were also as  pleased as I was with the gorgeous color & clarity. It is also very easy to get to all the features such as mail, internet,movies,books & the magazines are a perfect size-display very well on that size screen. Lots of great apps. I don't understand people saying that there aren't that many apps as some others.. Good Grief how many do you need?-they have a wonderful variety!As you can see by the above ,  I would highly recommend it to any first time buyer or anyone who wants to move up to a bigger screen as I did.

Reviews.Title: First of Many
Reviews.Author: Erin
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet ever. Although I have played with a few that my friends own this is by far the best one. The picture quality is awesome, there are 1000 things I can do with it, and I am learning new things every day about it. I am not a techy person so I can't get into any kind of debate over the megabite details and so on, but for the novice person who is not interested in spending $600 for a tablet this one is the way to go. My husband has an iPad at work, once he played with my Kindle he went out and bought one literally the next day.

Reviews.Title: More than I expected for the cost
Reviews.Author: Danny Tompkins
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas present for my tech challenged wife. She loves it. I spent a lot of time comparing it to the Ipad Mini. Main considerations for the Fire HD 8.9" compared to the Ipad Mini1. Cost .2. Size3. Weight, ease of handling4. Screen definition.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire  8.9 inch
Reviews.Author: Dennis Kafka
Reviews.Content: I only have very positive good thoughts about this new Kindle. I mostly use the 7 inch model, but I bought this larger tablet as a gift for my wife. Due to the fact that we both have grown to love the Amazon Company with their excellent supply of products, I saw no reason to change to any other tablet brand. These newer Kindle Tablets are a bit faster and have several other improvements over the very first model. The optional touch screen pens that simulates your finger is a must have item for us.

Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE REVIEW
Reviews.Author: CP1
Reviews.Content: I LOVE EVERYTHING ABOUT MY NEW KINDLE FIRE 8.9 INCH TABLET FROM THE VERY CLEAR 1080P SCREEN TO THE DOLBY DIGITAL  SPEAKERS.IT IS VERY EASY TO USE AND THE SOFTWARE THAT AMAZON HAS ON THIS TABLET MAKES IT VERY EASY NAVIGATE TO THE CONTENT YOU ARE INTRESTED IN,THE EMAIL  CLIENT AMAZON USES HOTMAIL, GMAIL ECT. MAKE CHECKING READING AND SENDING EMAIL A BREEZE,THE SCEEN IS 1080P AND IN MY OPION JUST AS CLEAR AND SHARPE AS THE LATEST IPAD OFFERING.THE CONTENT THAT AMAZON HAS TO SELECT FROM  WHILE USING THIS TABLET IS SECOND TO NONE ,THEY HAVE NEW RELEASE MOVIES  BOOKS MAGAZINES MUSIC AND TV SHOWS AND YOU CAN ACESS THE PRIME INSTANT VIDEO SERVICE THAT AMAZON OFFERS FROM THIS TABLET.THE BATTERY LIFE LAST A VERY LONG TIME WITH CONSTANT USE.IT CHARGES VERY FAST WITH THE AMAZON POWER CHARGER SOLD SEPERATLY BY AMAZON

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Buzzard
Reviews.Content: Very easy to set-up email, Netflix, Pandora, Skype, etc, and of course, Amazon.  Wireless works great from anywhere in my house and even from about 50' outside.  The screen resolution makes everything really pop and the stereo speakers sound great.  With headphones, it sounds even better.I purchased 2 micro HDMI to HDMI cables for it.  One 15' to use at home connected to my TV and a 6' to take with me when I travel to connect to the TV in the hotel.  It's great to have all my streaming content from Netflix and Amazon wherever I go.  I did sideload the Dolphin browser and a version of flash that works with it, so that I can watch other video formats.The APP store is really overloaded with games for kids.  I guess people must use their devices as babysitters.  But I did find some useful free APPS.  I recommend YOUZEEK, which seems to have all the music on youtube in categories, by artist. I am a guitar player, so I can plug my Kindle Fire HD into my PA, fire up YOUZEEK and jam along with my favorite artists while I watch the video (if youtube has the video). I also recommend the PBS video APP, Flixter, Urbanspoon, IMDb, Norton Mobile Security free APPS.I purchased the powerfast charger with my Kindle and it works great.I also bought a rooCase for it which is a great value.  It puts the Kindle to sleep when closed and wakes it up when you open the case.  I also control the volume from the dropdown menu, so I don't have to deal with the hard to locate on/off and volume rocker buttons.  Those buttons are the only thing I would change about the Kindle Fire HD.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Nancy J. Graham
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy the size of the larger screen and the HD is great. I am very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: great Tablet
Reviews.Author: james obeng
Reviews.Content: Its awesome and I'm really loving every minute of it,I think it definitely is in the same class as the IPADS and Galaxy Tabs,but for me this is the best

Reviews.Title: Kindle's are awesome
Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: This is my 5th kindle and I love the bigger screen and HD feature. They are so great for traveling, sitting by the pool, waiting in the parking lot. I would recommend kindle to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Everything we wanted and MORE...
Reviews.Author: Joyce A. Gilpin
Reviews.Content: This was a gift to my son and he simply LOVES it. No problems, whatsoever. We couldn't be happier. excellent...

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Ruby M. Niccum
Reviews.Content: I like this product very well and the print is very easy to read.  It is also very easy to hold.

Reviews.Title: Love my new Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: DTheisen
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD 8.9 is everything I was looking for in a tablet, and at a very reasonable price. I use it just about every day.. to read books, catching up on Downton Abbey, and play my games.

Reviews.Title: So Addicting!
Reviews.Author: K.Bnck
Reviews.Content: I have never owned a tablet before, but have played with my mother's ipad often. This Kindle Fire is every bit as user friendly. Navigation is different than the Apple products, but easy to figure out with trial and error. I downloaded a cheap ($.99) user guide from Amazon which was very helpful.Email set up was a breeze, watched my first rented movie and the screen quality and music quality are just fantastic. Nothing took away from my enjoyment of the movie (Pride and Prejudice- highly recommend it!!).The battery life if amazing. Much longer than my Android phone doing the same amount of web surfing, emailing, etc...My son tells me not to charge it until it is dead, not sure if that is true, but I follow his advice :)One thing to learn is that to remove content from your device, you need to log on to your Amazon account and choose "Manage my Kindle" . Of course you can download anything by starting from  your device ("Store"), but to REMOVE items you need to log in to your account. This will allow you to add and delete your Library of books, music, and video. Amazon has an ok selection of movies, but I was disappointed that one movie I wanted was not available for rent or to own. Not sure why this was the case.

Reviews.Title: GIFT FOR MY WIFE
Reviews.Author: KOENIGS
Reviews.Content: A XMAS GIFT FOR MY WIFE, SHE LOVES IT. ONE OF OUR FRIENDS HAS AN APPLE TABLET, AFTER SHE SAW THE KINDLE SHE IS GETTING RID OF THE APPLE TABLET

Reviews.Title: Love, Love this!!
Reviews.Author: Denise
Reviews.Content: I have always been a huge fan of reading paperback books, never was without one, but with the Kindle and Nooks getting more and more popular I started checking them out.  It took me a few months to seriously start looking at them and then the new Kindle Fire HD 8.9 came out and I decided this was for me.  So glad I got it (Christmas present to myself :)!!!!!!Didn't realize It was so much more than just a book reader. Love, love, love it!!!!! So glad I talked myself into getting it.If you are looking for one of these devices, this is the one to get.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous Purchase
Reviews.Author: Sally Rogers
Reviews.Content: Me and my family are more than happy with the Kindle Fire 8.9".  We use it daily and the entire family loves it!  Defintely recommend for a family!

Reviews.Title: Funtastic
Reviews.Author: Rebecca
Reviews.Content: I retired in June . I wanted something to keep my mind stimulated. When I learned about all the games on the Kindle, I had to have it. I've read several books. Now I'm kin to a Kindle family. Your customer service is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Great wifi connection, so far not observed any issue connecting on any public wifi
Reviews.Author: Robert  Hanson
Reviews.Content: Use my device almost everywhere I go, have not see any low speed or drop connection when using my Kindle Fire, whether I'm using it for internet browsers search or watch a movie from the cloud.My Kindle is a Kindle Fire HD 8.9, Dual-band Wi-Fi, with 32Gbit internal memory.  I did not select the 4LG, thinking that I would try using (in the future AT&T; cell phone) for a hot spot and connect to it for Wi-Fi if I can't find any Wi-Fi to connect with.  I did op for the higher internal memory 32Gbit over the 16Gbit, I believe Amazon does make suggestion when looking to purchase this unit for streaming movies or if you are  going run lots games apps.  If you are use-to any of the Kindle e-readers, I would suggest buying their higher Kindle fire HD battier charger VS using the e-reader charger.  I'm currently using the e-reader charger on my Kindle Fire HD, but it does take up to 4 to 5 hours to completely charge the battier when dead or close to being dead.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9 - Highly Recommend
Reviews.Author: R. Blough "Rick Blough"
Reviews.Content: This product can not be beat for the price. It does everything I have come to expect plus some. Purchasing and reading books with the Kindle is the original reason I purchased this item. Playing with it now for a few weeks I have found other neat features that will have me using it more often. Absolutely love it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome piece of Equipment!!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I already had a Kindle reader before I decided to purchase the Kindle Fire 8.9 and I love it, but after much thought I decided to try the large and more multi-featured tablet.........best decision I ever made.  I read books on it, I keep up with my work calendar, check all my many email accounts and handle paperwork from my office and my students and my newphew plays games...... it's a win win for everyone.  I am still learning how to use all the features available, but over all, I would recommend this product to anyone for both pleasure and business use.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Dance of Life
Reviews.Content: This gift was purchased for my daughter. Her expression on X-Mas says it all. A great gift - she uses it daily. It was securely packaged in a nice box and in great condition.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded Expectations
Reviews.Author: Mels23
Reviews.Content: Many wonder (including myself) if I work for Amazon...I can't say enough great things.  I adore this product, I've purchased two (initially for my 5 & 6 year olds) and everyone in the house uses it.  I have an IPad, but, I use the Kindle whenever my sons aren't.  I don't want to get started on Kindle Freetime I'll run out of characters.  The best thing since the creation of Apps.  My little ones have a pletera of books/videos/learning games/games at their disposal.  The books are interactive, on their level, I'll probably never (or rarely) purchase a hardback book for them.  It surely promotes reading...to say the least.  It was also very easy to add music and music videos to their devices per the Amazon Cloud and/or connecting the kindle to my computer via USB.  Almost impossible with apple without purchasing via ITunes. Did I say I Love the Kindle Fire HD?

Reviews.Title: My Favorite Thing
Reviews.Author: M. Price "The Divine Miss M"
Reviews.Content: My Kindle Fire HD was my Christmas present to myself and it is my favorite thing.  I can't imagine life before it.

Reviews.Title: kindle junkie
Reviews.Author: 5 STAR....Great fun!...
Reviews.Content: This is my third kindle and they just get better and better with each upgrade.  Wish they had external memory increase option.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Hang'in with Daddo
Reviews.Content: This device is simply awesome! I went through 3 Asus TF700T's that had screen issues before giving this a try. The display is just as good if not better than the Asus TF700T, the audio quality is great (even compared to what I've seen with the Nexus 10), and the performance of the Kindle's dual core is comparable to the Asus' quad core.You also can't beat Amazon's customer service! I just wish Amazon wasn't so closed minded about allowing access to other, unmentioned, app stores. They would probably sell a lot more of these and the 7" models if they would. As long as they keep up their customer service and book/media services, or improved their app offerings, they would have nothing to worry about (yes, I realize you can side-load apps and can even go further if you wish).I'm VERY happy with this purchase!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire Fan
Reviews.Author: impalalady
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my new Kindle Fire HD 8.9".  I bought the original Kindle Fire in November of 2011 and loved it.  My husband was constantly snagging it away from me when I got home from work because he likes the Solitaire game on it.  So, when the new Fire HD came out, I decided to get it for me and let him have the original Fire.  I read and search the web and play games, and I love the larger size. Now we both have a Fire and we both are quite happy!

Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: Penny Verdigan
Reviews.Content: I HAVE USED THIS A LITTLE SINCE I RECIEVED IT AND LIKE IT VERY MUCH, I WOUILD RECOMMEND IT TO ANYONE WHO LIKES A MOBILE DEVICE OF THIS TYPE.

Reviews.Title: Everything I want in a tablet
Reviews.Author: KWK
Reviews.Content: It's fast, capable, and the picture is great.  The kids love it (freetime is terrific) for games, movies, and books.  We really have enjoyed using it as a portable movie device through the HDMI to the different screens around the house with Netflix and Prime videos.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Debi Lucas
Reviews.Content: So far we have no problem whatsoever with the Kindle Fire.  We love the screen size, at our age, we need it, especially when playing some of the games and Word.  We haven't tried music, videos or the camera yet.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD review
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Jones
Reviews.Content: I love it more than I expected. Data plan is a very good deal. I have recommended it to friends.

Reviews.Title: The Ultimate Fire!
Reviews.Author: Sooner1906
Reviews.Content: I bought the first generation fire a couple of months after it was released, I was happy with it despite some technical glitches and issues...it served its purpose well as a media consumption device. Two months ago my wife bought me the Kindle Fire HD 8.9, and it blew me away. Every complaint that I had about the original fire was addressed, and then some. The 8.9 is great, it serves its purpose as a media consumption device but its size makes it useful for school work also (buy a good BT keyboard). Some people complain about the ads, but honestly I enjoy them, some of the advertisements are pretty cool and some of the offers are pretty good. In my opinion it is not worth $15 to disable them.Pros:-A must have for Amazon prime members-fast and powerful processing and browsing-great screen resolution-Great speakers (this was a major complaint with the original fire I can now watch NBA league pass with the speakers turned up without earphones)-Great price-Great book/movie/app selection-X-Ray (I didn't think i would use this feature at first but it is actually pretty cool. Watching movies and being able to get information and recommendations is great)-Upgraded the silk browser (I didn't love the original silk browser but this version is pretty awesome, the suggestions and bookmark tab is very useful)Free time (love this app, easy to set up and very useful for anyone who has kids)-Upgraded book and magazine experience (scrolling and page turning animations are smoother, pages look crisp and easy on the eyes).Cons:-Customization (This is really a stretch considering the fact that i actually like the UI used for the fire, but it is not a native android experience and thus not very customization)-No memory expansion (this would have taken the 8.9 from 5 stars to 7 stars. I understand why Amazon did not do it but it would have been nice)-No front facing camera or GPS (these are really minor issues, there was only one time where I could have used the front facing camera but I also have a smart phone so no real complaint)I love my Kindle fire HD I would recommend it to anyone. Amazon really stepped up their game with this product!

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 for my wife as a Christmas present.  She was always complaining that she could never get on the computer because of me!  I will not make this a long review, as others have already done so.  I will say, however, that the Kindle has exceeded all of my wife's expectations, as well as my own.  It was not difficult to set the email account up with Verizon on the Kindle.  She has enjoyed the Facebook app. and uses it daily.  She finds it very easy to surf through the Internet, and equally as easy to send and receive email.  I have had a lot of fun with Amazon Prime watching the old Western "B" movies...movies I have not seen in 50 years--Roy Rogers, Johnny Mack Brown, Gene Autry, etc.  There are an awful lot of movies offered through Amazon Prime that are free to download, and I find this feature to be most useful and a super value.  New owners of a Kindle get a free 30 day membership with Prime, and after that, it is $79 a year.  I expect full well to renew after the 30 days is up.  I did have one problem however;  for some reason I was unable to download videos after 10 days.  I called Amazon service on a weekend, and they told me they would turn it over to the technical department.  I called the next day to see the status of it, and was told it would take up to 3 business days to address my problem.  I received an email from Amazon late the same day, tried the video downloads, and yep, it is now working.  As far as the charger not included with the unit, I don't think that is a big deal.  I purchased a wall charger, cord, car charger and a nice protective leather (like) cover for under $15.00 over E-Bay which included shipping.  So, I was able to purchase the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 for $249.00 on a one day only sale, and I think this was a terrific value for the money.  Knowing what I know now, would I make the same decision?  Absolutely!  There may be better tablets out there, but for the price and the value received, I don't think you can beat the Kindle....

Reviews.Title: Complete Success!
Reviews.Author: Kris James
Reviews.Content: My husband is good with computers, but slow to adapt to new technology. Over the past few years he's slowly joined the mobile device age. Before his birthday in October, he said he wanted a tablet for a combination birthday-Christmas present, but he didn't know which one. We both did hours of research on the various options (and boy are there a lot), but in the end, there was only one obvious choice for us: the Kindle Fire HD 8.9".My husband uses it to check his fantasy sports teams while watching the games on TV, so the wi-fi version is perfect for us. Its speed is impressive, and the screen size helps him avoid the mobile versions of his favorite websites (traditionalist, isn't he?). The tablet's sensitivity is pretty awesome, too. We were playing a game app involving rolling balls and navigable mazes, and I swear, I could feel the weight of the pixel ball as it bumped around the wooden barriers.We're Amazon Prime members, as well, so the freedom to continue watching our favorite free shows and movies was a definite factor in choosing another Kindle device for our household.

Reviews.Title: good enough
Reviews.Author: av Joe
Reviews.Content: The screen is big enough to read easily.The web pages load pretty fast off the WIFI internet.Apps open and close pretty fast.That is pretty much 98% of what you want from this machine.If this is what you expect from this machine, you will be happy.This is not a laptop.

Reviews.Title: oh yes!n
Reviews.Author: gail weatherbee
Reviews.Content: did alot of research on tablets and when they say the resolution is equal to or better to the IPAD then it is.  love the APPS and the internet access.  Have already bought one for my son.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HD 8.9..easy
Reviews.Author: Susan Davis
Reviews.Content: At first, I was totally overwhelmed by the Kindle when comparing it to my mother in law's IPad.  Then, I purchased an eye opening e-book that explained everything in easy to understand language.  From that day on, I am so thrilled I purchased the Kindle FIre 8.9 4G LTE instead.  Love the graphics and the sound and it's fast!!!  LOVE IT!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: RICK EZERSKY
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle & the Fire is the best so far. The HD resolution is awesome. The main reason I bought it is I read a lot at night and with the back lighted screen I don't have to get up and shut the light off. Also the pictures & maps are larger than on my Kindle Touch.I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: It's a Keeper
Reviews.Author: barbara cates
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle Fire HD 8.9" .  I can almost as much on it  as I can my Ipad. there a few appts that I wished it had. As far as getting on the web and surfing the net or checking my email, or Skype it is excellent

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Cat lover "Cat lover"
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my new Kindle. It's so much easier to turn off, No holding a switch to turn it off and it's way easier to remove unwanted books from your device or even from the carousal display.

Reviews.Title: Great product at a great price
Reviews.Author: GARY R HART
Reviews.Content: Wasn't totally convinced on purchasing this item, my son-in-law talked me into the Kindle.  Now that I have it, I love it, an awsome tool with amazing capabilities.  Don't know what I would do without it now.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Efrain V
Reviews.Content: Very cool. The wife loves it! Very user friendly. I would def recommend this product to anyone interested in purchasing a tablet.

Reviews.Title: My second Kindle
Reviews.Author: movie fan
Reviews.Content: Fantastic smooth flawless operator... but what else would you expect from Amazon after all I even buy my under ware here!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Mary Weiler
Reviews.Content: I would definitely recommend this Kindle!! I love it and I love all the things it can do. Wish I would have purchased it sooner.

Reviews.Title: my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Cory Campbell
Reviews.Content: Love it, Love it. Awesome tablet, picture and sound are unbelieveible. I have the 32G and it is very fast, no buffering.Streaming is fast and easy. Movies are just like using your Blueray player at home.

Reviews.Title: Love The Convenience
Reviews.Author: Richard Schaefer
Reviews.Content: I've thought about getting a eBook reader for quite a while and finally opted for the Kindle. It gives me just what I wanted. I did not like the fact that within a week of my purchase Amazon offered the same item for $50 less. I felt a bit ripped off by that. That is not a problem with the Kindle, but with Amazon's marketing strategy.I would recommend a design change to put the connection ports on the side. With the Kindle in a cover, the only way to close the cover is to position the Kindle with the ports along the lower edge. This means they hit you in the stomach if you use the Kindle while lying in bed. Connections on side would solve this problem.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Landy
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet, not overpriced and not any functions or features you will never use. The Kindle does what a tablet is meant to do very well, books and video.

Reviews.Title: Novice
Reviews.Author: Ruth Pauline Green "Knitbugmouse"
Reviews.Content: This technology is very new to me. But now I can buy all the books, games etc I want with no storage problem.  I have a large stash of hard cover books taking up way too much room and want to downsize and this is a very good investment towards that.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding!!!!
Reviews.Author: Trini
Reviews.Content: This kindle fire HD is amazing, the functionality is perfect,great sound, perfect viewing with 100% clarity. This tablet is really out of this world and the price is a plus.

Reviews.Title: My New Kindle Fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: Bella "Liset"
Reviews.Content: I received my new Kindle Fire today and I love it . I strongly recommend anyone to upgrade or purchase this kindle .

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!!
Reviews.Author: Confused Shopper "Carolyn B"
Reviews.Content: What a great product.  I can surf the net, listen to my music, read a book and not have to drag around a laptop or be stuck at my desk top.  It fits conveniently in my bag and my oversized purse.  I guess the only con, I would have is that I was it had a front and rear facing camera.  I am not that vain, where I take a lot of pics of myself so unless I am skyping or video chatting, I really will not use camera.

Reviews.Title: A great Tablet!
Reviews.Author: James L. Frear
Reviews.Content: I have one of the origional Kindle fires and this baby is defintley a superior inprovement.  It takes some training and study before you can really use it though, and I am an eperienced computer user.  As you can see I highly reccomend this product, especialy after checking every tablet out there except the iPad.  However, I don't reccomend this product for a senior or novice to computers except one wiling to study and read about its capabilities.  Given that: Get one and have fun!!

Reviews.Title: READ AWAY
Reviews.Author: DJ
Reviews.Content: The wife loves it.. easy on the  eye's no glare as with other products. User friendly and just the right price.

Reviews.Title: This is my 4th Kindle
Reviews.Author: bottomdollar
Reviews.Content: I have been unable to find anything I do not lie about it.  The added usb and hdmi ports make this the BEST buy I believe of all the tablets. I ahve approx 225 books, 60 movies and a lot of music on it. I go no where without it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire H>D> 8.0"
Reviews.Author: Michael J Gormly
Reviews.Content: More than adequate for my needs for a tablet.  Been looking at all of them, comparing and balancing my needs and what all had to offer.  For the money I am very satisfied. Easy to use once I got the hang of it.  I have been slowly adding things, apps, etc as I get use to it.  I am retired and the learning curve is a longer process for me.  But the display if outstanding, the response is great.  I like it

Reviews.Title: Excellent Tablet, Wonderful Performance, Great for Families!
Reviews.Author: Shibby23
Reviews.Content: I spent countless days researching a great first tablet for the whole family, and had it narrowed down to the KFHD 8.9 and iPad Mini, based on size, price, and available support. I went to a nearby store to test the actual product, and walked out shortly after that with a Kindle Fire HD 8.9, and immediately fell in love. I have an Asus Transformer Prime rooted and ROM'ed, but the kids don't do so well with it's large size. My three year old gets especially frustrated trying to play a game on the Asus. I got the KFHD set up with FreeTime, and he went to town with it, no frustration.The screen is worlds better, although it's over an inch smaller diagonally. Still not as bright as the iPad mini, but pound for pound, on par with the best displays on the market today.I opted to buy the 32GB WiFi only tablet, and the price was hard to beat for the included hardware. I was a little sad to see a lack of SDHC expansion, as my Asus has over 40GB full already.Battery life so far is great. Out of the box it went over six hours of continuous use before it needed charged up. I charged it overnight, and have not put it down in the last 8 hours. I watched a full movie, set up some new apps, played Angry Birds, and the processor got quite warm. It currently is holding a 40% charge. Not bad.The WiFi speeds coupled with the powerful dual core CPU clocked at 1.5ghz make for a super responsive and smooth experience during use.I was able to use WiFi hotspot on my Sprint phone to allow the KFHD 8.9 an internet connection while in the car last night, and I must say, it works so much better than the Asus ever does. I suspect the KFHD Dual Band Dual Antenna may be the difference.I was also ecstatic to learn that students get an Amazon Prime membership for only $39 PER YEAR. And with all the features that come with Prime membership, this is one of the best deals.The only disappointments I have are the lack of Google Play Store, and that the non-slip back will not allow my company's vinyl sticker to adhere. The volume of apps available from Amazon makes up for the first, and finding a case or cover will solve the latter.Bottom Line: Great product. It is not an iPad or true Android, but in many ways it is better. And I walked out of the store only having spent $400. Five Stars all day.

Reviews.Title: Really Really BIG HIT!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Betsy Willey
Reviews.Content: Wonderful device. Friends are jealous and envious of the size. The person I gifted this to is very very happy. Well done on the choice of the size and price on this device. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: kenneth
Reviews.Content: This is my wifes sencond kindle. I thought she loved the 7" fire but this one is so much better. I am the Christmas hero this year. Thanks for the great product and the speedy shiping. Might even upgrade to Amazon Prime. Thanks Again!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: VJAW
Reviews.Content: Keep this new Kindle at your fingertips to enjoy the massive variety of apps, color and and internet look ups.  Does not limit my curiosity.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Jane Deaton
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my new Kindle Fire HD 8.9". It responds so quickly, I am able to download the books I enjoy without difficulty. I also downloaded scriptures which I used at church this past week and I was able to find chapter and verse and follow along without any problem. I am totaly impressed. I look forward to watching movies, and downloading pictures. No complaints at all. I did much research and reading of comments. Thank you for selling such a good product.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HD
Reviews.Author: allison johnson
Reviews.Content: Well I want one of these for myself..my daughter has been on it since Christmas eve.  she loves it and soon I will have one too.  Thanks and Happy New Year

Reviews.Title: Blown Away!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Seeds of Love"
Reviews.Content: I don' t give away accolades without merit ... Amazon has surpassed my expectations with the 8.9" Fire. Received today and everything is working 100 percent. I have not had a problem with operations or functionality. Learning to setup the device and navigate from one app to the other has been smooth.

Reviews.Title: But...some issues with free time
Reviews.Author: Hattie B. Holtapp "guh"
Reviews.Content: I love this thing.  However, if your illiterate child happens to try and escape Free Time, and obviously doesn't know the pass code, he or she will probably tap the blue writing underneath, which is the friendly offer to reset the Kindle back to its factory settings.  Also--it's basically impossible to install Scrabble, for some reason.

Reviews.Title: Bought it as a gift for my husband
Reviews.Author: Marcy Ann Alexander
Reviews.Content: so far its everything the best reviews said it was......movies have a good picture and the sound is amazing....still finding things and figuring it out but so far a great buy....he gave me an iPad mini for Christmas but we use these devices for entirely different reasons and his fits him perfectly....wouldnt mind having one myself....the screen size is nice...not too big and not too small..get a case...makes holding it much easier

Reviews.Title: Fixed all my issues with First Gen Fire
Reviews.Author: Baxterlf "baxterlf"
Reviews.Content: This has surpassed my expectations. I had the first generation 7" Fire and was happy with it but it had some short comings. All of those are now fixed with this device. The screen is greatly improved. The swipe keyboard is wonderful and now has predictions. The web browser is faster and smoother. All the Amazon features are improved and work seamlessly. Everyone is blown away when they try it out. I appreciate Amazon allowing side loading of apps and it is easily done. The email is tremendously improved and now includes calendar integration built in. So glad customer feedback was listened to.

Reviews.Title: I like it a lot more than I thought I would.
Reviews.Author: Linda P.
Reviews.Content: I love the size of it, the ease of use, the number of free items that I can download and the number of applications it has.

Reviews.Title: Having a great time!
Reviews.Author: B. Tiscia
Reviews.Content: Present from  my husband. Cant put it down.  Color and screen are beautiful. I can sit in any room with it and get excellent WiFi. Love playing games on it. So much more reasonable than an Ipad .

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Treva
Reviews.Content: Love it, Love it, Love it.  Received the Kindle Fire HD from my family for a Christmas present this year and was just over joyed.  I really didn't think I would get one as I have a Kindle with the keyboard already.  But the Fire HD is fantastic so far.  Received a one month free trial of Amazon Prime and I have been taking advantage of this service and will most likely sign up for this service at the end of my trial period.  I just stick it in my purse and go.  This is the greatest invention since the light bulb.

Reviews.Title: Loved it but...
Reviews.Author: Kindryll
Reviews.Content: I had to return it. I have arthritis and it was just too big for me. However it was perfect except for that! Wonderful color apps, so easy to use right out of the box. I got the smaller size and its perfect, I never leave home without it! If you are looking for a larger tablet you can't go wrong with this, it's wonderful!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: J. Rodarmel "jim"
Reviews.Content: I was never much of a reader, but I am now.  I love reading on my Kindle.  I find it hard to put down.  I've downloaded several books, and a couple of movies too!  I strongly recommend this!!

Reviews.Title: Great video quality
Reviews.Author: Luke2080
Reviews.Content: To be clear, I use a tablet for two reasons: reading books and watching movies.  Thats it.This thing is light, and the video quality is great.  Already a good addition to my laptop bag on flights.  And I can play Angry Birgs on a big screen.  So maybe three reasons I use a tablet.I plan to test out skype and some other features, and I'll update as I do.  For now, very content with its ability to let me consume content.  :-)

Reviews.Title: my hubby likes it
Reviews.Author: shielateodoro36
Reviews.Content: Got this as a Christmas gift for my hubby and he really likes it.  But, there's not a lot of cases available in the market for it so he's wary of taking it along on trips.  And I didn't order the fast charger with it, so USB charging via his laptop is a SLOW process.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9" Review
Reviews.Author: Vicki L.
Reviews.Content: Wow I am so busy learning all I can on the Kindle Fire and will take me some time to get it all I want it to be. I just love my Kindle reader, will have to update that soon.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Carl Riley
Reviews.Content: Love being able to read books and magazines without lugging them around. Never thought I''d say that, since I was always steadfastly against it. It'll help control my magazine collection, instead of having them all around, cluttering up the house.It's a bit slow to boot up, but otherwise, it is great!

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Linda (the purple one)
Reviews.Content: As a reader and writer this is a great resource. Looking forward to exploring all the new options.  Reading a book electronically will be a new experience.

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift,  my husband just loves it.
Reviews.Author: pauline georgakis
Reviews.Content: The fire can do so much, stream movies, watch tv programs, besides the books.  It even shows the cover of allThe books you have read so you can find previously read books easily.

Reviews.Title: Kids love it!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We bought each of our daughters (10 and 12) a Kindle Fire 8.9 HD for Christmas and they love it.  They gave my wife back her iPad and have not asked for it since.  My only complaints are: 1. The lack of a wall charger - the USB charger takes over 10 hours to charge it from a PC or MAC - way too slow, AND, 2. its lack of USB and MicroSD ports.  I know Amazon does not want to allow storage expansion to force more folks into using the Cloud, but it is still the major problem with these devices,LOTS of apps available now - my girls were able to find most of their favorite iPad games and at lower prices.

Reviews.Title: Big and Bold
Reviews.Author: Debra Miller
Reviews.Content: Very lightweight but lots of power. I love this so much more than my first Kindle fire.Crystal clear screen and vivid colors

Reviews.Title: much better than expected
Reviews.Author: Michael Mikos "Capt Mike"
Reviews.Content: bought this for my wife as a christmas present.  she is addicted to it and uses it more than her ipad.  really likes the lightweight and at 8.9" it is the ideal size for her needs

Reviews.Title: LOVE It BUT!!!!
Reviews.Author: dmcrane
Reviews.Content: my husband bought this for me for Christmas and he got the notice for 30 days of free prime for my 8.9 how does it apply to my system and thought I had seen special for prime for half price for year subscription but could not find when I set mine up :(

Reviews.Title: Awesome Kindle Fire 8.9"
Reviews.Author: James Stone
Reviews.Content: This tablet is awesome.  Was considering an I_Pad. But the camparisons made my choice to but the Fire.  We really enjoy this product...love it..we are glad we made the choice to buy the Kindle Fire HD 8.0"

Reviews.Title: Krazy for my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Karen Miller
Reviews.Content: Very happy with my purchase, and would recommend it for anyone who enjoys reading, but also wants access to the web, games, etc.!

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Product
Reviews.Author: Keith R. Lancaster "mugglekeith"
Reviews.Content: I'd have to actually give it 4.75 starts b/c of the poorly placed and designed on/off switch, but close enough. This was a gift to my mother and it will serve her needs (FB, web browsing and reading) very well. The video display is sharp. Processing speed is better than average. The interface is good for someone that will only be needing a few uses from the device. Odd that the AC adapter was separate also. If you buy, be sure and pick one up.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Tablet
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle Fire HD. The picture quality is the best along with the audio. I have owned it for two months and have not had any issues at all.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME Product, Satisfied Customer ! (:
Reviews.Author: LiahC
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Kindle Fire 8.9 HD on 11/18, (which amazon was currently out of stock of) I was told that my KF wouldn't be delivered until 12/6. I was cool with that, on 11/28 it arrived way EARLIER than expected. The packaging was nice, and snug. No dirt, not wet or anything. I couldn't wait to open it ... and when I did OH WOW ! The screen is fantastic, clear and very crisp. I have even used Netflix and Amazon Prime to watch movies/videos, and the sound is very loud & clear. It has the surround sound effect. I LOVE to read, and when I read, it feels like a real book. The web browser and everything else moves very quick and easy, I haven't experienced a lag of any kind yet! Sure, It didn't come with instructions, but in this day in age, everything you need to know about anything, can be found online. It is very user friendly and initial set-up took about 5mins. I am a previous owner of a blackberry, an android smart phone, and now I have a iPhone 4s, and a Macbook Which I love! (This is my first KF, btw) True enough, it did not come with a wall charger, I was about to be charged $19.99 for the charger, until I called amazon and told them, about the promo I saw, and they immediately changed the price to $9.99. And my previous android charger, works just fine. So far so good! I have also bought a Malware Case, Screen Protector, 2-yr Protection plan and the wall charger. Which I all love, and haven't had any issues with. All together, with tax included I spent under $460 for everything. iPad is nice, I used one before, But I WILL NOT pay $200-$300 more for it. KF does/has the exact same thing, minus the two cameras, free engraving etc. I'm only giving it 4 stars, bc it doesn't have the Google Play store, I was fully aware that this device wouldn't be flash capable too. Overall, I really think the KF HD is a GREAT choice. I LOVE it ! Thanks amazon!

Reviews.Title: Impressed so far
Reviews.Author: Justmom
Reviews.Content: This is the first tablet we have ever owned and so far the whole family is getting good use out of it. Since this is our first, we can't compare it to others but price wise it seems to be a good middle of the road deal as compared to an ipad versus a generic android tablet. I was a little bummed when I read that it didn't support flash player, but there is a quick and easy fix to get around it. So don't be scared off by people who say you can't use adobe with the new kindle fire.This link helped me figure it out:http://www.amazon.com/forum/kindle/ref=cm_cd_t_rvt_np?_encoding=UTF8&cdForum;=Fx1D7SY3BVSESG&cdPage;=1&cdThread;=Tx20MHMNXG5N2FL#CustomerDiscussionsNewAlso, if you have kids the Freetime app is really neat. I love that it has a timer so you can limit how long they are using the tablet. You do have to pay for it after a free trial period, but so far it seems worth it.I only gave it four stars because the help section on the device isn't very helpful, so for a newbie, like my family, it was a little more trial and error with somethings.

Reviews.Title: This Will Blow you Away!!!
Reviews.Author: David J. Brumbaugh
Reviews.Content: I'm really enjoying my Kindle immensely and using the first one downstairs. The sound blows me away when it comes to music and movies.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Teresa Bryant
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband and he has been very happy thus far. Just  takes time going thruogh the user guide finding out about many options available.

Reviews.Title: Love my kindle fire
Reviews.Author: cindyr
Reviews.Content: I love the graphics & clear picture of it. Still learning how to use. Wish it came with a paper instruction manual, to look at while using it.

Reviews.Title: love this thing!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: It does everything!  The display is simply amazing!  Audio is very good for a tablet as well!Only things I can knock it on are:-Not as many apps as my Android phone-My android phone also has a better cameraOverall extremely pleased though!

Reviews.Title: My 2nd kindle
Reviews.Author: Mohamed K. Alkhalifa
Reviews.Content: I used my 1 st kindle to download my favorite books but with the all new kindle fire which is a must for me

Reviews.Title: the powerfast accelerated charging accessory.
Reviews.Author: Wanda Asire
Reviews.Content: One thing I would liketo ask.  It says on a black card included: "Connect the opposite end of the USB charging cable to a Kindle Powerfast accelerated charging accessory (sold separately).  I have one for the plain Kindle I have, can I use that one?

Reviews.Title: One word, WOW!
Reviews.Author: Ralph Chapman "Tech Boy"
Reviews.Content: I will not get as techinal as others have, but I will say the speed and quality live up to all the positive reviews.  We have only had ours for a week now but love it so much.  Decided to get one when using my brother-in-law's over Thanksgiving.  Very clean design and good quality parts.  The sound is excellent  and the picture quality is increadable.  No troubles connecting with our wi-fi and downloading all the new contents, updates, and games.  Love the responce time of the touch screen and havn't had any problems with it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HD Review
Reviews.Author: Dennis Jeff
Reviews.Content: The Kindle meets all my expections and is fun to use. The screen is very clear and bright plus the sound is very good.

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: MSHusker
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD was a great purchase.  The clarity and crispness of the color is amazing which enhances my experience when reading magazines purchased on the Kindle.  The 64 GB storage will support my book and magazine habit for a long time.  The 4G connection works great and you cannot beat the price.  I did find it a little confusing to get the wireless started but there are several good user's guides out there for $2.99 or less - Some are free with Amazon Prime.  The touch screen still smears up on a regular basis, so I wipe it down with cloth regularly - a small inconvenience to deal with for such a great product.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Suezy Smith
Reviews.Content: I gave this to my husband for Christmas.  He is not a computer person but loves the Kindle.  He will like it even better when you plays games on it.

Reviews.Title: My Mom Loves It!
Reviews.Author: Shannon M.
Reviews.Content: I got this as a Christmas gift for my Mom, who is not computer savvy at all.  She has figured out how to use it with ease & loves it!  She kept telling me she wouldn't like one, but I knew she would if she'd take the time to play around w/ it & I was right.I only bought the 16 GB model & was worried about how quick she'd fill it up.  So far, she's downloaded several books & has only used about 13 MB of space on the Kindle - this also includes a few apps that I downloaded for her.My parents have an unsecured wifi connection set up at their house & it connected w/ ease, no issues what-so-ever, as it did at my house w/ a secured connection.With that being said, I personally have the iPad 3.  As far as I'm concerned I wouldn't trade my iPad for a Kindle... ever! (Hence the 4 * rating.)  I feel like my iPad is much more responsive (screen, touch) & faster (wifi) & way more apps available.  I have the Kindle app on my iPad also, so I'm still able to download & read books if I want.  The Kindle Fire is, obviously, geared more towards avid readers, which I am not.  So, if you're a reader, I think you'll love the Kindle Fire HD, but if you want to be able to do a lot more on a tablet (& can afford it), I would recommend the iPad.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire!! Color and lighting is great
Reviews.Author: patriot
Reviews.Content: I had the original kindle to read my books on. The kindle fire has a light built in, so I dont have to attach a light to read in the dark. To be able to search the internet. I Like the carousel feature. The colors are very vivid. I haven't watched movies on it, yet but Im basically a reader, thats what I bought it for.

Reviews.Title: loving it
Reviews.Author: lonnabuy
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my husband.  So far so good.  He is enjoying it. blah blah blah blah blah

Reviews.Title: Excellent choice
Reviews.Author: Jim Watts
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect tablet for an older user who has never used a computer before.  It is ready to use right out of the box and easy to learn to use.  The carousel on the home screen and favorites are excellent for ease of use.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is a great product.  Easy to use and fast downloads.  Easy to learn how to get APPs and watch movies, read books.

Reviews.Title: Love the Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Michael Goudy
Reviews.Content: I love the size of the Kindle Fire HD.  The color is great.The sound is awesome.  It's really like stereo speakers.The only problem I have is that I can't stay connected to mywifi connection sometimes.

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: frances
Reviews.Content: I love the larger screen now the kindle is the right size. adding the camera was great, make it a better one please. give it a port so i can use my wireless card. not every place has wifi. the picture quality is great, more apps please.The draw-back is all the advertizments !!! When I want to buy something I will go to the store !! Stop taking up my screen space with junk I do not want !! I paid for my device and should not have to share it with a bunch of adds.  These few things would make it purrrrfect.

Reviews.Title: OMG -- I love it!!
Reviews.Author: kwenbee13
Reviews.Content: Waited months and months for it to come out -- and was so happy when it arrived!!You'll definitely want to buy the 'quick charge' accessory -- as charging through the PC USB port takes FOREVER!!!Great color, easy to navigate.Haven't had a lot of time to play around on it, or watch any shows or movies -- but the color is sharp and I"m sure they will be great once I have enough spare time to sit and watch a movie!Get one!!

Reviews.Title: Would recommend
Reviews.Author: kelly block
Reviews.Content: Beautiful display and super easy to use. My sister who is awful at computers loves it so far. Only down side is make sure to buy the wall charger since it does not come with one.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Judy
Reviews.Content: I love it...It's amazing!!!!  I enjoy that I can read a book, watch a movie, listen to music or Skype on this model.  However, it would've been nice to have an instruction booklet for this product.  I still don't understand all the functions of my Kindle Fire after using it for a month.

Reviews.Title: This is a great tablet, I have iPads and Samsung tablets also
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This a  great tablet for the price, especially with the $50 for 4g per year.the only thing I am waiting for is for some of the apps I would like to have work better but that will come eventually, especially the native mail app could use updating.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this kindle for my wife for Christmas.  She hasn't put it down, yet.  She's doing something with it with all of her waking hours.

Reviews.Title: I love it!!
Reviews.Author: E. M. Steele "ernbone"
Reviews.Content: My Kindle Fire HD 8.9" is everything I expected and more...I purchased it to be able to watch movies, do email, play games and especially read...We travel fairly often and I was tired of lugging my laptop and wanted something to answer business email but not do work on...The first movie I watched was 'Casablanca' and it was incredibly sharp...The keypad is large and because I have fat fingers I use a stylus which is not a problem at all...It was this or the iPad...I have friends with iPads and asked them the pros and cons...The wi-fi capability was the deciding factor for me...I also purchased the leather case for it with the magnetic closure which automatically puts it to sleep...Quality product.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The picture quality if absolutely great!! It is way better than my second generation ipad, and for the price, you cannot go wrong. I would definitely buy another kindle over an ipad in the future.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: Perfect for me.  Learning more each day of its capabilities.  Images are nice and sharp, everything is working as perscribed.  Having lots of fun with it.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire 8.9
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Ryan "kindle lover"
Reviews.Content: I love it. This is my 4th kindle. I have purchased several as gifts. The new kindle 8.9 is great. I like the larger size and the dound is great. I am so glad I "upgraded"!

Reviews.Title: great to use
Reviews.Author: George M. Stephens
Reviews.Content: The kindle fire is easy to understand, easy to use, and easy to read. Already had a kindle tablet and enjoyed it, but this is a great improvement.

Reviews.Title: The good and the bad
Reviews.Author: M. Stjames "Crow Passion"
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kindle Fire HD 4G LTE model because I thought it would be able to pick up the ATT signal at least as well as my iPhone 5.  Well, it doesn't.  So I'm kinda wishing I had gone with the less expensive wifi version alone.  It was only when I switched out my Comcast internet modum for a newer model which had wifi that I was able to get connected.No denying the HD provides dazzling picture quality.  And I do love my Kindle.  But it's really easy to buy too much stuff to download.  If you don't have iron self-control, stay away from the Kindle.Would I buy it again - Yes, but not the 4G LTE wireless version.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: E. Allgood "allgoodart"
Reviews.Content: Only had it for three days now and it is great improvement over my previous kindle that I loved alot until I got this one.  The screen size is perfect for us upper middle-aged people.  Be sure to get a touch pen, the power fast charger and a case to make the use of it super easy.

Reviews.Title: great kindle
Reviews.Author: Blair W. Williams
Reviews.Content: After recently buying my wife the Kindle 7hd, I was unable to use it.  It was in constant use.  So I upgraded to the 8.9.  Both are fantastic tablets.  The only complaint that I have, is that Kindles do not have an instruction manual.  Inclusion of one would make sense and clear up a lot of confusion and frustrations.  Nonetheless, I have no complaints about either Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: Judi
Reviews.Content: I received this Kindle Fire for Christmas.  The previous Christmas I received a regular kindle.  I thought that was great, but having it in color is just great.  Also, for reading since it is backlit, I don't need a light.  I enjoy playing games on this since my prior Kindle was black/white.  I like the larger screen and if you can afford it, I would highly recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Overall a Great Product
Reviews.Author: Shirley McLain
Reviews.Content: I have been using my Fire a couple of months now. I have really enjoyed it. It is easy to use and the colors are bright and clear. I gave it four stars because of one feature and that is the on and off switch. It has been difficult for me to locate it. I end up turning the reader around and around trying to locate that little button. I would not hesitate to purchase it again but the on and off switch needs improvement.

Reviews.Title: A really good tablet
Reviews.Author: Carl
Reviews.Content: I have the Kindle Fire HD 8.9, 32 gb for a few weeks now - it's really good.  Don't compare to other tablets like IPad's.  I bought this to suit my needs such as reading books. entertainment like watching movies, TV shows which all can be done through Prime, HBO GO, and downloading APPS to read newspapers.  Sure, the number of APPS are less than other devices, but there are plenty to satisfy.  The screen is very sharp and clear, was really easy to set-up.  And for all the reviews that say no FLASH on this device, that's the standard now for most all tablets - by the way, there are great ways to get flash on this device if you want(Just google it and then it will tell you how you will have FLASH.  Just know what you want in a tablet.  I use it mostly for reading books, newspapers, E-Mail, play games and watch movies and TV shows - suits all my needs.  Also I find it to be fast and responsive.  Also, if you want a really good warranty on it, buy from a retailor such as Best Buy, Staples... and call SquareTrade and you can get full coverage including accident coverage for under $100.00 !! - for 3 years!!(ask for a discount coupon code - they gave me one for 35% off) Can't beat that

Reviews.Title: LOV IT!!!
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: I love everything about my new Kindle Fire HD!!! It has great color and sound. I am still learning all that it can it do. Amazon has had excellent customer service when I have called with questions. The only downside I have found is that Amazon should include a house charger for the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Wanda Binz
Reviews.Content: I am loving my kindle fire. It is so versatile. The color is so brilliant I can't believe it is a kindle fire HE.

Reviews.Title: Really Impressed
Reviews.Author: Norman R. Thompson
Reviews.Content: I am really impressed with the quality of this product. The video screen is very clear and is down loads quickly. Will be using for a long while.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Donna Maria Welch "Maria Welch"
Reviews.Content: This was perfect for the need.  Gave 2of these to family which did not need an iPad but needed similar functionality and less expensive.  Set up was easy, loading apps quick, graphics fantastic. Both were excited and enjoy was they received. Sine most of the pictures are stored on the cloud, the space was not an issue. I highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: The best budget tablet out there.
Reviews.Author: Thomas Briggs
Reviews.Content: I had high expectations for the Kindle Fire HD 8.9.  I've owned an iPad 1 since it launched, and while I love it, it's recently slowed down and isn't compatible with iOS 6.  So, I had been considering moving on to a more current tablet.  The newest iPad was an obvious choice, but when I considered what I primarily used the iPad for - reading books and comics, surfing the internet while on the couch, watching video - I realized that I didn't necessarily NEED to live within Apple's ecosystem.  Sure, they offer a ton more apps, but I don't use enough of them to justify another $500 purchase.So, I looked to either the Nexus 10 or Kindle Fire HD 8.9.  Ultimately, I chose the Kindle Fire HD because of its integration with the Amazon store.  I'm already a Prime member, I have a vast library of Kindle books, and I use they're Cloud music player because it works with just about any device I'd want.I'm glad I went with the Kindle Fire HD 8.9.  It's a good, not great, device.  When I first received it, and put it through its paces, I was a little disappointed.  It doesn't run as smooth as the iPad, and again, few apps are as polished.  And then there's Silk... the world's worst browser.  It's slow, clunky, and doesn't do anything better than any other browser out there.  Fortunately, the more time I spent with the Kindle Fire HD, the more I learned about it and came to enjoy it.When you get past the fact that it's not the iPad, you can appreciate the Kindle Fire HD for what it is - an amazing e-reader that also happens to be an adequate tablet.  Seriously, this is the best Kindle experience you'll find.  Books are baked seamlessly into the OS, the Kindle UI is excellent, X-Ray is cool, and the text to speech feature works amazingly well.  Not the Audible option, mind you, but the standard text to speech option available on any book.Besides book integration, the Kindle Fire excels at delivering all Amazon content, which should be obvious.  Movies are quick to load, music stored in the Cloud work perfectly, and photos are easily synced with your Facebook account.  Again, it's just a darn good personal tablet.  The fact that it's $200 less than an entry level iPad shouldn't be ignored either.Outside of seamless access to Amazon content, the best reason to own a Kindle Fire HD 8.9 is its beautiful screen.  As someone who owned an iPad before it had a retina screen, I can tell you the difference is staggering.  Everything is clear and crisp.  Reading is enjoyable, and movies have excellent black levels.  For an avid comic reader like myself, the Kindle Fire HD is a godsend.  Even though the size of the screen is slightly smaller than that of an actual comic book, everything is perfectly legible because of the high resolution.In short, I wouldn't hesitate to recommend the Kindle Fire HD 8.9.  It's not an iPad, but really, you shouldn't have expected it to be.  It's a great reader (books and comics) and video player, and has an adequate number of tablet apps.  Is the lack of specialty apps worth the $200 savings?  I'd say so.  Especially if you're already knee deep in the Amazon ecosystem.  If you're a Prime member, and also use the Cloud Music Match service, it's close to a must buy.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9" Review
Reviews.Author: Margie Burns
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with the Kindle Fire HD 8.9", but I had a hard time operating it at first, have gotten better but just wish that there were better instructions on line.  I like it enough to keep it though.

Reviews.Title: I love it so far!
Reviews.Author: J. Fortner "jennfortner07"
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle so far. I was a little disappointed in the one book a moth prime sharing. Somehow i didn't know it was one a month. I read a book in a day! I was disappointed in that. I have found that you can link to your public library and get free books to check out. I would recommend this to anyone who loves to read and use the internet.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying my Kindle Fire!
Reviews.Author: Ann J.
Reviews.Content: I like the size and ease of using my kindle.  I have had it for a month, I do not use my laptop anymore.  It exceeded my expectations.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire 8.9
Reviews.Author: rowdybob
Reviews.Content: This tablet is outstanding, but amason is more outstanding for their customer service. I have never dealt with a company so customer friendly .

Reviews.Title: best tablet yet
Reviews.Author: gina5864
Reviews.Content: this is my third kindle, better than the other tablets, only problem couldn't get my promotional wireless from ATT  to work.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD Love
Reviews.Author: Gail Johnson
Reviews.Content: Broke down and added another kindle to our family of kindles.  Love this 8.9 Kindle HD.  The display and sound are much better for streaming video.  I really enjoy the 'larger' screen.  I have not noticed any problems in streaming.  Actually think its much better than my 7".  We love all our kindles, every one of them.  The only odd thing on the new Kindle is the front facing camera if used for anything other than skype.  We are a kindle family and love each and every one of them.

Reviews.Title: Lovin' it!
Reviews.Author: Rita L
Reviews.Content: I haven't had a whole lot of time to play but have done some reading and the bigger screen is great. A couple of new features to get used to but that's fun as well. There have been so many in depth reviews on this product already that I'll just keep it short and say I love it!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Jane E. Borsick "ScorchedAngel08"
Reviews.Content: Great item.  Was very pleased with the product and what it can do.  The functions area could be made a little easier to read/

Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: SHIRLEY TERRY
Reviews.Content: Love it & very excited when I received it.  Have not had much time to play & learn things but thus far no complaints.  The size is just perfect & I can carry it my purse anywhere I go.  Woo hoo!!!!!

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Domingo Ordaz
Reviews.Content: excellente product was what I expected, I loved it, hope to buythank you very much, all very well, immediate response

Reviews.Title: super fast!!!
Reviews.Author: william seiger
Reviews.Content: great tablet .surfing the web, playing games, watching videos ,it's just a great value. I didn't want to spend a lot of money

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: bmd3427
Reviews.Content: I am totally happy with this tablet.  The picture is great, the sound is great, the ease of access to the internet, apps and all features make this tablet amazing. Really gives iPad a run for its money, and no iTunes, the worst operating system.  The android market is easy to use and you are able to find most apps on common with iTunes.  There are vert very few short comings, such as the need to purchase an app to use the built on camera and no rear facing camera, but all in all, amazing product and amazon staff is so helpful and always readily available.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9", Dolby Audio, Dual-Band Wi-Fi, 32 GB
Reviews.Author: Bonnie
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd. Kindle!!!! I am very happy that I purchased the Kindle Fire HD 8.9.I never was a reader before, but now I'm always reading, thanks to Kindle!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: New user
Reviews.Author: L. C. Marschall
Reviews.Content: I like it; however, there are no directions and when I go to help sites & check on line - what instructions there are don't explain procedures completely for someone who is brand new to a Kindle.  Furthermore, I've new had a device like this - not even a cell phone.

Reviews.Title: bluetooth
Reviews.Author: teddy
Reviews.Content: i see that kindle fire supports bluetooth - instead of using the touch keypad, simply purchase a bluetooth keyboard - microsoft makes a gorgeous mini that comes with a cover that acts as a stand for a tablet!

Reviews.Title: It is a neat device
Reviews.Author: robertfetter
Reviews.Content: The only thing additional I would like is a remote shell to access from my other computer. Android is a lot like Linux, so I would expect that.

Reviews.Title: Better than carrying a laptop around!
Reviews.Author: S. McPike
Reviews.Content: Functional device for those interested in staying connected.  Large screen and easy access.  This one is a must for anyone who appreciates something larger and easy to operate.  Kindle's reputation is an assurance to quality.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire 8.9"
Reviews.Author: wendyh
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire, I have always loved reading and gaming on my old kindle but being able to watch movies and tv shows is really great too. Picture quality is fantastic, sound is great and I am learning more fun things to do with it everyday.

Reviews.Title: The best money I ever spent
Reviews.Author: t bear
Reviews.Content: I searched and researched so many different products before purchasing the Kindle Fire 8.9" HD model. For the short period of time that I have had it, I keep  finding more and more uses, things,apps and all around really neat things this Fire can do. I was a little leary of buying this, even though I have had an older model Kindle reader with apx. 160 books on it and have never had any issue of function of this product. When I received this unit I carefully unpacked and fired it up. I was so impressed with the functions, HD colors and just general feel of this product, that my main response was, WHY DID I WAIT THIS LONG TO BUY THIS UNIT! I know I have really only scratched the surface of the functions of this and can't wait to discover all.One point that I have to share is that I am a retired Law Enforcement Officer and have gone on to getting my NRA and State certification for firearm instruction. As such I haveto haul around a large laptop case and a digital projection case as well as a large rolling box with a number of firearms for demonstrative purposes. As Iget older this becomes a rather difficult venture. With the Kindle Fire HD, I was able to download the NRA program onto the Kindle and using the proper cable, etc. I now can leave my laptop at home, thereby reducing that weight, my next step is to purchase a hand held projecter, available from Amazon, and further reduce the amount of equiptment. I now can load up and go to locations and use my energy to teaching my students all the proper instruction in safely using, care and feeding of same. Point is, without the Kindle Fire HD, I would properly reduce the number of classes that I perform. Without any doubt, if the reader is thinking of purchasing any other tablet, Ipad or others take a good long look at the 8.9" Kindle and I am sure that this will meet most, if not all. In closing, I want to say Thank you Amazon for your innovations.

Reviews.Title: Great Notebook
Reviews.Author: Samuel Mudrak
Reviews.Content: I really like it for reading books as well as reading some of my onlne magazine subscriptions.I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: HD 8.9" Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Dolores G. Keshner "book worm"
Reviews.Content: Love it, just the right size. The colores are bright, it's fast when looking up stuff on the Internet; just love it.

Reviews.Title: Nice, nice
Reviews.Author: kamarce
Reviews.Content: I waited a long time to decide what I wanted to get.  Either a replacement lap top (newer, faster, lighter) or the smaller media devices.  Since Kindle has good reputation, quality, and support, I took the step with Kindle Fire.  So far so good.  Baby boomer me, with no smart device experience, is enjoying the journey of this new technology.  Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: loranda haywood
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet, its better than Ipad 3, the HD movies and tv shows are a perfect picture, it's like i'm watching it at a theater, I love all of my apps. My husband bought me this for christmas after he seen how good it works now he wants one.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Estela M. Diaz
Reviews.Content: I tested it out then wrapped it for Christmas for my son.  Loved it!  I have the original black and white basic and the Kindle Fire; both have been the most reliable e-reader I have ever had.  I compared the capabilities with other similar HD tablets and this was the best for the money.  Why pay much more for similar tablets..Got it sooner than expected.  Great customer service!!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Judy Vasser
Reviews.Content: I have 3 Kindles.. not the original Kindle, but the one after it with 3g and internet access.  Then I ran on to one at Target for $65 that I purchased for my grandaughter without the 3g or whatever.  Then they came out with the Kindle Fire HD and I ordered it.  We have downloaded movies from Amazon and the grandaughter loves that she can watch her movies in the car.  Love it..

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Clgood
Reviews.Content: I love this Kindle.  I have watched HD TV shows on it.  Downloaded lots of books and some apps.  I'm still figuring out a few things, but all-in-all it is wonderful!

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: louhoy58
Reviews.Content: it is amazing love being able to search anything and relaxing in my chair thanks hubby for a wonderful gift

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Lauren Fairfield
Reviews.Content: I am a fan of kindle and bought one a few years ago.. the kindle fire is way awesome,. I love that it is in color..

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Michael Russell
