Reviews.Content: i think kindle is top in the line of ereaders or tablets, I have the ipads & samsung & the 7"  &  8.9" kindle fire  hd &i; just want to say i would be hard pressed if i had to chose between the ipad & the kindles,plus amazon is the best support you could ask for,if you have a problem they are there to back up there product & help you any way they can. Really I rate kindle higher than 5 star.

Reviews.Title: My fourth Kindle
Reviews.Author: Kathy A. Gray
Reviews.Content: The title really says it all. If you are concerned about getting bombarded with ads, you can tweak it so  you only get the one when you first log on.

Reviews.Title: kindle great, cover useless
Reviews.Author: Marilyn Publicover
Reviews.Content: I also ordered the cover that didn't even begin to fit. No charger included. We had to take the time to to Wal-Mart to get the needed  supplies. Being handicapped makes it difficult.

Reviews.Title: falls short
Reviews.Author: thomas valkenet
Reviews.Content: Kindle is a great reader. But it is a horrible internet browser. Silk is just bad. It freezes so much I am nervous every time I make an election to move on or from a page. My fingers have freezer burn! I am saving for an Apple product.

Reviews.Title: Hate Silk Browser!
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Benningfield
Reviews.Content: I like the size, the HD, I HATE, HATE, HATE, HATE, HATE Silk Browser!!! It locks up and freezes every 2 minutes! I was happier with my Kindle Fire 7"

Reviews.Title: wow! What fun and easy operation.
Reviews.Author: carol
Reviews.Content: I LOVE MY NEW KINDLE. IT IS SO EASY TO NAVIGATE. AMAZON'SCUSTOMER SERVIVE IS BY FAR THE BEST SERVICE I HAVEENCOUNTERED IN VERY LONG TIME.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my needs
Reviews.Author: Don Bookworm
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD 8.9 is the perfect size for me and has amazing versatility.  I am only beginning to tap its many uses but already know that it far surpasses any device that I have had for daily, multiple usage.  I love the carousel presentation of books, programs and services.

Reviews.Title: Not easy to navigate
Reviews.Author: Victor Pritchett
Reviews.Content: Don't really know what the specials are. Hard to navigate. Does this device have a camera if so where is it?

Reviews.Title: Love my new Kindle Fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: Joanne
Reviews.Content: I am new to the Kindle Fire.  Computer and flip cell phone have been my world.  I am learning, but so far I love it.

Reviews.Title: i like it, special offers is rediculous and should be eliminated
Reviews.Author: douglas wyatt
Reviews.Content: opt out of special offers...this is a stupid thing that makes a good purchase into a bad purchase....every time i reset the device even after i PAID MONEY, i have to figure out how to get the dam screeen to normal...BAD AMAZONELIMINATE SPECIAL OFFERS AND ALLOW ME TO PUT MY OWN PICS ON MY LOCK SCREEN..AND I WANT MY 15$ back for the trouble you cause me..but i wont hold my breath

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: If you like to read books, such as used to read 500 paged books in one day, Kindle is the way to go. I read on it all the time, and love watching amazon prime on it. I occasionally play games on it too. Also, I like buying items refurbished by amazon, they work just like they should and come in good to great to like new condition.

Reviews.Title: Something I always wanted.
Reviews.Author: Susan Glenz
Reviews.Content: It is working well as I learn how to use it.  It will be fun to discover all it will do.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: Howard L. Dickens
Reviews.Content: so far I have only used it for reading, and really enjoy that I can have several books ready to read

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HD with Dolby Audio, and Dual-Band WiFi
Reviews.Author: Sue
Reviews.Content: Hello!  I purchased my first Kindle Fire HD after trying out a friend's Kindle. I checked the local stores' prices, but I got a much better price by calling the Amazon Kindle-Sales Representative. He was able to get me a better Kindle model for less than the local stores' prices. He also found the magnetic RooCase cover which I wanted; you can turn on your Kindle just by flipping the cover open! He found me a basic-priced stylus, a protective film-cover for the screen, and he told me to try out my Kindle for 2 weeks before buying the separate Damage Warrenty. He gave me the Damage Co's. phone number, and I later did have them start the Damage Warrenty after I decided to keep my new Kindle. I had a good friend come over to help me connect my new WiFi device and get my new Kindle registered. Now, I thought I had purchased the same size Kindle as she had, but it turned out that I had gotten the larger 8.9 model. I had gotten the sizes mixed-up after handling store models without covers. My friend was impressed that I got my larger Kindle 8.9 model and all its items for just $50.00 more than her 7" Kindle HD alone had cost her at a local store. She was impressed.  I will add that having the Kindle Support phone number is great!  Any time I had a question, a quick phone call to a service rep solved the issue.  I am also glad to say that Amazon stands behind its own Manufacturer's Warrenty, too! We live in a rural area and when my Kindle 8.9 was having issues in January-February of 2013 receiving emails, one of the service supervisors reviewed my Kindle's history. She learned that I used my Kindle every day for several hours due to personal disability issues that make traveling difficult. So my Kindle was one of my main methods of entertainment and of emailing friends & family.  She saw the Kindle's email delivery problem reoccured over and over after several service reps had tried to restore that app on my Kindle. She said she felt my Kindle needed to be returnef to Amazon. However, she said not to worry at all as they were sending me a new Kindle to replace my original one as mine was still under full warranty for one more month. So, within two days, my new replacement Kindle arrived. A great service rep walked me through the steps of 'moving' all my items from my first Kindle into my second Kindle. We had put my RooCase cover onto the new Kindle at her suggestion so that I could tell the two Kindles apart as we had to have both devices sitting side by side to complete the transfers of my apps, past book & movie purchases, etc. Finally, we had the new Kindle registered and running well...my older Kindle was completely back to "factory settings". It had nothing of mine left on it at all, which is how she said a Kindle needs to be when it's returned. She actually thanked me for being so patient and following all her instructions! I felt She was the one who had done a wonderful job in walking an older lady through all those steps! My new Kindle works very well with no problems at all. So, I  would recommend getting your Kindle and any parts from the Amazon Store. They do stand behind their products! -- Sue

Reviews.Title: Terrible Wifi in this model
Reviews.Author: John Kiblin "(Laura)"
Reviews.Content: I, and many others if you google the problem, have a serious issue with the wifi. It constantly stops working even though the device has a strong signal. Amazon has been no help...they just keep giving me their scripted responses. I have had the unit replaced but still have the problem. Even had new internet installed. I have been a loyal Amazon customer and am upset that they just don't seem to care about this issue. I am close to going to the iPad.UPDATE. 3/9/14...I wrote this on the wrong model. This kindle model is fine. Please see me one star review of the 9" HDX.

Reviews.Title: what happened?
Reviews.Author: Thomas Weaver
Reviews.Content: this kindle always freezes up after about 5 to 10 minutes of use I have to shut it down rebooted my old Kindle was flawless

Reviews.Title: Get it!
Reviews.Author: Leticia Alcantar
Reviews.Content: exceeded my expectations. It's fun and very entertaining.  We share it and my daughter gets her UC Berkeley books on it and now only carries her Kindle around instead of all those heavy books!

Reviews.Title: Good graphics and speed
Reviews.Author: Timothy Kelnhofer
Reviews.Content: I love using it and use it daily for both reading and playing games.  It is programmed a little differently than my old Kindle Fire, so I still have a small learning curve, but I love the product.

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: Travel Junkie
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD is fantastic. I had been using a DVD player whenever I traveled.  Often times the DVD player would lock up  or the disc would crack while packed in my carry-on.  Now, I can download my movies, games, etc., not worry about discs and not have the weight and excess stuff that I had with the DVD player. The video and audio qualities are very good, it is lightweight and compact.  I really enjoy it. To my lovely wife who got it for me:  THANK YOU!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindle Fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Simone Cook
Reviews.Content: Bought this refurbished unit to replace a Kindle Fire 7" unit that became unusable because the charging port was faulty....was loose in the housing and I assume that caused the wires inside to break off....very poor design.Have had the new unit for about a month and everything seems to work well.  The larger screen makes it easier to use.  The charging port on this one seems to be installed more securily and hopefully will not be a problem.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hd 8.9
Reviews.Author: Debbie Macaluso
Reviews.Content: Nice tablet. Clear screen. However, it freezes up quite often and needs to be rebooted each time. This is quite annoying.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 8.9 inch
Reviews.Author: George
Reviews.Content: This product has meet my expectations.  It has all the functions needed, then some and we will probably never use everything available.  However, I do not get to use it often as my wife has hung her ownership sign " Hands of this is mine".  The quality of the monitor is great, The 8.9 inch size is great for folks in are age bracket (80's).  The price was OK, but a cover/stand accessory bundled in would have been great. I am not a technical person so can not speak concerning the technical aspects of the Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Not impressed
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I've not been impressed at all with the Kindle. My first Kindle lasted several months, everything was fine. I could play games, read all sorts of books and use the web browser. Then suddenly my Kindle started locking up and freezing or just restarting itself. After resetting it to factory default (and having to start over on everything that wasn't on the Cloud, which is quite a bit) It continued to lock up and freeze. Amazon customer service was great and quickly replaced the Kindle. The next Kindle that came was dirty and had obviously signs of pre-use. The battery would only last a couple hours and all apps and books would lock the Kindle up constantly. As long as I restarted the Kindle 4 to 5 times a day and cleared the cache on all apps and web browser several times a day it was somewhat useable.  Back to customer service, restore defaults, hard reset the Kindle, turn the screen brightness down, turn the volume down and the battery still only lasted a couple hours and I still wasn't able to read books on the device. Insert Kindle number 3... Again Kindle number 3 had some sort of grease marks on the back and finger prints on the screen when it came out of the box. The power button only worked half the time and something wasn't working properly with the WIFI..... Kindle number 4 locked up upon the initial setup and got stuck in reboot mode until the battery died. Now Kindle number 4 cannot do anything with Silk without it restarting the device. Some apps work, most do not and reading books is very laggy (it could take several seconds after you turn a book page for the device to catch up).Meanwhile customer service tells me they just don't understand, that these are fantastic devices and should be able to run anything I want to do with them. I just want to read a book or play Tetris without the device freezing and restarting on me. That shouldn't be too much?If I had known all this in advance I would have spent a little more and gone with a Samsung.

Reviews.Title: would not recommend
Reviews.Author: Rosemary Bryant
Reviews.Content: Purchased my first one in November Started having issues of freezing and getting very hot, so hot it could be felt through the cover.After contacting Amazon I returned for an exchange. I received my second kindle in December. By Janruary this kindle was having the same issues. I contacted Amazon and tried the solve the issues just like they did with the first one. No sucess, so I asked if I would get a full refund if I sent it back and was told yes. It didn't happen. Sodisappointed in the product and Amazon. I also ordered a car charger, an adaptor, and a cover, the only things that I got any refund for arethe kindle and adaptor, but not what was promised. It was not my fault that the kindles didn't perform at my expectations and I feel I should have been given a full refund. Especially after trying 2 of them within 2 months. Don't waste your money buying a kindle.

Reviews.Title: Would be great but has really annoying flaws!
Reviews.Author: Meredith Enny
Reviews.Content: Well, this isn't a terrible tablet, but it does have some very annoying issues. For instance, why do the manufacturers make it so easy to un-register the device. I let my 5 year old play with the Kindle because it offers some really cool apps for kids. What it doesn't offer is protection against those kids finding the button that un-registers your device.  My daughter found that button and all she had to do was tap it, effectively wiping my Kindle out of all apps, books, movies, etc. I had to download everything again and basically lost all of the saved data for all of my games. When you are on level 70 of Candy Crush, this can hurt. I did indeed put parental controls on the device. You have to put a password in to buy things, connect to wireless, etc., but hey, if you would like to erase all of Mommy's data just tap this button. Great.The charger still stinks! I plug the cable in to charge it and heaven forbid you move it the wrong way, it doesn't charge. The charger cable feels loose. That happened with my old Kindle as well. Yo would think that they would have worked that out by now. No, not so much.My Kindle likes to freeze up while playing some of the apps or surfing the net. I force it to shut down and reboot it. This has happened on many occasions.If they could only iron these issues out, I would have no problem giving it at least 4 stars.I'm very disappointed. It could have been great!

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Jason whitlock
Reviews.Content: really love this kindle, I bought it because my school is going to all e books. it is great for me being on the go all the time. the only downfall is that there are a few apps I needed for school and could not download to the kindle like coursesmart. I have to download my text book to my laptop and load it onto the kindle but for the price that is fine with me. I have bought two so far and considering getting my 7 year old on to help him with his reading. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a table/e reader now this is no I pad you cannot get every app you can on the I pad or android phone even thought it is android IOS they hide it really well. but kindle does have great apps and prime is the best I would do prime just for the shipping but it opens up your selection of free or really cheap books

Reviews.Title: perfect tablet for me.
Reviews.Author: Gregory84
Reviews.Content: I'm sure there are better tablets out there but for the money and my needs this is perfect for me. I read on it and surf the web so i didn't need an IPAD or any other super expensive tablet. The amazon shop function is easy to use and i buy stuff all the time.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: kraftyk
Reviews.Content: This tablet is very functional. The sound and picture are very clear and I'm able to do everything on this tablet and it's very fast and functional.

Reviews.Title: Silk browser
Reviews.Author: Linda V. Ross
Reviews.Content: I love the kindle as a reader only. Books download easily. The problem is with the Silk browser. More times than not it stops working and the page freezes. Very frustrating. Would not buy again.

Reviews.Title: Great birthday present!
Reviews.Author: Win C.
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my grandson's sixth birthday present and he will not put it down. Besides the free games he has books on it that he can read. It does almost everything my iPad does.

Reviews.Title: Silk browser crashes
Reviews.Author: John P. Bartlow "John"
Reviews.Content: Every few minutes Silk crashes. It's ok otherwise.Why do these silly things force you to type a minimum amount of words.

Reviews.Title: Big disappointment compared to Kindle Fire HD-updated 3 months later
Reviews.Author: We live near Illinois corn fields.
Reviews.Content: I can't believe how fast the battery runs out (especially compared to my Kindle Fire) and the time it takes to charge it is even worse. I wish I would've just bought another Fire.3/19/2014 I have had my this Kindle Fire 8.9 for three months now. I'm still so disappointed in its battery life. I do nothing any different on this Kindle than I did on my Kindle Fire (now two years old) but the battery drains so fast. What is worse is when the battery gets down to 10% and it is plugged in it shuts itself off. It WON'T EVEN WORK WHEN PLUGGED IN and the battery is low. I charge it for 8 hours to get 30% battery-that is when it has been turned off the entire time.HATE THIS KINDLE FIRE 8.9. Wish I would have just stuck with my Kindle Fire and bought a new case. Ugh! :(

Reviews.Title: My smartphone is jealous.
Reviews.Author: Joseph Collomy
Reviews.Content: I bought this Kindle wanting to be able to dodge having to carry a load of books around and perhaps even avoid games on my phone which sucks up battery life. Best purchase I could have ever imagined. Not only can I adjust font size and line spacing with this product, but I can still enjoy streaming content, games, and more on the go with amazing battery life! My phone can stream up to four "hour" long episodes of my shows, while the kindle unplugged on 90% brightness streamed eight episodes before hitting 15% battery. I would strongly suggest the kindle over any tablet as it also allows you to side load android apps not available in the Amazon App Store. Amazon made an extremely smart choice by allowing their users to have that freedom. Do not hesitate, buy it now!

Reviews.Title: it's BIGGER!
Reviews.Author: Mary V. Seneker "newly retired READER!!!"
Reviews.Content: I love my 7" kindle Fire, too,but I'm getting really hooked on this one.  Easier to read with a bigger screen, and easier to do just about anything!  LOVE it!

Reviews.Title: Warehouse Deals must just resell returned items rather than repair
Reviews.Author: Sharon Z.
Reviews.Content: Loved the kindle, but then it wouldn't recharge.  Did not read warranty link "1 year warranty from original purchase".  So I called Amazon.  They had me reset and try to charge.  They were going to call me back in 30 minutes but didn't call for 6 hours.  Was driving and they told me I could buy a new Kindle...  Was not a happy camper.  Just purchased a new battery and am planning to install next week.

Reviews.Title: bonuses in the package
Reviews.Author: H. Toliver "co-author"
Reviews.Content: I can't compare the Kindle Fire with other tablets, but having a previous Kindle and having made purchases of books and music from Amazon over the years, I was pleased to find these readily available.  They wouldn't have been of course with another brand of tablet.  I bundled the Kindle with a stylus, headphones, and a carrying case that props up for viewing.  These enhancements make both listening and reading easy and convenient.  The sound quality for classical and folk recordings is excellent.  I happen to have heard several of the folk singers in person and noticed that in other replay systems something is always lost, both from the voices and the instrumentation.  With modestly priced earphones, not so on the Kindle.  The back lighting makes reading about the same as having a book in hand or a little sharper.  It is easy to bookmark passages and return to them though not to cite them by original page reference.  I usually use a computer for internet searches, but the Kindle serves all right for that and keeps track of website history.  It doesn't of course have all the tools of a good browser.  All told, I'm very satisfied after about 6 months

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: David Nowak
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product as a gift, and from what i am hearing and getting nothing but praises.  They are extremely pleased with it.  The only problems experienced were no instruction booklet comes with it, so we looked it up on line.  The camera only allows you to take selfies, unless you are agile enough to take pictures from behind your head.  But all in all she is happy with how it performs and how easy it is to operate, including purchasing new books.  I would recommend this to others.

Reviews.Title: Great video quality, app limitations
Reviews.Author: Daniel Murray
Reviews.Content: I like my Kindle overall, but find myself spending much time getting around walls to download apps available from google, but not amazon.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: Richard Bayne
Reviews.Content: Would like to see the way to add captions to the movie. Kindle Fire HD 7" has it. Other features OK

Reviews.Title: thank you in advance
Reviews.Author: anastasia40
Reviews.Content: this item arrived on time it was well packaged it was easily open I will be able to reuse the packaging the item is as the seller described although I do not see the cosmetic imperfection I am pleased with that.there has been a slight delays with some of the operations of the tablet but I'm going to give it a few days to work it out

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Angelinamorel
Reviews.Content: I love the graphics and speed of this I have had a Nook previously and the color was great but I love not only being able to read books but to easily have access to the internet I wish I could get Pet Rescue Saga and Farm Hero Saga though

Reviews.Title: Kindle 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Bridy
Reviews.Content: I choose this rating Because I love my Kindle. I can see the screen. I would recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hd
Reviews.Author: Theresa
Reviews.Content: I love it! What More can I say? If this one dies I will not hesitate to get another one.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: D
Reviews.Content: I got this as a gift for someone. When it arrived, sealed, it had already been registered to be. I didn't appreciate that. I had to de-register it and try to set it up for someone else. It was a nightmare trying to set it up for a child in a way that wouldn't require a debit card merely to get free books and applications.Otherwise it's great.

Reviews.Title: Really nice and light
Reviews.Author: Netty Potts
Reviews.Content: I will recommend this product to any student it is very light ,easy to use and convenient. The size is just right also.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for me!
Reviews.Author: Books2 Love
Reviews.Content: I love this Kindle. It is my second Kindle, but the other is just for reading. I am on this one all the time! I have apps for games, for meditation, for music, email, and on and on. I have had no problems, except for accidentally turning it off once in a while, when I don't mean to do so. The on/off button is on the side or the top, and there is no place they could put it that would avoid that however.I am very happy with it and would recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: marnie horner
Reviews.Content: I have been admiring this online from Amazon for so long. When the price came down to $189.00 I had to buy it. So glad I did! My husband purchased an off brand 8 " tablet for me for $40.00 and I got attached to it. Well, you get what you pay for. It froze permanently after about 2 months or so. I loved the Kindle reading app. and having internet access on a tablet. So, I kept checking for a Kindle special and ordered it Valentines Day. Wow! My husband was the first to plug it in and see the amazing HD screen. Charged very quickly with the USB cord it comes with through my Moto X smartphone USB power adapter. Will be ordering the PWR+ wall charger (with extra long cord) and a Bear Motion Premium Folio case w/keyboard to have a mini computer wherever I need it. I haven't watched movies or listened to music because this is really my handy books/internet access. My husband did tell me it doesn't seem to be able to read a PDF file (downloading a TV users manual) but we have several other computers so that's not an issue. If you are a light computer user (bill pay, web browsing, books, music,etc) this is an awesome little tablet. I haven't even discovered all it will do but I look forward to having my Kindle for a long time :)

Reviews.Title: Poor customer service
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: I had my new Kindle less than a week when I started having problems with it.  After several attempts through the Kindle help, it was decided to send me a new Kindle, to replace the problem one.  This took place on 2/20/14.  The repalcement Kindle was to arrive on 2/25/14.  Received an email that day saying delivery was pushed back to 3/5/14.  Called to ask why the delivery date was pushed back.  Told they were waiting for a shipment, that may be 4 to 6 weeks out.  No one offered to do any thing to correct the problem.  I asked if I coul upgrade to a 32g Kindle, that was in stock.  I could do that at todays price.  When i bought mine the 32g. was 50.00 cheaper.  When you buy a new product you expect it to work correctly.  If it doesn't you expect it to be replaced within a few days.  I hope no one else has this problem.  A lot of people recommended Amazon to me, but I will not recommend Amazon to any one.

Reviews.Title: Entertainment Powerhouse - Love it.
Reviews.Author: "By_George"
Reviews.Content: I have had my new Kindle Fire HD for about a week now and I love it.  It is packed with entertainment...the Dual Band Wi-Fi is excellent.  I have added about a dozen hot spot locations to my device and my device connects quickly and offers excellent streaming of content.  The picture quality is nice and bright and crisp, the dolby audio and speaker positions on the Kindle is also excellent.  I bought this device on Valentine's Day for myself.  It was normally $299 and amazon was offering $80 off.  This was the best discount I had seen on amazon so I took the plunge and I have been in love ever since.  I have downloaded more than 25 apps already.  My favorite is the CW app (fantastic) ... Since this channel has over half of my favorite shows:  Arrow, Beauty and the Beast, Supernatural, and the Vampire Diaries.  The Nightly News and CNN app keep me up to date on current events and the Weather Channel app offers a quick look at the forcast for the week.  I cant rave enough about my tablet.  Why spend $500 or more on a smart phone.  Get a tablet.  It is a much better value.

Reviews.Title: charging issues
Reviews.Author: Thomas A. Baxter
Reviews.Content: I like the Kindle when it works, but I am on my 5th Kindle because of charging issues.  I thought that I was over charging them so I reduced the time of charging.  That didn't work either, the Kindles have not lasted more than one charging before going completely dead.  Amazon has a real problem with this issue that needs to be addressed ASAP.  I have many books that need to be read but the Kindles aren't up to it.

Reviews.Title: Not Elder Friendly
Reviews.Author: tulipsandy
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my Mom who has macular degeneration.  She was hoping to play card games.  The game portion is great, it's the buttons at the bottom that are so tiny and close together, she couldn't manage those buttons.  It seemed to me, Kindle could have made them bigger and farther apart.  Even the TIME on top is very tiny.  She still has her Kindle Paperwhite for reading and I am able to adjust font bigger so she can read.  Very disappointed and I am returning.

Reviews.Title: Review of Kindle HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: Shelley R. Blumstein
Reviews.Content: This is a replacement Kindle. The battery on the first one was defective in 6 months. Amazon replaced the Kindle with one that did not have the updated software mine did. I wasted four hours of my time in the store where I bought it, because Kindle Support told me to reboot the Kindle, and then to register it to solve my problem. If it were not for the alert employee in the store who saw the software issue, I still would not know what was the issue. I would never buy a Kindle again, because Kindle Support does not know its product. Next time I will buy an Apple I-Pad so I can go straight to the Apple store.

Reviews.Title: A good product, other than a few important items
Reviews.Author: Nancy Taylor
Reviews.Content: I purchased my Kindle 6 months ago & I now feel that I can write an adequate review, for I've finally had enough time to learn all the good & bad about it! On the plus side, it's lightweight and I find myself using it to look things up far more than I ever did with my notebook pc because of it's portability! The carousel on the homepage lets you keep whichever of your apps that you use the most readily available.While there are many other features that I like, I feel that if I was reading a product review, I'd be looking for the downside of it when making my decision as to whether or not to purchase it. First off, I found that Amazon makes a good portion of their money by charging for EVERYTHING! I was immediately annoyed to see that no direct electrical outlet charger was included with it! Instead, it came with one that charges through my pc & takes 5x longer...but you can always purchase the better one at the Amazon store, which your Kindle has a direct link to on it's homepage! The same holds true for the case ($50.), screen protector (I found this necessary due to all the fingerprints left on the screen no matter HOW much I washed my hands before touching it!) & stylus. But one of my most important discoveries which would have affected my decision to purchase the Kindle was something I only learned quite recently: you CANNOT USE ANYONE ELSE'S APPS W/O MAKING AN ADJUSTMENT WHICH VOIDS YOUR WARRANTY!!! I believe that this one item is probably something that anyone considering purchasing a Kindle should first be aware of before buying! This is the one thing which would've had me looking for a different tablet! Other than that, I am happy w/my purchase & I've learned so much from using it.

Reviews.Title: Is perfect!!
Reviews.Author: Ana Helena
Reviews.Content: Is like having an iPad with the benefit on having any book you like!! I recommend the readers that are looking something that allows us to read and surfing on the internet, watch movies, to play games etc.

Reviews.Title: OK
Reviews.Author: Deevyne
Reviews.Content: Where the buttons are placed is weird and even if its cheaper than a ipad a ipad doesnt ask for a credit card :/

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: DD Gainor-Pinkis
Reviews.Content: I just received my Kinder Fire HD tablet, so I am still finding my way around.  I have never used a tablet before or a fancy phone. I am 65 years old, and we never had phones or anything like this when I was growing up.  So this is all new to me.  I am learning as I go, so to speak, but it seems like alot of fun.  I mainly ordered it to read books and watch movies in bed or on trips .  I have a home computer, which I  love,  but this will be great for traveling and sending emails on the go or Facebook with my friends.  So far, I love it and I would recommend it to anyone.  The screen and color of the hd is fantastic.  I think I will start playing games too. This is opening a whole new world to me.

Reviews.Title: Kid friendly and stress free for parents.
Reviews.Author: Rasalghoul
Reviews.Content: After owning this for a year now my son still uses it on an almost daily basis. Battery still last ridiculously long, screen is scratch free and performance is great. In 1 year of use this tablet has only rebooted once versus the almost weekly reboot of our other Android and Apple tablets.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire 8.9HD
Reviews.Author: Serena M Walker
Reviews.Content: I LOVE MY KINDLE TABLET AND THE PRICE WAS AMAZING. IT'S PRETTY EASY TO USE ONCE YOU GET THE HANG OF. I,m still learning what all l can do but so far l,m very pleased. This is my first TABLET experience and my friends have the iPad but l truly believe l got the better deal.

Reviews.Title: My husband loves it.
Reviews.Author: Ellessay
Reviews.Content: We were looking at the Kindle Fire since my daughter bought one.  We already had the keyboard Kindles and we both love them, but my night-owl husband wanted something he could read in bed without disturbing me with the light. We debated about the Paperwhite, but liked the idea of having internet access.  We bought the 7" Kindle Fire first, but after using it for a couple of weeks, he decided he'd rather have the larger sized one.  So I got the 7" and it's perfect for me, while he enjoys the 8.9."  We would both recommend them to anyone who asks.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Denise Funk
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle. When my husband is using the laptop I use my Kindle. I can also use it when I need a crochet pattern. I don' t own a printer but look up the pattern and then just read it off the Kindle. I can use it to listen to music or just check out facebook. Very nice to have.

Reviews.Title: I upgraded to a "better " next gen Kindle and wish I hadn't
Reviews.Author: Js.salem
Reviews.Content: I upgraded to the Kindle HD 8.9" 32 GB tablet from an original Kindle Fire HD,  7" tablet. Quite frankly,  I am disappointed. I really dont see much improvement in processing speed,  new options or anything else. The video quality is great (like my original) and the sound still has room for improvement.  The biggest disappointment: the newer Kindles cannot play Adobe Flash content. For me,  that's a deal breaker.  The new "experimental"player is slow,  does not play much of the content,  and freezes. Since a lot of web content is Flash,  I am shocked that there is no app to allow you to play Flash content.  Makes me sad because I love the Amazon products,  but I'll be going back to my 1 st gen 7" Kindle HD!

Reviews.Title: I love the size
Reviews.Author: Sandra
Reviews.Content: I've had mine over a month and wish I wouldn't have bought it. I upgraded from a Kindle Fire 1 generation. I was very excited to get a bigger screen. The battery life is AWFULL! The touch screen is slower then my old one and the Silk browser crashes all the time.

Reviews.Title: iove it love it
Reviews.Author: Shelia Anderson
Reviews.Content: I had the older kindle fire and I love it , but when the new kindle fire came out my father bought it for me love it love it ,great because you can print with it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Diane Thums
Reviews.Content: I have the  first generation Kindle and I actually bought this for my husband. I could NOT believe the improvements on it .  If there is one thing I bought that I really enjoy it was the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: No Power Adapter Cord?
Reviews.Author: Roxann Gaghich
Reviews.Content: I have ordered one Kindle and four Kindle Fires in the last five years.  This is the first one that does not come with a wall power adapter.  It is sold separately for $19.99.  No where could I find that this was not included.  When informed by Amazon that this is the case, I went back to the description.  You have to go to the very bottom (about five pages), where you are told this.  I think this is a  deceitful practice.  Also, this Kindle does not show a power light when it is charging (previous models have).  I will try this Kindle over the next few days, however I may not keep it.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: taur125
Reviews.Content: I bought the Fire HD 7" when it first came out.  It has been very reliable, and I decided to get the larger Fire HD 8.9".  I use the HD 7" mostly as an ereader, but the larger 8.9" screen is great for watching movies, playing games, and using the internet.  It is quick to load pages on the internet, has fantastic resolution, and is very easy to navigate. Since this Fire has been out for a while, it seems to be very polished and without any bugs.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HD
Reviews.Author: O N Wascom
Reviews.Content: I have a first generation generation Kindle, 7", I love this larger screen and HD! Got it on sale for Valentine's Day, VERY happy with it!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: camotim
Reviews.Content: This devise replaced my 7" Kindle Fire which I loved; I needed a larger viewing screen, which the 8.9" Kindle Fire offers; very remarkable devise

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Heidi
Reviews.Content: I stream movies through Amazon Prime so the bigger screen is great!  I started with the 7" Fire and upgraded.  Amazon took my old one in on trade and made me a great deal on this one!!

Reviews.Title: Sales
Reviews.Author: Jim P
Reviews.Content: Let me start by explaining that I don't yet own one of these. I have played with them at the store and love it. I'm writing for a different reason. Two hours ago this Kindle was listed on sale for $189.00, this piqued my interest immediately but I decided to think about it. Fast forward two hours....the price...$229.00. The moral of this story is don't hesitate, obviously prices can change without notice. After kicking myself in the ass I am now sitting here contemplating the purchase again, this time for the $229.00 price. Just trying to help my fellow buyer.

Reviews.Title: awesome thanks
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: great deal great product! thank you!very prompt  deliverybla bla bla blahow many more words ????bye bye bye

Reviews.Title: kindle fire HD  8.9"
Reviews.Author: kathleen m kraus
Reviews.Content: I love it.i already wrote this under the onynx standing case. i loved that as well, lets your hands feel free instead of holding it up.love the kindle itself can do so much with it. play my favorite games, read  articles.

Reviews.Title: No Screen reader
Reviews.Author: John C.
Reviews.Content: For those who are not visually impaired to the extent that I am this machine is great but because it did not have a screen reader I could not use it.  I sent it back and ordered a 7 inch HDX which does have a screen reader and I love it.  I wish I could have afforded to get the 8.9 inch model however but my income does not allow for that at this time.  john C

Reviews.Title: So far great
Reviews.Author: Roselle Harney "WSMer"
Reviews.Content: When my 1st edition Kindle would not take a charge, I was offered a discount on the 8.9 HD kindle.  I didn't have the funds at the time and waited.  When I was able to get the kindle it was no longer a new one but refurbished.  I was skeptical but Amazon gave me a $20 credit to go with it, and I was able to get a case for it.  It looked brand new, and so far has worked like a charm without any problems.  I love the bigger screen and the perks of the HD. It still comes with a one year warranty and Amazon has always been great about their warranties.  So I am very pleased with this kindle.

Reviews.Title: Nice to bring with me
Reviews.Author: griffin
Reviews.Content: I have looked at other and this is better than most, so much to do, I sometime forget to charge! (my bad) Works for me to read, learning how to look at my pictures, need more help on bringing them to my kindle, but I'll get there, and the wifi option is great!!

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: Ameenah I. Luqmaan
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD 8.9 is great.  Just the right size, it stores all Apps, games and books.  Plus, you can't beat the price, which is lower than iPad.  However, in my opinion there are 2 areas that need improvement.  1) Camera to face both directions; 2) The ability to use my photos as screen savers on the Kindle Fire HD 8.9.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy With It
Reviews.Author: Joyce A Hendlowitch
Reviews.Content: You really can't beat it for the price.  I would love it even more if it didn't have the ads showing all the time.  And I would also love  it more if when it  shows deals good only for a limited time that you could actually access them easily.  It is fun to play  with and I'm still leaning how to access all the information about how to use it.  It is a  cool item and I have no problems with it being refurbished at all.

Reviews.Title: Overall.very good
Reviews.Author: Debbie Schell
Reviews.Content: I really than like it.The only criticism I have is the silk browser sometimes freezes.  Has been very easy to figure out (I am not technically savy).

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Cincinnati Shopper
Reviews.Content: I'm really enjoying my new Kindle.  Still learning though.  I wish it would have come with more user info though.  I guess I'll pick up a "Kindel for Dummies" book.

Reviews.Title: Love, Love, Love My Kindle!
Reviews.Author: Noreen
Reviews.Content: I thought I would never give up reading paper books, but I was hooked from the first moment I used my kindle.  I purchased a cover for it that has a band that I can slip my hand into, so it makes reading while lying down so simple--no pages flipping all over!  Love being able to access the internet if I have access to WiFi.  Just a neat little gadget and so portable!  Just one problem--I read through so many books now and it is SOOOO easy to purchase another one!  TOOOO easy!  :)

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: darlene
Reviews.Content: I choose the 8.9 size because to me the other size was too small. It makes it easier for me to read my books, than having to read them on the computer. Plus I can do other things on here while someone else is using my computer. There is one draw back I wish that they would fix. I wish that they would come up with a chat program that would work on it.

Reviews.Title: great color and sound
Reviews.Author: Margie
Reviews.Content: It looked and performed like New . The power port was the only portion that shows wear. The battery life is lacking. My grandchildren are frustrated by the lack of memory to store videos for air flights. The streaming video functions are fine but show no improvement over the fire. I still would like a rear facing camera. I have to successfully save a video. Photographs are difficult.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Lana Deluca
Reviews.Content: I bought two of them for my granddaughters.  They love them.  Now I have to get one for myself.  So many things to do with them.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Glenda
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my husband for his birthday. And he is loving it! The price was awesome, so I could not resist.He has been wanting one for years. Thank you for all of your help in getting him started. You have never let me down.

Reviews.Title: Can't get enough of.
Reviews.Author: Judy weathers
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied I also have an iPad2 and I think it gives the iPad a run for its money. I am thinking about buying one for my other daughter.

Reviews.Title: Big stepup from my Kindle Fire 7"
Reviews.Author: lulu
Reviews.Content: This new Kindle Fire HD 8.9" has bright, sharp color and outstanding sound. I am so happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindel Fire
Reviews.Author: Kindle user "Kindle User"
Reviews.Content: It is a very good tablet however the main draw back I am finding is the battery life is not very long when compared to the 1st gen I had. But all in all a good machine.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Judy Hughes
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HD 8.9", and wouldn't give it up for any other device.  I have looked at other readers and tablets, and the Kindle does everything that they do, but better.  I am so happy that my husband bought me my first Kindle a few years ago, and each year has upgraded for me.  Thank you Amazon for making such a great product, and I look forward to my next Kindle in the near future.

Reviews.Title: its great
Reviews.Author: steven "steven"
Reviews.Content: its greatits all it said it wasit does alot and you can get anything on itits fast than my sister inlaws apple ipadthe price i paid was $229.00 but two days after i order it .it went down to $189.00 thats a $39.00 mark down

Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Shirley Joan cobb
Reviews.Content: NOT TO SURE ABOUT MY PURCHASE HAVE HAD PROBLEMS WITH IT FREEZING UP AND TROUBLE GETTING ON THE INTERNET.  WORKED FOR OVER AN HOUR WITH HELP BUT PROBLEMS CAME BACK AND CAN NOT SEEM TO USE THE INTERNET AND THAT TAKES AWAY ALOT OF THE BENEFITS.  STILL WORKING ON PROBLEMS WHEN TIME IS AVAILABLE.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hd 8.9" 4g lte , 64 gb
Reviews.Author: rose
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with tablet with new battery that didn't last 2 hour's in last tablet.. Thanks for fast response to problem. Very pleased with customer service providers.

Reviews.Title: love this
Reviews.Author: Adrienne M. Brown
Reviews.Content: i use my tablet all the time. it is easy to use and does everything i wanted. i don't even need a lap top now that i have this.

Reviews.Title: Everything i needed!
Reviews.Author: Heather Davis
Reviews.Content: This has been one of my best purchases yet! Its been a little tough learning the Android OS vs. Apple OS but it's all good. I would highly recommend it right up there with the iPad:)

Reviews.Title: wow
Reviews.Author: V Betz
Reviews.Content: what could you do not love this .  it does everything and more... the best thing to take with you to dr. or waiting in  a car or anywhere. you can play games megs, music. wow so much more,, you can get on line get email.. just a wonderful as a ipad (maybe even better)...lovvve it.

Reviews.Title: replacing ipad 1
Reviews.Author: patti
Reviews.Content: I wanted to get a new tablet as I had the 1st generation ipad. Did not want to spend $500 so I checked out the competition.I am very pleased with the screen quality and how fast this Kindle is, but the layout of my most used pages: hotmail & Facebook are hard to get used to.  Also, being a smaller screen, it's harder for me to read some print.  All in all, a good deal and beautiful picture.

Reviews.Title: Why buy new?
Reviews.Author: Micah Boyd
Reviews.Content: Excellent product with no hassle exchange for out of warranty, less expensive kindle.  Why buy new?  Comparable. To my son's IPad Air.

Reviews.Title: wow!!!!
Reviews.Author: anthony rubino
Reviews.Content: Eceeded my expectations in every way!! bright clear screen, instant setup amazon prime is a no brainer. Verry easy to use

Reviews.Title: So far so good.
Reviews.Author: alan fitzgerald
Reviews.Content: I had trouble with the first kindle fire HD but,  Amazon took care of the return even though Meijer's where I purchased it refused toadjust or replace the unit.  After e-mailing and calling technical help @ Amazon the problem was resolved in a timely fashion.The 2nd unit is fine and a joy to use.  It will pickup known wi-fi addresses flawlessly with a strong signal.  If you're used to androidit is fairly easy to navigate with some subtle differences.My wife has a paperwhite that she likes very much.Tip:  Buy online from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Addicted to my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Kimberly A. borgzinner
Reviews.Content: Since I work all day in an office on a computer, I did not want a kindle for "office" type work which I loath doing at home.  So, I purchased this solely for my entertainment.  That said, I love it.  Movies are clear and amazing, books are sharp and the larger screen makes them easy to read, love that I can shop amazon easily, surf the web, and play on social media.  I did purchase amazon prime to go with it.  Love my 2 day shipping on all my amazon purchases!!  The only negative, was there was only a USB cord to power it up, needed to purchase the adapter to actually plug it into the wall.  That was super inconvenient; include all the parts, and its a 5 start product.If my budget would have allowed, I would have upgraded to the HDX 4 core processor.

Reviews.Title: Why pay more?
Reviews.Author: Les
Reviews.Content: For the price, this tablet is quality through and through.  I had a Nextbook before purchasing this tablet was not impressed at all.  The Kindle 8.9 HD fills my needs perfectly.  Large screen makes it easy to see, button in logical places, screen display is clean and clear, sound is great with the 2 built in speakers.  I use it to browse when wathing TV and reading books mostly.

Reviews.Title: interesting change
Reviews.Author: Michael Rivera
Reviews.Content: I got this device primarily for ebooks, as my bookcase runneth over.  I have been playing around with apps, though, and have been pleased with the appearance and function so far.  I was using an ipad before, so it took a little getting used to, but it seems to be a lot of good looking features in a small package.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Terry McBride
Reviews.Content: Christmas present for my wife.  She hasn't put it down and today is Feb 5th.  Yes it is worth the money and the screen size and clarity is great.

Reviews.Title: i love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: miskryie
Reviews.Content: I haven't owned a Kindle before, I was on a Toshiba Thrive prior....but I love my Kindle and I have only had one problem once where I thought it was "zapped" out, possibly fried because it wouldn't reboot...but then I got on with customer service, got it reset and it has been fine since.Amazon customer service really rocks it.

Reviews.Title: Really nice product.
Reviews.Author: J. Smiley "obiwan"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife and she really likes it for going onto the internet and playing games.  She says it is to heavy for reading and uses her old Kindle for reading. Kind of disappointed that right after I bought they lowered the price...but hey that happens.

Reviews.Title: More than I expected!
Reviews.Author: Heath Carnicom
Reviews.Content: The screen is much larger and brighter, and silk is not too bad. Great for school, work, and reading in bed.

Reviews.Title: I love My Kindle
Reviews.Author: gabbygirl
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire. It goes where I go. I can go on internet, check my email, watch movies, TV shows, play games and download books to read anytime I want. What in the world did I do before I had My Kindle Fire??

Reviews.Title: It's a keeper.
Reviews.Author: Jeannette A. Phillips
Reviews.Content: I just gave it 3 stars b'cuz there are a lot of features that auto add themselves and clutter the interface, I don't like all of the sales pitches and some of the operations are not obvious, for examptle; I find deleting old files, personal letters and unwanted apps more trying and had to dig deep to find out how to do so.  They don't always delete even after they ask me if I'm sure that I want to delete those files.  Personal letters that sit on your desktop seem to eventually fade but I haven't yet found out how to delete them once I've read them.  You should be able to simply select them with a right click and be given option, like delete?, move? save? etc, but no.  Otherwise, I love the page look options, when reading a book, the ability to check books out from my library and the size of the book.  It also responds well to wireless local networks.

Reviews.Title: very enjoyable
Reviews.Author: dennis cece
Reviews.Content: have read many books through my library and through amazon books. Very easy to use and carry with me on a plane.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: B.A.
Reviews.Content: This product works as it should and was promoted to do what it does.  I am satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: James Wade
Reviews.Content: great little tablet for everyday use would recommend one to my friends. works great with it's wireless keyboard. thanks for it

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Joanie L. Moore "PicWoman"
Reviews.Content: Works great, no problems. I use it all the time and it is my "right hand" machine. Great little kindle.

Reviews.Title: My wife can't put it down
Reviews.Author: Barney R
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my wife at Christmas and since she has unwrapped it, I think she has gone through about thirty books already.  since we are retired, she normally reads books all day, but since she has the new Kindle, It is open from the time she wakes up till she goes to bed at night.  Now I'm not so sure it was a good idea, but after 50 years together I can hardly deny her anything she wants.

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Marie
Reviews.Content: This was an upgrade from the original Kindle Fire. The Kindle Fire HD 8.9 is like having a laptop, only easier to carry around. I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Better then the ipad
Reviews.Author: Cassie
Reviews.Content: Cheeper then a ipad and works just as well. I can get all the apps I want and has the kindle built in! Got on sale and couldn't be more happy!

Reviews.Title: Gorgeous HD and much more affordable than an IPad
Reviews.Author: Mrs Greinke "Joanne"
Reviews.Content: I purchased one of these for myself a few months ago and I love it. I purchased a second one for my husband when he sold his original Kindle (e-reader only) and the Samsung tablet that he has is now used primarily at work. This awesome 8.9" HD Kindle Fire is a tablet and a reader with so many extra features. I know that I've only tapped into a small portion of what it can do but look forward to continuing to learn more about it and all of the cool stuff that it does. An added bonus...it's much more affordable than an IPad at a starting price of $249.00. Amazon frequently has specials on their Kindles. Check back frequently because you never know when they'll be available at a discounted price.

Reviews.Title: Needs help
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Wanting in some critical areas.Specifically the app store and Internet access. Bought this awhile ago and after using it for a few months I found it is a good reader and decent for watching movies but the more I used it I found it extremely weak for internet use and the availability of some basic apps.I got to revisit this relatively inadequate device for more advanced operations after looking my Note 8.0. Like moving from a Jag to a Yugo.What I don't known is whether the internet issue is related to the POS Silk app for browsing. It constantly freezes and  with every click.The app store has no other web browser available. You now realize that even though it acts like a droid it is more locked down than Apple.Don't buy. There are lots of better tabs out there.

Reviews.Title: 8.9" Kindle Fire review
Reviews.Author: Anita Richards
Reviews.Content: this worked very well for 5 months...then froze up, replacement came and it was faulty. Third replacement came and so far so good,  I must say all Kindle Support  folks were wonderful, helpful and right there for me Great supportive service and it was IMMEDIATE !  My rating will probably become higher once I pass that 6 month marker.

Reviews.Title: Tough to charge
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: Battery is an issue. Rarely charges to 100% even when it's plugged in overnight. Often reaches 98% but not 100%.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD review
Reviews.Author: sheila cooley
Reviews.Content: I give the product a rating of two because it does not hold charge very long and it takes forever to charge. I believe the charging system on mine is not working properly because people I know has the same one and they said they don't have that problem. Only one person I know said they had the same problem and was sent a different charger and it fixed their problem . I cant see putting more money into the product unless I know for sure it will correct the problem because I have invested quite a bit already and have only had it a few months.

Reviews.Title: Should have bought the one without the discount!
Reviews.Author: Nyla Ross
Reviews.Content: My daughter uses this device and says that has trouble downloading and using downloaded apps. And don't like that she cannot use screen saver on hers.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Therese Romano
Reviews.Content: My husband was going to spend money on an ipad for me but I wasn't very excited about that, since I never learned to use my itouch correctly.  My sister-in-law has the kindle with a smaller screen and she loves hers so I suggested that.  I love it.  I can't leave it alone. I can pick up emails, shop on line, read, and play games.  I recently ordered 2 books.  Now I can't put it down because of the book I'm reading. Buy it, you'll love it.

Reviews.Title: Switched from Kindle Fire HD 7 2013 to HD 8.9 2012 And Glad I did!
Reviews.Author: Coraly
Reviews.Content: I previously purchased the Kindle Fire HD 7" 16gb for $159 and I'm so glad I exchanged it for the Kindle Fire HD 8.9" 16gb 2012 for $229 because although it's a year behind its just as good as the 7" 2013, And in my opinion, Even Better! The reasons I say this is first off the 8.9" has a front facing camera for Skype and if you download a certain editing app you can access the camera itself and the newer 2013 doesn't even have a camera. The screen is actually a huge difference from the 7" if you compare them side to side, the 8.9 is such a bigger screen. My sister even wants to return hers 7", She said, ("It Looks like a toy next to yours"). lol :) Also the screen resolution for the 7"  is only 1280x800 vs the 2012 8.9" is 1920x1200, so the screen is so much more beautiful and clear than the "newer improved" version. And, the processors are both Dual Core Processor 1.5 Ghz. So overall in my opinion between the two this one beats it by leaps and bounds.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Gmadonna
Reviews.Content: I didn't realize how messed up my original Kindle Fire was until I got the replacement. Thank you, thank you, thank you for allowing me to return the original Kindle and get one that really works. I love the Kindle Fire. One of my better investments.

Reviews.Title: Hard ot read in teh sun adn Wifi not strong
Reviews.Author: Jackielk
Reviews.Content: The wifi kept getting tossed off.  also I was told that you could read it in the sun but you  can not

Reviews.Title: Last year's model 8.9
Reviews.Author: Brady Brown
Reviews.Content: I'm sure the new upgrades are fabulous, but a year age, there wasn't enough difference to recommend the first Fire over the original.  We found the lighter 7" to be better for our young daughter and for reading in bed than this larger one was to hold.  Also, the kid's Freetime didn't have the content we were looking for as a main selling point.  Too many attempts to sell us in-app purchases and "outside the sandbox" app upgrades, and too many commercialized brand name characters. If this changes, I'd gladly renew my subscription!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Ferd J Ferrell
Reviews.Content: I have other computers, tablets, and smart phones and I had not given a Kindle much thought, because I continue to like real books. I ordered the Kindle for my wife, but as all husbands may or may not do, I had to explore. Long story short...I got a great deal on the Kindle by getting an Amazon credit card and they had a sale going on.What a great purchase !!!! The Kindle ties in so well with Amazon. Reading on the Kindle has many advantages that I was unaware of, such as it reading to you...The picture is clear, the sound fantastic and the use is easy to learn.I would recommend this tablet to anyone and also getting an Amazon credit card to go with it makes it even better...

Reviews.Title: Best purchase I have made in a long time.
Reviews.Author: Bullet824
Reviews.Content: I asked my sister, I call her Miss Gadget and I knew she would know which one would suit my needs best. I use it in church for the bible app, I use it at work to read E-mail, and I use it at home for games and browsing the web. I would recommend it to anyone. If you like to read or any of the above choices this would be a great buy.Thank you,Happy

Reviews.Title: great purchase
Reviews.Author: lisa steele
Reviews.Content: awesome,so glad I went this route rather than the ipad. My dughter, an ipad owner, suggested I get a tablet with a USB port

Reviews.Title: Lacking proper instructions for its usage
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: Found nothing in package to help or aid an unknowlegeable user into the use of this item.It is not the easiest Pad to use without the smplified instructions included. Shoud have included a user manual

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 8.9"
Reviews.Author: sonflower
Reviews.Content: I"m disappointed with this item. The battery life is not nearly as long as specified. I have troule getting e-mails and had to restart this several times. I even had to send one back and get another one only to encounter the same issues. If youre just going to use this to read it's fine. If I would have known I would have purchased a different device.

Reviews.Title: KindlefireHD 8.9
Reviews.Author: Orthel Grapine
Reviews.Content: I have found this kindle hd to be rather slow,  it freezes a lot, it gets hot during usage . Another fact is that all my digital games items that I bought have not transferred to this kindle. Will be contacting customer support

Reviews.Title: Looks great, purposely crippled for some reason though....
Reviews.Author: Oren
Reviews.Content: The tablet looks beautiful; its slim, light, fast and the display is very bright and sharp. However, ive you've ever used another android device, this thing is going to make you really mad. Its impossible to access the google play store without rooting it, which can eaisly brick the device, rendering it completely useless untill you send it in. There is just way too much available on google play for Amazon to just block it on a device that would be perfect for it. There are a couple other apps that do work for searching/installing new apps without using Amazons app store, which is the only reason I didnt return it. So far about 90% of the apps that Amazon charges for are legaly available for free elsewhere.... The default "carousel" home screen is awkward and clunky. There are some other options out there, but you can never completely get rid of the horrid home screen. You also have to pay Amazon if you want the advertisements to be taken off your lock screen.... Yes, even after you BUY it, you are still forced to view ads unless you give them even more money.In hindsight, I really wish I would have bought a different, un-crippled android tablet. However if you are already an Amazon prime member, and do a lot of reading, then this could be a good tablet for you. Personally, I will probably never buy another Amazon tablet, at least untill they quit trying to force you to use only their store.

Reviews.Title: This is our first tablet.
Reviews.Author: Gary Barclay
Reviews.Content: Heavier then expected and not user friendly at startup.  We do not have one of those fancy do everything cell phones so our learning curve isn't the best.  Just needs a little getting use to.  My wife is very happy reading downloaded books at night in bed, and I'm happy to be able to go to sleep with the overhead light off.

Reviews.Title: it is very nice..
Reviews.Author: Michael B. Garcia
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my mom to use her email.. it turned out to take too many steps for her.. I wish it had gps.. it doesn't.. the screen is large and nice.. it does NOT come with a charger.. it has WiFi.. for internet  browsing on the couch it is perfect.. for shopping it is nice (Amazon, hello).. 4 stars no charger and no gps..

Reviews.Title: great product!!
Reviews.Author: crystal myers
Reviews.Content: I love it....it does everything a tablet would do....and the side is good....it's not to small and not to big....it's perfect.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful and fun....
Reviews.Author: Theresa C. Morton
Reviews.Content: Great tablet.  Graphics are stunning and I am enjoying getting to know my device.  Have downloading several apps and they are fun and easy to understand.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for anyone who loves to read.
Reviews.Author: Marion Lane
Reviews.Content: I loved this Kindle.  I am nearly 80 years of age and I appreciate the light behind the reading ---which allows me to read in bed with comfort.  I can also make the letters much larger which helps me read with ease.  It is a blessing.  Marion

Reviews.Title: Very happy with my Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Flamingo Gal "CMG"
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this.  I have hesitated to buy a tablet and have always been very happy with my regular Kindle.  But with a sale price, I just couldn't resist.  I ordered the larger size so I could enjoy videos / movies more.  Glad I did.  Just watched a HD movie on it and it was great.  This combined with my new Amazon Prime account are the perfect combo.

Reviews.Title: Great, with a couple of caveats
Reviews.Author: nictoanamide
Reviews.Content: The best thing about this for me is that it will play Amazon Prime movies. Also, this doesn't come with a charger, just a USB cable. Don't be fooled by all of the charger reviews claiming you need massive power to charge this device. It will easily charge with any little standard cell phone charger with the correct mini USB connector. I bought one with more power after reading the reviews, so I do have a hotter charger, ($10 on Amazon) but I also found that it wasn't necessary. Just use your cell phone charger. So it takes an extra hour or two, so what? The charging icon is not automatically displayed. Go to settings and turn it on, or you can't tell its charging. (its also a very tiny icon, put on your reading glasses to verify that its charging!!)The unique part I mention is that it does not have the standard desk top format we are used to looking at. It does not display a desk top which you put icons or short cuts on in the traditional sense. It has a completely different way of showing them which for me and my wife took a while to get accustomed to. I guess someone is always trying to invent a better mouse trap, but its really not an improvement over the normal desktop scenario everyone is used to. But other than that its a great product. Frankly, if I had it to do over again, I think I'd just get the 7" screen. Even though this is bigger, its really not that much better for viewing than the 7", it just costs more, but that's just me.

Reviews.Title: I'm Very Happy!!!
Reviews.Author: laydeejay
Reviews.Content: This is the first tablet I purchased.  I wanted an alternative to my laptop for vacations or weekend trips. This seems to fit the bill perfectly so far at least.  I will have to monitor my AT&T; bill more closely because of the additional charges for the 4G access.  I purchased this item on QVC on a 5 monthly payment plan they offered during a 2 hour show for Kindle Fire HD, which is great for my budget because I didn't have to pay the whole price upfront.  I also joined the Prime club for all its benefits.  Overall, as I said before so far so good.

Reviews.Title: Grea Tablet
Reviews.Author: anjrose
Reviews.Content: I am so glad I purchased his table.  I must say my first impression was no good. He battery life was awful, but what I discovered is hat 1) my new awake case was depleting he battery and 2) when I connected it to charge it was automatically turning itself on this never truly completing a charge.  I go rid of he case and now make sure the table is off.  Battery problem solved. Now I love it!  Especially glad I got he 4g model.

Reviews.Title: poor picture quality
Reviews.Author: Smith
Reviews.Content: One of the main purposes for purchasing the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 was to watch movies on Netflix. The picture quality was so poor that I have returned the item. The website led me to believe that the picture quality would be as good or better than iPad, and it was not. I was very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: screen "sleeps" when I don't want it to. pain when you are using it in school
Reviews.Author: jennifer law
Reviews.Content: screen "sleeps" when I don't want it to.... I will be in the middle of typing on my keyboard and it will go black, or reading a text book and it goes black... something I never experienced with my iPAD... somewhat regretting my purchase because it is THAT ANNOYING.3 of 5 because its very useful for school. loss of two stars because of the sleepy screen annoyancebattery life is acceptable.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY KINDLE!!
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Anne Lindsay
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle!! It goes everywhere with me! I love that I get all the features of an IPad  but for cheaper! I also have the amazon prime membership. It's paid for its self a dozen times already!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire Not For Me
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Launiere "Tampa Realtor"
Reviews.Content: I was excited to get the Kindle Fire. I have another tablet that is heavy and several years old. I already have a Kindle Paperwhite and love it for the beach. I felt that I would like the Kindle Fire for reading in color and thought it would be a much faster tablet than my Toshiba. It is not. The picture quality is somewhat better though. My biggest complaint is that apps are only from Amazon, you cannot download apps from Google Play. Several of the apps that I like, I cannot use on the Fire. If I could do it over I would have purchased an iPad, or Galaxy. Might be great for others, but for me a waste of my hard earned money.

Reviews.Title: Yuk!!!! Hate this thing., have had it over a year now. Silk Don't respond half the time. very aggravating to use!!
Reviews.Author: catwoman
Reviews.Content: Hate this thing, it's gotten to be so aggravating to use. Mostly j u st read on it now! Hope someone has better luck  Just wanted to say Amazon called and told me how to correct problem, now works great!! THANKS AMAZON! SHOULD HAVE CALLED CUSTOMER SERVICE FIRST!

Reviews.Title: Love our kindles!
Reviews.Author: Alixe Ingoglia
Reviews.Content: This is the second kindle for the family. The size is great, the price is too. My mom recently gave up her iPad, and loves the Kindle just as much!

Reviews.Title: Buying this was a great choice!
Reviews.Author: Genell Goodson
Reviews.Content: I was on the fence about buying a Kindle Fire vs an Ipad but I made the right choice! I love it & wouldn't trade it for any other brand tablet out there!

Reviews.Title: 8.9 kindle
Reviews.Author: wendy kirby
Reviews.Content: My hubby got this for me for  Christmas ,I love it I have a iPad but it has a shortage in it  this kindle is better  for everything and a great price does the same as a iPad ,

Reviews.Title: Worth every penny!
Reviews.Author: lsal mom
Reviews.Content: I bought this Kindle Fire HD 8.9" when Amazon was offering $30 off. It made it only $80 more than the most expensive reader. I had previously owned a Kindle reader with a navigation button. When the button quit working I was unable to use the reader anymore. I began looking for a new Kindle and was unsure which one to purchase. My 10 yr old has a Samsung tablet which I have used on occasion and I find it easy to navigate. I have a Kindle app on my laptop which I used regularly but some books I wanted to check out of the library would only download to a Kindle and not a Kindle app per the publishers guidelines. So when Amazon put the Kindle Fire on sale I decided to get the HD so I could read and also use the internet and play games. I bought the 16 GB with Wi-Fi because I didn't want to pay for a wireless plan and we have Wi-Fi at home. When it arrived I opened it and put it in the case I had purchased and immediately began to use it. It is so easy. The screen is very responsive to finger taps and swipes, maybe even more so than the Samsung. I never have any trouble with my internet connection and pages load very quickly. At 39 I am in what I guess you would call the in between generation. Computers became a household item when I was a teenager and has progressed from there. I didn't cut my teeth on technology but I find it easy to comprehend and this Kindle is very easy for me. My 5, 3, & 2 year old all love to play games on it and read books. My 10 year old wants to play on it too. If you want a Kindle for reading but also spend time online and play games then this is for you. I typed this review on my Kindle Fire, very easy to use keyboard too!

Reviews.Title: Very happy with the Kindle HD 8.9!
Reviews.Author: Luci Baker
Reviews.Content: More than met my expectations. Love it.  I use it every day for so many things and it has enhanced my reading experience

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: I love the sound quality, camera, pixles. it is just great and i love it even more then my previous 1st gen kindle!!!

Reviews.Title: Nice.
Reviews.Author: Estella
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my granddaughter and the money was well spent.  It is her constant companion and even encourages her to read books!  So far it has been trouble free.

Reviews.Title: Did not meet my expectations
Reviews.Author: dancingsky
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle but i was constantly having to recharge my Kindle.  I have contacted Amazon support for the Kindle and it has been determined that I need to return the Kindle for an exchange.  So we will see how the next one works out.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: JOANNE PERRY
Reviews.Content: So far I love it.  My grandson told me I needed to get one, and even though I had no idea what you did with one, decided to try it.  Its been fun, and flustrating all at the same time, I'm slowly learning my way around it.  When I needed to call Customer Service, they have been extremely friendly, patient and more than helpful.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Barb Wheeler
Reviews.Content: I put off getting a Kindle Fire for a long time, but, not that I have it I'm wondering why I waited so long.  I love the size, the feel and the clarity of the screen.  I have only had it a short time and haven't gotten the full use of everything included on this Kindle.  So far it has been easy to use and all that has been promised.  Hope to have more Kindle time, soon!

Reviews.Title: In shock
Reviews.Author: Dawn Du Plooy
Reviews.Content: The device keeps turning itself off even though it is fully charged. Then u r unable to turn it back on with the power button. Was only used 2 1/2 weeks before this problem started.

Reviews.Title: Did not receive a charged with my Kindle
Reviews.Author: arlene Avallone
Reviews.Content: I am quite happy with my Kindle ,confused, not sure how to delete programs that I have usedAlso when I received my Kindle there was not charger; I am using my phone charger

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT!  However.....
Reviews.Author: Jj
Reviews.Content: In so many ways, I am pleased with the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 tablet.  Both picture and sound quality are amazingly good and provides an enjoyable experience.  I love using the Kindle as a book and I can travel with it, taking with me, dozen of Kindle books.  That is AWESOME!  This is my second one, since after almost a year, my first Kindle (same model) began to freeze quite often.  Several times a day, It would just stop working.  After I tried all the fixes available on the Amazon website, I contacted their technical support.  After a few tries to fix it, the technician volunteered to send me another at no charge and gave me a label to send back the old unit free of charge.  I LOVE AMAZON!  When I got the new one, it was already loaded with all my old contents and I used it without trouble, up until the last few day.  It now freezes, but only occasionally.  That's just enough to make me uneasy about this units future.However, I have two other concerns.  First and foremost, it is not capable of playing Flash Player videos, which constitutes about half of the videos available on line.  This is very frustrating because there are lots that I want to play, but the Kindle is not compatible and Amazon told me that there are no plans to change that.  Since they are otherwise, so accommodating to the consumer's needs, that seems odd.  Secondly,I am a subscriber to Acorn TV.  While it works on my apple computer, it does not work on my Kindle.  I am not really sure if this issue is one and the same (to not being able to play Flash Player), but if this flaw is addressed, I will gladly give the Kindle 5 STARS.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Erin Taylor
Reviews.Content: I didn't purchase it on Amazon, I was but I went to a local staples store to demo it first anyway, but I purchased it there.  My reason being, it was on clearance and I ended up paying $181 for it. I got the last one and it was the previous demo but once everything was clear it is amazing! I love the size and the screen is bright and very hd. The only thing I have noticed wrong so far is the keyboard. It lags and it takes a lot for it to recognise the "h" key. But I can live with that science I'm not using this for productivity. Otherwise great product.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Andrewleffel
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD 8.9" is outstanding. I have owned the first generation kindle fire and this is 10 times better. The sound is amazing, it sounds lime surround sound. The front camera is perfect for Skype. Also, the boon store, app store, and music store is non expensive and has a huge variety. I recommend this tablet to anyone.

Reviews.Title: We love it!
Reviews.Author: susan
Reviews.Content: The Kindle was everything we expected, however it didn't come with directions.  When i did contact for help, CSR was extremely helpful and patient.

Reviews.Title: Gotta have to be happy.
Reviews.Author: Lonnie Erickson
Reviews.Content: Love love love it. Wish I had bought a Kindle Fire HD 8.9 a loooooong time ago. Thank you Kindle Fire plus your tech support people.

Reviews.Title: Approved And Satisfied Kindle Fire Owner
Reviews.Author: Aphrodite Vassilatos
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing e reader, everything is so big and bright. The screen is big enough for me to read, surf the internet, and check my emails, it's portable and lightweight to carry and it comes with many cool features.  I would highly recommend this product for everyone.

Reviews.Title: Really liking the size of it.
Reviews.Author: stephennie meister
Reviews.Content: I got this for a christmas gift after misplacing my regular sized kindle fire.  The bigger size is really great.  I love that it takes pictures and I can plug it into my laptop and download.

Reviews.Title: upgraded to bigger kindle fire.
Reviews.Author: Carolyn's corner
Reviews.Content: I do like the bigger kindle however it has taken me a bit to get used to the size when playing games. Our grandchildren love to play games on it. Thank you Amazon for giving me money from older, smaller kindle fire for upgrade.

Reviews.Title: I have really enjoyed having the Kindle.
Reviews.Author: Judy Bohne
