In my travels, the AT&T; signal dropped out much earlier with only one exception:  If you are heading to the eastern end of Nantucket, this is the cellular connection to have.If you buy this Kindle, you will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Kay
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough good things about my new Kindle Fire HD 8.9" Dolby Audio, Dual Band Wi-Fi, 32GB.  What a huge improvement from my 7 inch Kindle Fire.  I find myself using this every day.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: A. J. Bergeron "avajo57"
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire - nothing more needs to be said.  Brilliant screen, convenience at my fingertips.  Love Love Love! It speaks for itself.

Reviews.Title: Best buy I have made
Reviews.Author: Roc
Reviews.Content: I would recommend the Kindle Fire HD 8.9" LTE Wireless to anyone and everyone.  Sound and screen are excellent.  The guide on the kindle on how to use was very easy.

Reviews.Title: Best Yet!
Reviews.Author: Deborah Brochhausen
Reviews.Content: From the original to the Fire HD this is by far the best. It is like having a tablet. It is just the right size and does just about everything, Love it!

Reviews.Title: 4G doesn't work, Silk doesn't work
Reviews.Author: Mr. David Maguire
Reviews.Content: I have WiFi connectivity no problem, but every time I try to open Silk (the browser) it tells me "Silk is not responding." So no Web surfing, though if I choose to shop Amazon or use one of the other built-in apps (like email) I can access the Web.Meanwhile, I gave AT&T; $30 for 30 days of connectivity and it never worked. Two separate phone calls with AT&T; (approx. 75-80 minutes total) yielded nothing. They verified the SIM card and made me reboot several times (which I'd already done on my own before calling). They wanted me to put my SIM card into my cell phone to confirm the SIM card is the problem. Really? With the Kindle browser not working either, it's not the SIM card.Beautiful device, would love to use it (I love my original non-HD Kindle Fire). But it doesn't work. No Web surfing, no 4G (even AT&T; can't figure out why).UPDATE:Amazon customer service really tried. Had to blow everything away and go to factory reset, but that fixed everything. The reboot did the trick. Cost me about a week and some aggravation, but everything is working fine now. Raising my rating to 3 stars.

Reviews.Title: Love My New Kindle HD
Reviews.Author: JMT "JMT"
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kindle Fire and the Kindle Fire 8.9 HD is a thousand times better in picture quqlity. Also, I like the Skype application.  A better buy for more money of course!

Reviews.Title: My Companion
Reviews.Author: Lucille I Edwards
Reviews.Content: Why didn't this product have a built in camera, everything has cameras now, to be able to take pictures you have to download a  Camera App, the app is not so great the pictures look like Skype pics, blurry. Hope I'm not giving misleading information, I did read the manual. Besides this I love my Kindle It works for the purpose It was bought for which is to look at UV movies in my idlling time. I also use it to play word games which you become so immersed into that your battery depletes before you know it, but you are given a warning about the nearing depletion, since the charging cord is only 5 feet long it's not feasible to be in a comfortable position  keeping it charged while playing your beloved games. I love my Kindle Fire,the color is alive and real just like a HD TV, I will be remiss in my review if I do not also rate the audio, which is  perfect. Everything else is positive. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Greater features
Reviews.Author: neyda c.
Reviews.Content: Sound is louder when watching movies.Clearer pictures, no need for a laptop.Really like it and like the double charger

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Winnie
Reviews.Content: I really like ur product. I love ur customer service. I do hope u get candy crush that would be nice. But overall the kindle fire is GREAT!!! Thank you!!!

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Linda A. Smith
Reviews.Content: I love the larger size of the kindle without the huge price of an ipad.  It holds lots of apps and books!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: My 10-year old son wanted this Kindle.  After much hesitation and research, we bought it. He loves it, I love it and am very pleased with the product.

Reviews.Title: Skeptic Turned Believer.
Reviews.Author: H. Srock "Cheeseburger Extraordinaire"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kindle Fire HD 8.9" tablet after my laptop (an economy model hand-me-down) died in its sleep.  I had every intention of purchasing another laptop.  I had no interest in tablets, but my fiance convinced me that I would enjoy the convenience of a smaller device and a lower price point.  He was absolutely right.I use my Kindle every day.  I didn't think I would.  I didn't think it would be any different than my smartphone, but...I was very wrong.  The Overdrive Media Console application allows me to borrow digital books from my local library and I've become addicted to Cut The Rope.  If you can navigate your smartphone, this device will be a piece of cake.  I've even been shopping Bluetooth keyboards, because I do missing typing at times.  Ha!And, with accessories in mind, I will recommend theAmazon Kindle Fire HD 8.9" Standing Leather Case, Fuchsia (will only fit Kindle Fire HD 8.9").  It is a fun, basic protective case that "awakens" your table when you open it.  It's genius.

Reviews.Title: Works well. Sending books from other sources can be painful though.
Reviews.Author: AM
Reviews.Content: If you have eBooks on another machine, you can email them to your Kindle. If it's a recognized format, it will load them up.  This was painful the first few times since the formats weren't necessarily working and it would take a few tries to get it right.

Reviews.Title: good as expected
Reviews.Author: Antanas Malikenas
Reviews.Content: I like it but it is a little heavy. Easy to manage and get on the web. I would recommend it to people who read a lot and don't want to carry the Kindle with them. Downloaded the Dolphin browser so that I can watch YouTube and network TV on it.Negative -the charge last very long... and it goes down very rapidly.

Reviews.Title: Just like new
Reviews.Author: harleydude05
Reviews.Content: Item came in a new box, it was in like new condition.  The money I saved I bought a case and wall charger and screen protector.  And I still had extra left over.  Very easy to set up, just had to turn it on and enter my Wi-Fi password.  It walked me thru setup.  Great deal.

Reviews.Title: A great item for me.
Reviews.Author: Janet G.
Reviews.Content: This is like having a small computer. It is just what I wanted. I wanted a good quality item  I could use just sitting in my chair.

Reviews.Title: Certified Refurbished Kindle Fire HD 8.9 is as good as new one.
Reviews.Author: amznShopper1976
Reviews.Content: It was  as good as new. there are no scratches or an physical problems. I would definitely recommend this anyone on a budget to consider a Certified Refurbished Kindle Fire HD 8.9.  (You do need to buy a charger. It does not come with one)Been using my Kindle for over a month and have not found anything. wrong with the item. It is considerable heavier than a 7 inch tablet. if you are worried about weight then i would suggest the 7in version. I personally love the size of the screen for reading books and gaming and can deal with the weight.The one thing i do not like is the placement of the power button. its right on the center.i find myself accidentally shutting the device if I am holding it sideways.

Reviews.Title: Just Love It!
Reviews.Author: shycrow
Reviews.Content: I was quite content with my 1st generation Kindle Fire and had no desire for anything else. Then, through no fault of Amazon's I found myself in need of a new Kindle. After speaking with the top shelf Customer Support ,I was offered a discount on purchasing a new device and they helped me choose which Kindle was best for me. I am thrilled with my new Kindle Fire HD 8.9. It does everything my older Kindle did only better...plus a whole lot more. It's quality and technology are superb . Navigation is a breeze and it's very user friendly even for a tech challenged person such as myself. I love the longer battery life and the port for charging as well as on/off and volume buttons have better placement. Nothing negative to say.Just a wonderful quality product ! Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: jfhygg
Reviews.Content: I love it.  but i wish it had a camera in the back so we couldl take pictures of others.

Reviews.Title: Been waiting to get this
Reviews.Author: Dainty Di
Reviews.Content: I would have said "love it" but I'm still tweeking it. Still getting to know my Kindle--but I'm having a great time with it!  Downloaded the Dolphin browser so that I can watch YouTube and network TV movies and shows on it.  Works great!  I also subscribed to "Love My Kindle Fire" blog and that's where I got a lot of info on tweeking it and tips and links to downloads--best apps etc.  I still need a computer--doesn't replace that--but I travel to see my kids and grandkids a lot and it's great on the go to keep up with Facebook and email.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: MsJazz
Reviews.Content: I have upgraded my Kindle Fire and it was well worth it.  I am enjoying using it.  Plan to stop my home delivery of newspapers and read them on the Kindle

Reviews.Title: It is just OK
Reviews.Author: Carlisle J Valente
Reviews.Content: I have had e-readers,tablets and ipad.  I am disappointed as this one jumps pages when I am reading and also goes to wrong chapters in the book I am reading.  My cheap pandigital was easier to use.  My ipad which is the ipad 1 is the best.  I only got the Kindle fire HD because I did believe it would be a better unit.  No tech support by phone!

Reviews.Title: perfect for my needs
Reviews.Author: street rat
Reviews.Content: This tablet is great. Some great apps are available.  I don't regret choosing this kindle over the iPad. Only problem that I have run into is that sometimes if I'm switching from app to app it seems like the tablet is having a hard time keeping up.

Reviews.Title: I love the new Kindle HD 8.9!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Eileen
Reviews.Content: I love the bigger screen, the picture clarity and the ease of purchasing items through Amazon. With my keyboard case, I can perform most computer functions on the Kindle.I am definitely a Kindle Fan!!!!

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Reta Thatcher
Reviews.Content: Its just like an apple iPad but cheaper! Its a good size if you want to read a book or watch a movie. I just love it

Reviews.Title: kindle Fire hd
Reviews.Author: linda Zubrycki
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire. Don't know how I lived without it.I love books and I never thought I'd be happy reading on a tabletBut that's all I use now. I also find it very easy to purchase things. I use it for my email and watch different episodes of shows on it. I am very happy that I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Tama
Reviews.Content: It was so much nicer than my other Kindle.  The other kindle was good but this one has the camera, the sound is so much better, visual is better... I just like everything about it!

Reviews.Title: kindle my 2nd
Reviews.Author: maria
Reviews.Content: Love my new kindle.  I bought the 8'9 this time which makes watching videos a lot easier on my eyes!!!  The HD is great!  Beautiful clear movies etc.  Great buy for the money!!

Reviews.Title: Love
Reviews.Author: Jennifer L. Cook "Bar10jen"
Reviews.Content: the Kindle Fire.  I like that I can read at night without having to have a light shining on the screen like my 2nd generation!

Reviews.Title: Pump up the Jam
Reviews.Author: cigam
Reviews.Content: I have been exposed to other Android and Apple products and would not give up my Kindle. Why, you might ask?It's affordable, it"s easy to use, It stays charged, it fits my needs. The only issue is that when compared to some other Androids and the larger fruit pad I could use another 10 to 15 db volume boost.

Reviews.Title: It does it all
Reviews.Author: Elmer
Reviews.Content: Easy to maintain and has so much you can do with it. Clarity of reading and viewing. So fast in downloading whatever you are seeking.

Reviews.Title: its a really good  profuct
Reviews.Author: E. Hyman "Sassy1"
Reviews.Content: i upgraded to this item when the regular kindle hd  i had fell in water and basically bit the the big one.. i made the decision that i was going to upgrade and amazon offered me  a discount to do so. i like this product it does a lot more than i know what to do with.. i wish i were more kindle literate because im definitely not utilizing it as much as i should. the sound is good. graphics are good. i am happy with this item

Reviews.Title: Kindle FireHD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Sheryl Malone
Reviews.Content: I love it. I have been wanting it for a long time. The dolby is much better than I expected. Highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Steven J. Ulitto
Reviews.Content: Pretty easy to use for someone not so computer literate. If I run into a problem I just ask for help and someone calls me right away with an answer. Was a little hesitant about getting it at first but glad I did.

Reviews.Title: For What it comes with for the price it fine
Reviews.Author: Don Hamel
Reviews.Content: It needs a voice application so you can do voice to text.  I know people complain about no GPS but that's not the design no the design of this device. Great Screen, Fast Response to touch.  Great Audio.  The networking on this device is fantastic, good distance from the network.  Needs more applications like other Droid Devices, hopefully Amazon is looking to add these.  Other than no Voice to Speech I would have rated it a 5.

Reviews.Title: Love, Love, Love!
Reviews.Author: Megan Freesin
Reviews.Content: This is by far the best purchase I've ever made!  I love my Kindle Fire HD!  For me, it was definitely worth it to pay extra for the larger screen because many of the games I've downloaded have excellent graphics that deserve the extra space.  It is very easy to use, especially for someone like me who was unfamiliar with tablets at the time I purchased it.  It has already proven to be worth its price in the hours of entertainment it has given me.  I also love the Cloud feature that stores all of my books and programs even if I remove them from my device.  For someone who is an avid reader it is more than handy to be able to store all of your books in one, easy to access place.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: Sonny
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd kindle for our family and we love it.  It met all of our expectations.  Excellent quality and the picture is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: Great customer service and device
Reviews.Author: bryan kaye
Reviews.Content: Works great. Had an issue with my first kindle turning on when I called customer service they sent me a NEW replacement kindle. Some company's would send a refurbished device. After all I think it was the case I bought for it that was malfunctioning not the device. So far I love it. Fast and works well.

Reviews.Title: Great, but could improve
Reviews.Author: H. Renert
Reviews.Content: Really terrific in many ways, Amazon books, even from public library are audio as well as visual. However, battery life much less than hyped. Also page direction management and pdf files ,management either with adobe or foxit not very good,

Reviews.Title: Kindle for me..........
Reviews.Author: Freda B. Smith "lost without fire"
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my kindles. For reading, social media, games, e-mail and ":surfing". This is  a definite take a-long when travelling. Everything is at my finger tips and easily stowed when not in use.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: Wayne Simpson
Reviews.Content: I have had a Kindle Fire since they first came out and really love it.  I upgraded to the Kindle Fire HD for the extra features and useability and I have not been disappointed.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire HD
Reviews.Author: Connie Best
Reviews.Content: This my 3rd generation Kindle. I have liked all of them, but the HD 8.9in makes everything so much easier to read. It's very easy to operate. Games on here are so colorful and easy to understand. My grandkids keep taking it when they are here. They bring their CD, but play my kindle. I have recommended to several people who are looking for something.

Reviews.Title: great update
Reviews.Author: Scott Thompson
Reviews.Content: Awesome picture! Great for watching movies and playing games. Bought to replace the original kindle fire and am very happy with it

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire HD, only one problem
Reviews.Author: Evie
Reviews.Content: The only problem I have with the Kindle Fire HD is where the charging outlet is.  I wish it was on one of the ends instead of the side.  When you have it standing up in the case with the landscape view and you need to charge it, you cant stand it up because of the plug in.  Other than that, no complaints at all.  :)

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire hd 8.9
Reviews.Author: Jeanette
Reviews.Content: A Great value for the price , it does everything it promises and I am very pleased with this product.

Reviews.Title: Glad I bought it.
Reviews.Author: E. Ledbetter
Reviews.Content: I am really happy with this Kindle Fire HD 8.9".  It is great to have the larger screen, and this is nice while reading books, as well as all other information.  Like I said, I'm glad I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Pier
Reviews.Content: I love this device! It absolutely met and exceeded my expectations. So glad I ordered it on Amazon. No ads, and it was already registered.

Reviews.Title: the best
Reviews.Author: priscilla jefferson
Reviews.Content: just don't leave home without it . I live and breathe for my Kindle had a few kinks in the beginning but now cool beans.

Reviews.Title: Great Reader!!
Reviews.Author: Ken M Cottrell
Reviews.Content: I thoroughly enjoy the Kindle Fire HD.  I'm an avid reader & started with a regular Kindle.  The 8.9"& backlit HD screen made it come alive.  I never thought I would not enjoy holding a book to read it but now it seems like drudgery.  I love being able to touch the screen to turn a page. Also, having Wi-Fi is great when I'm away from my computer.  I don't necessarily like the carousel but can live with it.  I would rather have icons on 1 screen.  Only problem I had was a battery that seemed to go bad.  I read up & other people that got this Kindle when it first came out had the same problem but Amazon replaced it right away.

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy for the price!
Reviews.Author: cinji
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire 8.9" is a great value.  The screen resolution is stunning, reading is enjoyable, and apps are easy to use.  Is it an iPad killer?  Not exactly, but it will do most things.  You can still check and create email, do Facebook, and play some games, but as others have said, the Amazon apps are limited.  I like that I can watch both Netflix and Amazon Prime video (Android tablets like the Nexus 7 have issues with Amazon Prime--I think it can be done, but not easily for the non-tech-savvy. Of course it's a problem on a Nook since they are the competition, which is too bad because the Nook tablet has an amazing screen).The size is a nice in-between the 7" and 10". For the money it's hard to beat.  I gave it a 4 because of the limitations of the apps and because I'm not a fan of the carousel, but those are not deal-breakers.  This tablet is perfect for the value-conscious person.

Reviews.Title: my third kindle
Reviews.Author: Joan Harper
Reviews.Content: Had the seven inch kindle previously and like this larger size screen more because it is so much easier to read and the larger pictures are great especially for videos , hd quality very good..

Reviews.Title: The Fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Lisette
Reviews.Content: This is a great buy.  I am very satisfied with everything the Fire Kindle has to offer.  The only reason I gave It four stars is because it is quite heavy compared to my ordinary kindle.  I know the Fire Kindle is larger than the first Kindle Amazon came out with.  I would think the Fire Kindle could be made lighter.

Reviews.Title: Great as a reader and for video, OS is substandard
Reviews.Author: moose_of_many_waters
Reviews.Content: I bought this mostly as a pdf and MS doc reader for book-length manuscripts.  The 7" tablets and 6" eReaders that are out there have too small a screen for me for extended use.  At the price a refurb of the 8.9 HD was offered on sale, I thought it would be worth trying out.  It's a pretty good reader for pdfs, although there isn't any ability to change font size unless you try to convert pdfs into Kindle format via email, which is a hit and miss process.  The screen is fantastic for reading MS docs, very sharp and the 8.9 size makes reading long docs a breeze.I also looked at the ability to watch video (TV and movies) through my Prime account.  The screen is great for that as well, but apparently you can only stream free content.  You can't download unless you pay, which makes this device less desirable for airplane viewing.  Google Play on my 7" Android tablet seems to have a more interesting selection of movies for rental.So the Kindle Fire 8.9 HD is a very good to fantastic device as an e-reader and a pretty good device for watching TV shows and movies.  But as a tablet for apps it isn't good.  Basically, Amazon has defanged the Android OS to make this device work best as an Amazon product delivery system.  Standard apps for Android, like Google Navigation, aren't available.  There are many key apps I use on my Android 7" tablet and Apple iPhone that aren't available.  Everything seems to be oriented toward buying books, movies, TV shows, and apps through Amazon.  It's more than a bit annoying, and the OS used isn't nearly as slick as you'd find with a pure Android or Apple tablet.I'll be happy to use this as a reader for book-length manuscripts.  The quality and size of the screen hold a lot of appeal to me.  But I'll keep using my iPhone and Android 7" tablet for apps.  This device comes up short in that department.

Reviews.Title: What was I waiting for?
Reviews.Author: Suz
Reviews.Content: Well, actually, I was waiting for a good price cut on the Fire HD models, while continuing to use my old first generation 7" Kindle Fire.Last week, Amazon ran a daily deal featuring seriously discounted certified refurb Kindle Fire HD 8.9" tablets, so I bought one (32GB).I don't, strictly speaking, or even loosely speaking, *need* this thing. But I certainly like it. It has drawbacks, mostly the stupid carousel interface. I just splurged another fifteen bucks to get rid of the "special offers" so maybe the interface will be less annoying now.However, the display is fine, operations are quick, sound is good (through headphones or small external speakers), and I'm enjoying streaming Amazon Prime video on the FIre HD. I've been able to load (by USB) some instructional video files and some photos onto the tablet, which I like being able to view without needing to be online.I knew it would be an upgrade from my old Kindle Fire, but have been delighted by the improved performance.I was able to snag the Amazon Kindle Fire HD 8.9" Standing Leather Case, Saddle Tan during a Lightning Deal on the same day I bought my discounted refurb HD, which was a lucky buy. It's a really good case, but even at the discount not exactly cheap.Overall, I'm not sorry I waited, but am also not at all sorry I finally bought this Fire HD in the larger size.

Reviews.Title: Silk is a good reason to not buy a Kindle.
Reviews.Author: Karyn Best
Reviews.Content: For emails, books, games and many other reasons I like the Kindle. For going on line, you have to deal with Silk.  I am sick and tired of seeing the message that Silk has stopped working.  If you are using a tablet mostly on line, which I do not, investigate your options. I cannot even use google maps without Silk locking up.

Reviews.Title: Really love my Kindle!
Reviews.Author: Ronald D. Jones
Reviews.Content: I've bought a lot of neat electronics over the years but this is by far the best. The preloaded web browser and email client work greatand reading a book is very nice with the ability to choose text sizes and brightness. I'm most impressed by wireless streaming of videos thru this device to my HDTV...just beautiful! The problem others have mentioned about a lack of 'Flash' video hasn't been a problem....it doesn't work but it hasn't kept me from anything except commercials I didn't want to see anyway! I'm planning on paying for Amazon Prime as soon as my free trial is up.

Reviews.Title: Still Having Issues with the Device
Reviews.Author: Kenneth M. Atcherson
Reviews.Content: I'm currently on my 4th Kindle device based upon the issues that I've had since my purchase at the end of April 2013. When the device works, it's a great device to use.  The size is just right without being bulky.  I also like the ability to download videos & documents from the cloud and to have apps store there without clogging up the device.When problems start with the devices I've had going into sleep mode on the own right during the middle of working on it tends to cause issues when using it for work.  This also becomes frustrating if in the middle of a game and the device goes into sleep mode when you're just about  to hit the high score.  Another issue I've had as been with the Silk Browser.  After utsing it over time it tends to get slower.  There aren't any other browsers available for use unless you want to rig the device and void your warranty.It Kindle can resolve these issues and  open up to more apps that can be accessed in Google Play, you would have an awesome device.  Not sure how the company plans to make this more of a work device versus just an entertainment device.  A free fully functioning application with MS Office would be great.

Reviews.Title: 8,9 kindle 4G lte 64
Reviews.Author: Michael K. T. Huie
Reviews.Content: I like it but slower than the 7in. wifi, would have been better with charge plug on the side, the first one had a problem and was replaced quickly

Reviews.Title: Exactly What I Needed from a Tablet
Reviews.Author: Kristy Hamman
Reviews.Content: I had long been debating whether or not I actually needed a Surface or iPad, and came to the conclusion that I did not. If you don't need all the bells and whistles of a much more expensive tablet, the Kindle Fire HD may just be for you! I wanted something that could hold a good charge, I could check my emails on, browse the internet, write the occational paper, take notes, and read easily. This definitely does the trick. So much more affordable than other tablets (of course, they can do more) The Kindle Fire HD was the perfect choice for me.I still don't know why, after all this time, Amazon has not made a Kindle Fire HD user guide, but that's not a big deal. You can basically search the internet for anything you need to know or download one of the many free or cheap Kindle Fire HD userguides that have been put up in the app store.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: scotty parnell
Reviews.Content: I really like this, never had one .I would recommend this to anyone ,it is easy and convient.really easy .

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9" 4G LTE Wireless
Reviews.Author: gourdland
Reviews.Content: I already had the KFHD 8.9" without the 4G. I use it for games, surfing the net, and watching shows on Amazon Prime. I purchased the 4G and the $49.99 data plan so that when I go to secluded areas without wifi, I am (hopefully) connected. I used my first KFHD about 18 hrs a day until I got the 4G. I now use the 4G about 18 hrs a day and the other KFHD maybe 6 hours a week. I like my KFHDs and just wish Amazon would make a device to download more movies, shows I've purchased so when I go camping (and don't have wifi) I will still have access to ALL the programming I have purchased.

Reviews.Title: Unbelievable!!!
Reviews.Author: Hootiewoo
Reviews.Content: The 8.9 is a must have, light weight, easy to use, and it just looks great! The only thing I wasn't happy with was it didn't come with the new update, but it was fine after that, go get the Kindle Fire 8.9!!

Reviews.Title: Loved my first Kindle Fire and..........
Reviews.Author: Patsy F. Shinn
Reviews.Content: My HD Kindle Fire is even more loveable!  Have downloaded books which I really enjoyed reading during my recent 7-day cruise.  Also, love playing card games and "Words with Friends".  Lotza fun with this Kindle HD Fire!

Reviews.Title: My greatest reading/viewing toy ever
Reviews.Author: Mark F. Braun
Reviews.Content: I bought a slightly used Kindle Fire 8.9 16 gig and what a lifechanger! My TIME subscription is an easier, more blown-out read on the Kindle, and with a short stack of library books on it, I can see how people read multiple books at once (well, think back to school and multiple textbooks; you'll now regain that ability and love it). Yes, email's great, although I've changed to another browser and also added a minimal bunch of apps that allow for comic book reading (CRZ/CBR files) as well as periodicals (Zinio is insanely good for world magazines).I didn't exprecto fall in love with the Kindle for TV shows, but it is an intimate viewing experience. Fast wifi. Get the leatherette case to make it stand; the microUSB is easy to get extra cable for ($4 anywhere). Easy to charge, Kindle has converted this old-fashioned reader into a newer media fan. Bring on the newspapers and ROLLING STONE. Make the TIME cover story on bees go BZZZZZZ and throw in pop-up FYIs to help me understand who and what is what.Oh, and certainly add on the FREE antivirus app and beware of "bloatware" that can just eat up space on that 16 gig drive. Yes, you can use the cloud, but be careful and enjoy!!!

Reviews.Title: HD Fire into my eyes
Reviews.Author: Justin D Meierhenry
Reviews.Content: Ordered this yesterday with the Promotion price and the Certified Refurbished unit.Super fast next day shipping.Beautiful video streaming, don't even have the HD setting turned on.Fast fluid menus.App store is not the best but this is something I already knew. But with the way Prime Instant Video has evolved over the past year (Which lead me to finally cancel Netflix in favor of Prime.) I am sure the app store will be on par within a few years or sooner.The sound that pumps out of the tiny speakers is pretty great, much better than the Ipod dock I have in my bathroom with a built in sub. Which doesn't speak to highly on that product at all, But it was cheap, you always get what you pay for.This will now be a solid edition to my desk at work (Which I have currently hooked up to my Logitech Speaker System Z623, which if you are in the market for great desktop speakers with huge kick I would highly recommend these. I got mine originally from Newegg.com but I'm sure Amazon sells them also.After I signed up for prime I've wanted to get a Kindle. I snagged the regular fires last year for my Nieces for Christmas (Which they love by the way.) So I figured I would pop for the big daddy Fire HD 8.9. This will make reading much more easy on the eyes instead of using my Galaxy Note with the Kindle app.All in all, I have only had this item for going on 4 hours, But my work is done, and The Goonies is playing by my side so all in all... Today was a victory. Thanks Amazon. Shut up and take my money!!! :)

Reviews.Title: Doesn't hold a charge.
Reviews.Author: S. Lodge "book lover"
Reviews.Content: I was a bit disappointed at the amount of time the Kindle will stay working throughout the day.  It seems to lose energy really fast.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: amy
Reviews.Content: I love it- bought it for reading and playing some games, it does great for both. Really nice HD and color. I haven't tried watching movies on it yet, but am planning to.

Reviews.Title: My granddaughter is very happy with her Kindle Fire, she said is amazing.
Reviews.Author: chito
Reviews.Content: My Granddaughter is so happy with the Kindle Fire 8.9". She has also the small one, but she told me that  this one is amazing.

Reviews.Title: So great
Reviews.Author: PATRICIA Espinosa Ruiz "crazy for shops"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my grand pa cause hi cant read small letters and this ítem was very confortable for him

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HD 8.9!!
Reviews.Author: Rodney E.
Reviews.Content: Just what I wanted!!! Does everything and more than I expected. Thank you Amazon Warehouse you made my birthday perfect!

Reviews.Title: Good tablet!
Reviews.Author: Brenda S
Reviews.Content: Received this as a replacement for a broken 1st Gen Fire (power port issue)and love it.  Great size - not too big and not too small.  The HD picture is awesome for movies\videos\games\etc.  The sound is an improvement from the 1st Gen I had but could still sue some tweaking - love to see the speakers make it to the front somehow.  They are currently on the back side which means the case can cause some interruption in the quality of the sound.  If you use it without a case you have to be careful where you set it to not block the speakers.  The only other change would be the camera - it is currently located on the front (for use with Skype)which makes it very difficult to take pictures and videos are out....  They need to enable to camera to flip like the iPhone so you can use skype or take pics\video.  If those changes were made this table would be a 5 star piece of equipment.  JMHORecommed!

Reviews.Title: Dropped the ball on Next Day Delivery = Goofed by pre-configuring tablet with full open account access of buyers account.
Reviews.Author: Steve Fields "fields24"
Reviews.Content: After ordering the item I requested, next day shipping, (AmazonPrime) as a present, It was not SHIPPED UNTIL the NEXT DAY. Needless to say it was not received in "next day manner" but after 4 days. And I also found that the item, « to be given as a gift » was already pre-configured  with my account access and account history, with ability to order from MY Amazon account.This was nice to find out thanks to the fact that at least it for was for my adult daughter who warned me just after she booted it up and logged on.  Amazon needs to take more care in how they ship a desired item in such as a way since if someone else had picked up my delivered package from the porch they would have had full access to my Amazon Account. And had a field day with my account. They did at least refund the 3.99 for the special shipping. Thanks!Even if I had meant the tablet to go to a nephew or friend I still do not think that the things should be sent default , turned on,  and then find that they are in the Purchaser's account and ready to order more things FOR FREE.  Amazon Please fix this!!!!Besides all this: She loves it and is presently checking out what all it can do and laughing as she finds new features.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD!!!
Reviews.Author: Chas Mac
Reviews.Content: Best thing I bought in a long time,been using it for about a year can't put it down still after all this time.I do everything with it,music,video,apps,web,books This is a great one Amazon can't wait for the next one.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase!
Reviews.Author: Runhiker
Reviews.Content: My previous Kindle Generation One was stolen after several years of use and had to be replaced. I had noticed the three options in obtaining a new Kindle reader so when I saw this refurbished Kindle Fire HD 8.9 4G LTE with all the bells and whistles, I went for it and have not been disappointed. I still don't know or have used all its features but every now and than I try something else and am amazed at its capability. I decided to subscribe to Prime and that has added additional features that make my Kindle Fire even more amazing. I highly recommend it and I am quite pleased with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE
Reviews.Author: Likes DS games "Ollie"
Reviews.Content: I bought a KINDLE reader with a keyboard when it came out and I loved it. Then Kindle Fire came out and I bought it and loved it. Then Kindle Fire HD 8.9 came out and I thought for 2 seconds "Do I need this?" And my answer was "Yes!" And I have enjoyed it every day since! I have Amazon Prime and watch shows. I look up things on the net.I have many apps games, stories for my grandchildren etc. ( Amazon offers a free app a day!) I check weather daily for home and other areas.I take it when I travel. I hardly ever turn on my computer. There are so many things it can do, just like a computer. I listen to my music. Read my books.  Check my mail.The screen is beautiful, the speakers great. You can Skype. As much as I love the first Fire, I love this more. Any age would enjoy this and find other uses I don't mention. Amazon help if you need it is EXCELLENT! They are always there for you. You can't go wrong with this item.

Reviews.Title: easy on the eyes
Reviews.Author: Poppy "est. 1998"
Reviews.Content: ...Have the 7" version.  Love the refurbished 8.9" model.  Had a couple of days when the WiFi connection was acting squirrely. Amazon support was patient and helpful.  May have been interference from a nearby neighbor, but the 7" model had no trouble.  Problem seems to be history.  Have received a new OS version as well as a new version of Silk.  The device is fast and easier to see and use vs. the 7" model.  Very happy, happy, happy.

Reviews.Title: Use my Kindle all the time!
Reviews.Author: Debby H "Debby"
Reviews.Content: I started out with a kindle keyboard that I received as a gift.  Loved it.  I ordered kindle HD 7" in January.  Loved it more and watched a lot of video.  Used my cash back bonus from a credit card to buy kindle HD 8.9.  That way I convinced myself that is was free, since this purchase was a total " I want it".  Great product easy to use.  Display clear and crisp.  Love reading watching video on larger format.  Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Kindle shut down
Reviews.Author: Virginia "I have always loved to read, just c...
Reviews.Content: When I received this item it was responsive with good picture. After a few uses it slowed down response time and will shut down on it's own and reboot from time to time. Otherwise good tablet for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: patricia mashek-aras
Reviews.Content: Love it, its very touchy, have to get used to the touch screen. battery doesn't seem to last as long as I thought. Picture is sooooo crisp and clear.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Cindy Tommervik
Reviews.Content: I had the original kindle and it served my purposes just fine. I bought my Granddaughter the 7" Kindle Fire and when I saw what that one could do I decided to jump to the 8.9" for myself. Wonderful performance and versatility. Our other Granddaughter stayed with us for a week and fell in love with the new 8.9". She will have a Kindle Fire under the tree at Christmastime.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful!
Reviews.Author: Sandra Starich
Reviews.Content: This was purchased by my daughter and she loves it...especially the Internet capabilities.  A great price for a great product!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9" Dolby Audio, Dual-Band Wi-Fi, 16 GB
Reviews.Author: Amazon lvr
Reviews.Content: I love almost everything about this Kindle Fire HD! The one thing I am so very disappointed in is when you are typing in something. It CONSTANTLY skips spaces and never types what you want. The one thing that works is when you use the Swype. I was going to get an iPad and went with the Kindle Fire HD instead (because I had the original Kindle 2nd Generation and LOVED IT!!!)I wish the typing aspect was as pleasurable as the rest of the Kindle!

Reviews.Title: Their were no instruction, written, to get started with. I did not find it easy to work my way through all the apps.
Reviews.Author: Don Dunlop
Reviews.Content: Their were no written instructions to help get started. I did not find it easy to work my way through the apps. I wanted to use, I am a computer novice. I think I should have started with just a reader and then taken the next step to the fire.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire 8.9
Reviews.Author: allison robertson
Reviews.Content: FIRE  HD 8.9 don't like at&t; everything else is great. does what it says it wil.l have had no problems

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: You Know
Reviews.Content: I LOVE IT does everything you need perfect size, scene and device. The apps are great with slot of free ones to pick from.

Reviews.Title: Bigger is better
Reviews.Author: DmC
Reviews.Content: I already had a 7 inch Kindle Fire and I must say that the extra size makes a huge difference in usability. I just keep this one at home and it's basically eliminated my need for a separate computer.

Reviews.Title: What Can I Say,  I Love My Kindle!
Reviews.Author: L. J. "Amazonian99"
Reviews.Content: Amazon, you nailed it with this tablet.  The only thing I would change is the camera  should also face in the back, to take pictures of other people.The one thing I don't understand is why my other Kindle keyboard paper white,  always connects through WiFi, and never discloses the origin.  The Kindle FHD discloses the origin, usually my own network, it doesn't piggyback WiFias easily as the Paper white does.  Does anyone know why?Thanks in advance

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle!!
Reviews.Author: lisallisad
Reviews.Content: I just upgraded to the Kindle Fire HD and absolutely love it!!!  I never use my laptop anymore!!Best tablet I have ever owned!!

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HD 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Eileen M. Vucelich
Reviews.Content: My friends have Kindles and they kept urging me to buy one.  Well, I am so glad I did.  I love it.  I look forward to surfing the web, checking my emails, and learning more about the Kindle.I bought a nice cover for it, that opens up and the Kindle stands up in it.  Love to sit on the sofa with the Kindle on my lap and watch Numb3rs, surf the web for gardening info, etc. and check my email.  I keep learning more about how too use my Kindle and that makes it more fun and interesting.The screen is a good size and everything I have to say is good about the Kindle; I know you'll love it, too.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Kathleen D. Moody "catsabuggin"
Reviews.Content: More than I thought it would be.  It is perfect and so is price. Glad I decided to purchase it.

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: LAVISTASUE "SUE"
Reviews.Content: Love it just wish I could trade it for the one with 4G but this one does fill all my needs and everyone is jealous.  Still lots to learn but I did find the Kindle HD for Dummies so that has helped alot.  Us Babyboomers are use to pamphlets to tell us how to use things but we are coming around to this digital age. ha

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 8.9
Reviews.Author: Paul Thomas
Reviews.Content: Great , everything work just the way like it to , I just have one criticism and that is the carousel. I think there should be an option to use your own wallpaper and have an option to leave the carousel empty , using the favourites instead. All I really want on the main screen is bigger time and date app and maybe a battery level app too . The search bar and menu options are great and overall I love my new Kindle.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Bryan Matias
Reviews.Content: must buy. great for apps. .like an iPad but less expensive ... great screen resolution. . fast.. kids friendly... great for travel pc

Reviews.Title: been wanting one since I saw someone with one
Reviews.Author: [STRM]
Reviews.Content: so grabbed one while I had the chance! love love love it! I loved my kindle fire, but got this for the larger screen... now I never use my fire.... but I do have it as back up

Reviews.Title: This item is a great value compared to others on the market..
Reviews.Author: Lyle J. Mortensen
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD 8.9 is great since I can read the items purchased for my 1st Kindle reader.  The interaction with the Spanish-English dictionary is good.  The HD resolution is so good and I am able to read all attachments that I currently cannot see on my older smart phone.  I am very pleased with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Was just looking for a reader
Reviews.Author: ReallyJennifer
Reviews.Content: I was torn on which reader to purchase, as I had a kindle before and loved it for reading - I have an iPad, iphone and a laptop, so the fire was not on my list of things to buy - when my older kindle died, I spent way too much time comparing all of the readers, but none of them met all of my desires - mainly size, backlight and the ability to be read to... The fire was the only one that had all of that - even though I didn't need all of the other media it offers. Well, I have been pleasantly surprised with my purchase!  I love it as a reader and I LOVE having amazon prime on it - I use it to watch programs as well.  I'm not totally thrilled with the social media apps, but it could be that I am just used to my Mac products.Anyway - if you are just looking for a reader that is middle price point, and offers everything the others have combined, then this kindle is for you.

Reviews.Title: I don't use my laptop anymore
Reviews.Author: Monique
Reviews.Content: I rate this Kindle 8.9" a 5 star because it is awesome. It does everything they need. I just should have got the one that was louder

Reviews.Title: A perfect gift for our grandson
Reviews.Author: Silver Eagle
Reviews.Content: Grandson, age 11, thinks it is wonderful.  So do I when I can steal it away from him for a few minutes.

Reviews.Title: Does Everything I Want
Reviews.Author: Corky-G "Corky-G"
Reviews.Content: A great display and very intuitive structure.  I have used it for over 4 weeks now and am still finding new things.  I do my email, check my accounts, and read many of my subscribed magazines.  Now I have opened up Sirius XM radio, and it is almost as good as what is in my car.  The Amazon Prime option is well worth it.  I got the Paper White for my wife, and between the two Kindles, we have it all.

Reviews.Title: Acknowledgement
Reviews.Author: Glenda Ross
Reviews.Content: We like all the features especially the larger screen !Our smaller Kindle which we had just a little over a year would no longer accept the charging plug-in and we had to buy a new unit.We tried to get you to resolve this issue but we go no cooperation from you and needless to say that did not make us very happy.We felt that you were aware that this was a known Mfg. problem and you should stand behind your product - so that is that !!!Lesson learned I guess !!!

Reviews.Title: In Love!
Reviews.Author: MC
Reviews.Content: I ordered 2 Kindle fires last month - one for the girls & one for the boys. We absolutely LOVE them!! Great for reading, playing games, recipe searches & DIY projects. Definitely worth every penny we spent!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: NanaNay "NanaNay"
Reviews.Content: I've been a hold out for years to getting an e-reader but I love reading books on it.With the addition of Amazon Prime I can also watch many different show and movies. Love it.The HD picture is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9 4G LTE Wireless.
Reviews.Author: Judi Bizzaro
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love it! I had another Kindle that wasn't color and it was smaller. I like that one too, but the Kindle Fire Rocks. If you like to read as much as I do, I highly recommend this Kindle. You won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire HD!!
Reviews.Author: mommy "mom"
Reviews.Content: Perfect and lightweight. Fits in my purse. Can check FB or play a game anywhere, anytime. Great for long trips. Color and picture bright and brilliant. How did I ever live without one?

Reviews.Title: love my kindle
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle. I love having access to books movies and tv shows.  I love amazon prime but just wish movies and shows were cheaper after you pay your yearly fee.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet...
Reviews.Author: R. McIntyre "rickitikitavi"
Reviews.Content: We purchased our Kindle Fire specifically so our grandson would have "entertainment" while traveling with us and it has not disappointed.  The number of free apps keeps expanding daily and he is always finding new "games" to try.The only drawback that we have found is that you apparently cannot use the Kindle Fire while it is charging.  We have not been able to get it to "unlock", or if unlocked when initially plugged in, cannot get it to play any apps while it is charging.  The Kindle has a 2-3 hour battery life when playing graphic intensive games and on long trips needs to be recharged.  We have yet to find a way to use it while it is charging.  The Apple iPad, which my son and daughter own, does not have this problem.  It can be played while it is charging.  However, due to the vast difference in price between the iPad and the Kindle, unless you really, really need to use the tablet while it is charging, I am not sure the iPad is worth the extra bucks.All-in-all we are extremely pleased with our Kindle Fire purchase.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Connie McClain
Reviews.Content: got the 8.9 kindle for my husband he loves it and so do I Im getting me 1 too it awesome

Reviews.Title: Nice Large Screen Kindle
Reviews.Author: Weetabix Lover
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for the large reading screen.  I am older and like to make the print larger.  I don't use this Kindle for anything other than reading books.  It has so much more possibilities but I really don't need this.  I love the size and would recommend this for anyone who needs a larger reader.

Reviews.Title: replacement
Reviews.Author: jan
Reviews.Content: I really like your business. Kindle quit working,  I called and got new replacement. I really like my kindles. Enjoy your business.

Reviews.Title: Love my kindle
Reviews.Author: Dondra Cameron
Reviews.Content: I bought the kindle to read books, BUT so far I have only read 2 short stories.  I am having too muchfun catching up on TV series that I have missed, playing games that I love, reading my e-mail, etc.I intend to get around to reading books very soon.!

Reviews.Title: HAPPY HAPPY JOY JOY
Reviews.Author: curlybluelady "curlybluelady"
Reviews.Content: I absolutely LOVE this kindle-I just upgraded from my older one--what a HUGE difference-easier than the last yet more options-beautiful picture-camera-video-games apps--everything I wanted and more. I must add Customer service  person named Tauriq (?)was a terrific help in changing kindles-made it basically effortless-and at a great price-also scheduled a pickup by UPS of my old Kindle. It arrived the next day already charged-with most of my downloads already done for me,,,I only have 2 complaints--one--it doesn't come with the charger you will want to use so I ordered on for 19.99 today--and the delivery people just left it laying on my front porch-right out in the open-black box clearly marked. I cannot believe someone did not take it.Odd because amazon always has such good packaging-I get these huge boxes with plastic bubbles etc..and inside is a box of dog bones lol-don't know why they would leave this just laying on the cement facing my street  in no outer packaging?

Reviews.Title: For my birthday
Reviews.Author: fightingducks
Reviews.Content: Have a Kindle reader but, my wife asked me if I had any interest in this. Had to act cool, she saw thru it, and on my birthday in May I got it. Can't put it down only wish I could get the Pac 12 thru Prime. Pay extra just for that.

Reviews.Title: Like it
Reviews.Author: P. Kuntz
Reviews.Content: My only disappointment is that I cannot open some web pages on the Fire.  The instructions for a workaround were confusing to me.  If I can solve this issue, I would rate it a 5.

Reviews.Title: Great upgrade.
Reviews.Author: Lora Romeo
Reviews.Content: Awesome! LOVE the bigger screen and ability to actually respond on my juno email!  This wad a great deal as my original Fire was not working and I wad offered an upgrade at $100.00 off and there was a Father's Day deal of $20.00 off!  I was very Happy, although the original Fire should have lasted longer! It was my second replacement of the original.

Reviews.Title: Special offers are no bother.
Reviews.Author: D. Mack "Wooden Wizard"
Reviews.Content: I have the original fire also.  I very much like the bigger screen and the better resolution.  I use this all the time to play Netflix and Amazon movies on the TV.  Keeps up with no issues.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HD 8.9!
Reviews.Author: Evenflo09
Reviews.Content: I received this as a gift 2 months ago and am just now getting to the review. I wanted to give myself time for any problems to show themselves. I can honestly say I haven't found any. I've got to say that at first I was not happy to know it came with ads, but they are really tailored to you personally and I've found several with great deals! I got a $3 coupon off on MP3's and so have purchased a couple of single songs to start off my music collection and with the new Dolby stereo they sound wonderful! I also own an older KF and the sound is a HUGE improvement in HD units. You can actually listen to books, movies, games, without any headphones/earbuds if you want. I also love the bigger screen and the quality and crispness is fantastic! I had spent time reading reviews on different devices before I threw my hint out for the KFHD and alot of them said that the quality was excellent and I must say it is!!! The HD also has Bluetooth as well for those who want to listen in private and the little unit I purchased here on Amazon was easy to pair with KFHD. I am also looking into a Bluetooth keyboard to add for ease of use as well. I absolutely love the immersion reading experience! It does actually immerse you into the story more so that just reading and is so nice whenever you need to be up moving around to listen to the story and have it pick up sound wise where you left off read wise, and vice versa. I've seen people complaining about the apps or should I say, the lack thereof, but there is a way to side load many apps. I've enjoyed the free month of prime that came with the KFHD and at $79 a year doesn't seem like a bad deal at all. There were so many movies, shows, games, and books that were free for prime members to use and enjoy that I was never bored. The KFHD may not be as high tech as other android devices on the market, but for many people this is a plus! I can see where older people and younger children would find this an easy unit to use. I enjoy mine and use it everyday. I actually don't know what I would do without it now! As I said before, the KFHD may not as high tech as some android devices, but if you are looking for a cost effective little pad with basic web, excellent sound and screen, access to Amazon with all it's books, games, and apps, wrapped up in a simple, easy to use interface, then the KFHD 8.9 is for you.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: Paul Eznack
Reviews.Content: I really liked my wife's 7" Kindle Fire HD, but for me, I wanted a larger screen, so I went with the 8.9". It's awesome and I love it. I definitely recommend the 8.9" Kindle Fire HD to anyone wanting a large screen for watching videos and I have already recommended it to several of my coworkers.

Reviews.Title: great except limited google apps
Reviews.Author: Leo Ohms
Reviews.Content: I noticed that many of the google apps that are available on phones are not available for the Kindle  fire 8.9 .
